bhūmi kampam diśām dāham pratisūryasya darśanam
divā nakṣatram utpannam rātrau indradhanuḥ sthitam
niśi nakṣatra nāśe ca indu kṣaya dine śive

original: māsau cedadhike nyūnā ubhau prāpte ca vatsare |
analyzed: māsau ced adhike nyūnau ubhau prāpte ca vatsare
krūra ari graha yoge ca pañcame vā atha saptame
dvātriṃśat ketuḥ utpanne anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ śive
vahni vṛṣṭiḥ tathā bhūmau rudhira srāva pātanam
divi antarikṣa bhūmyām ca jāyate ca maheśvari

original: devālaye gṛhe vāpi grāmevā nagare sthale ||
analyzed: devālaye gṛhe vā api grāme vā nagare sthale

original: pattane rājadhānyāṃ ca vane copavane'pi vā |
analyzed: pattane rājadhānyām ca vane ca upavane api vā

original: nadītīre taṭāke vā kānane parvate sthale ||
analyzed: nadī tīre taṭāke vā kānane parvate sthale
sindhu tīre ca diś sthāne bhūmyā

original: tadbimbaṃ ca prayatnena punaḥ prāpte guruḥ priye |
analyzed: tat bimbam ca prayatnena punar prāpte guruḥ priye

original: śānti kuryācca saṃpūjya utsavaṃ ca samārabhet ||
analyzed: śānti kuryāt ca saṃpūjya utsavam ca samārabhet
yadi nāśa ādike bimbe yathā pūrva ukta lakṣaṇam
navam bimbam ca kurvīta pratiṣṭhā śāntim ācaret
tiṣṭhati ūrdhva mukhe bimbe kara pāda vihīnake
adhas mukha ādi anekāni hīna āsya kṛśa vāmanāḥ
darśanam ced idam bimbam vismayīkṛtya tad kṣaṇāt
vetāla kṣetrapālāḥ ca bhūta bādhā ca vardhate
sarpa vyādhi bhayam rājñaḥ deśe tatra prājāyate
tad doṣa śamana arthāya prāyaścittam samācaret
tava liṅga ādi bimbe ca bimba doṣa ādikān kramāt
samyak uktam mayā devi tad śāntim vistarāt śṛṇu
bhinna doṣa ādike prāpte yathāvat anupūrvaśas
ācāryam bhojayet pūrvam pāyasena ghṛtena ca
hema ratna ādikam tasya dātavyam vāhana ādikam
maṇṭapam deva dakṣa sthe kalaśam pūrvavat yajet
homam kṛtvā vidhānena saṃhāra uktena deśikaḥ
liṅgam abhyarcya santarpya trita tvam ca visarjayet
dvāram ācchādya vastreṇa phala pakkam nivedayet

original: tataḥ sandhāya pūrvoktaṃ liṅgaṃ vā bimbameva vā ||
analyzed: tatas sandhāya pūrva uktam liṅgam vā bimbam eva vā
prāyaścittam prakartavyam guruḥ kuryāt maheśvari
tava agre ca īśa bhāge ca uttama uttama maṇṭapam
nava kuṇḍam prakalpya atha yathā pūrva ukta mārgataḥ
racayet maṇṭapam devi dvāra toraṇa bhūṣaṇaiḥ
su tithau ca su nakṣatre su yoga karaṇa anvite
prāyaścittam prakurvīta sadyovātha maheśvari

original: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya brāhmaṇaiḥ saha deśikaḥ |
analyzed: tatas prātar samutthāya brāhmaṇaiḥ saha deśikaḥ
nityakarmāṇi nirvartya mṛttikā snāna pūrvakam
dhauta vastra ambara channaḥ vibhūti ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ
devālayam tatas gatvā prārthayet ca maheśvari
upaviśya āsane mantrī pūrve vā ca aiśakoṇake
prāṇāyāmam tatas kuryāt mātṛkā ādi yathākramam
nyāsam kṛtvā tatas mantrī guru vandana pūrvakam
dinam uddiśya saṃkalpya pañca sapta navāhakam
mama ātmajam prapūjya atha nāndī puṇyāham ācaret
varayet bhūsurān devi pūrva ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ yutān

original: guruṃ vidhiṃ ca dhanadaṃ sadasyaṃ cāṣṭamūrtipān |
analyzed: gurum vidhim ca dhanadam sadasyam ca aṣṭa mūrtipān
homa saṅkhya mitān devi hotṛbhiḥ ca yathā ukta vat
japa artham ca tad ardham syāt veda pāṭha artha ṣoḍaśān
para artham daśa viprān ca rudra saṃkhyān ca secakān
pūjā artham daśa viprān ca namaskāra pradakṣiṇe
ṣaṭ janān varayet mantrī madhuparkam ca dāpayet
vastra alaṅkārakam dadyāt phala tāmbūlam eva vā
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrvam ca mṛttikā haraṇam guruḥ
dhvajārohe tatas paścāt nava rātrau maheśvari

original: eka tripañcarātrau tu dhvajaṃ vā pūjayedguruḥ ||
analyzed: tri pañca rātrau tu dhvajam vā pūjayet guruḥ
sāyam sandhyām upāsya atha yāga geham praviśya ca
puṇyāham pañcagavyam ca kuṇḍa maṇḍapa śodhanam
vidyeśa ādi ghaṭān sthāpya dvāra toraṇa kumbhakam
taṇḍula āḍhyam jala āḍhyam ca rākṣoghnam vāstu homakam

original: p. 31) baliṃ ca vikiredvāsto rakṣabandhakriyāṃ nayet |
analyzed: balim ca vikiret vāstoḥ rakṣa bandha kriyām nayet
sthāna śuddhi ghaṭān nyastvā bimbaśuddhim tathā eva ca
liṅga śuddhim ghaṭān sthāpya pūjayet vidhinā guruḥ
veda pārāyaṇam dikṣu vidikṣuḥ tad manum japet
sarva mantrān japet devi tad tad sūktān ca mantrataḥ
adhivāsam ca kurvīta yathā pūrva ukta vat guruḥ
vinidrān tu tatas kṛtvā tad pare prātar utthitaḥ
snāna sandhyā kriyāḥ nītvā puṇyāham vācayet tatas

original: deśikāgniṃ samānīya prādhāne ca nyaset priye ||
analyzed: deśika agnim samānīya prādhāne ca nyaset priye
tad agnim janayet mantrī hotṛbhiḥ jāpaka ādikaiḥ
veda pārāyaṇam sārdham homa karma samācaret
mūlamantra pradhānam syāt lakṣam vā atha tad ardhakam
pūrva ādi kuṇḍe juhuyāt kalā vṛddhim ca
śānti durgām mṛtyu jitam tad ardham ca yathākramam

original: vidikṣu kuṇḍe juhuyāt caturastraṃ pṛthak pṛthak ||
analyzed: vidikṣu kuṇḍe juhuyāt catur astram pṛthak pṛthak
samidh ājya ādikaiḥ mantrī daśa dravyeṇa homayet
upahomam tatas paścāt pradhāna ādi yathākramam

original: prāsādaṃ ca diśāmantraṃ grahahomaṃ ca mantravit ||
analyzed: prāsādam ca diśāmantram graha homam ca mantra vid
mūrti homam gaṇeśam ca kṣetrapāla manum śive

original: sahasraṃ ca tadardhaṃ vā sarpiṣā juhuyāt pṛthak ||
analyzed: sahasram ca tad ardham vā sarpiṣā juhuyāt pṛthak
japa pārāyaṇam kuryāt tad tad mantrān bahūn priye

original: sthāpayet kalaśān mantrī sahasraṃ ca yathoktavat ||
analyzed: sthāpayet kalaśān mantrī sahasram ca yathā ukta vat
pūjayet ca tatas paścāt spṛṣṭet mūlamanum priye

original: uddiśya divasāntaṃ ca hotṛbhiśca pṛthak pṛthak ||
analyzed: uddiśya divasa antam ca hotṛbhiḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak
pūrva ukta saṃkhyayā hutvā tatas pūrṇāhutim hunet

original: homānte tava liṅge ca kalāṃ saṃyojya deśikaḥ ||
analyzed: homa ante tava liṅge ca kalām saṃyojya deśikaḥ
sthāpitam jīva kumbham ca secayet mantra vittamaḥ
nirīkṣā karma kartavyam mukha vastram visarjayet
tatas pañcāmṛtaiḥ liṅgam secayet rudra mantrataḥ
nānā sūktam pāvamānaiḥ tad tad mantreṇa pārvati
snāpayet kalaśaiḥ mantrī sahasraiḥ ca yathākramam
secana ante tat udvṛtya aṣṭa gandham vilepayet
mahā pūjām ca kurvīta nānā puṣpaiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ
bilva patraiḥ drāṇa puṣpaiḥ kamalaiḥ ca maheśvari
svarṇena nirmitaiḥ kuryāt pūjayet tava liṅgake
naivedyam bahudhā apānnam bhakṣa bhojyaiḥ ca pāyasaiḥ
nivedayet tatas mantrī mūlamantreṇa pārvati
tāmbūlam ca samarpya atha nīrājanam anantaram

original: balidānaṃ tataḥ kuryāt utsavaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: bali dānam tatas kuryāt utsavam ca viśeṣataḥ
dine dine prakartavyam uddiśya divasa antakam

original: daśadānaṃ tato dadyāt liṅgaṃ svarṇamayaṃ priye |
analyzed: daśa dānam tatas dadyāt liṅgam svarṇa mayam priye

original: bimbaṃ vātha prakurvīta dakṣiṇāṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ ||
analyzed: bimbam vā atha prakurvīta dakṣiṇām ca sva śaktitaḥ
dadyāt ca gurave bhaktyā kṛcchra dānam pradāpayet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet devi yathā ca āhuti saṃkhyayā
dakṣiṇām dāpayet ante ācārya ādi yathā ukta vat
bhūmi dānam tatas dadyāt guru pūjām samācaret
go bhūmi ādīni da tvā tu tantra upakaraṇaiḥ saha
iti evam kārayet śāntim liṅga nāśa ādike priye

original: bhinne ca sphuṭite dagdhe khaṇḍite yatrakutracit |
analyzed: bhinne ca sphuṭite dagdhe khaṇḍite yatra kutracid

original: tadardhārdhaṃ ca kurvīta bimbe vātha maheśvari ||
analyzed: tad ardha ardham ca kurvīta bimbe vā atha maheśvari
rodana ādiṣu doṣeṣu kīṭaka ādi nidarśane
kara pāda vihīne tu darśane kṛśa vāmane
patana ādiṣu doṣeṣu tasya ardham ca tad ardhakam
śāntim kurvīta pūrva uktam sarva doṣa nivāraṇam
sarva śānti karam loke sarva sampad karam nṛṇām
catur aṅga abhivṛddhiḥ syāt rājñaḥ rājya abhivardhanam
putra pautra ādi vṛddhiḥ ca sarvatra vijayaḥ bhavet
sarva mṛtyu haram śīghram āyuḥ vṛddhi karam priye
sannidhānam bhavet liṅge sarva abhīṣṭa pradam śive
garbhāgāra ādi vakṣyāmi doṣam śāntim kramāt śṛṇu

original: garbhagṛhe maṇṭape ca prākāre gopure tathā |
analyzed: garbhagṛhe maṇṭape ca prākāre gopure tathā
prāsāda ādiṣu sarvatra dahane sphuṭite sati

original: p. 35) chinne bhinne khaṇḍite ca prāveśe maraṇe sati |
analyzed: chinne bhinne khaṇḍite ca prāveśe maraṇe sati

original: vāhane parivārāṇāṃ dhvaje vā kalaśe yadi ||
analyzed: vāhane parivārāṇām dhvaje vā kalaśe yadi
bali pīṭhe kṣetrapāla dvārapālau maheśvari
dīpa stambhe ca ūrdhva mālāḥ chatra cāmaraka ādiṣu
śibike vāhana ādīnām pāduke vādyaka ādiṣu
patite khaṇḍite dagdhe coraiḥ apahṛte sati
evamādi samutpanne rājā rāṣṭra bhayam bhavet
garbhagṛhe ca saṃprāpte rāṣṭra nāśam jana kṣayaḥ
maṇṭape gopure devi tri māsān saciva kṣayaḥ
prāsāda ādiṣu saṃprāpte senā nāyaka nāśanaḥ
parivāreṣu yadi prāpte maheśvari
cora māri bhayam tatra duṣṭa bādhā ca vardhate
vastu vāhana naśyanti tri varṣa antam na saṃśayaḥ

original: dhvaje vā kalaśe bhaṅge balipīṭhe pramādataḥ ||
analyzed: dhvaje vā kalaśe bhaṅge bali pīṭhe pramādataḥ
kṣetrapāle dvārapāle dīpa stambha ādike priye
śatru bādhāt bhavet sadyas bhūta bādhā ca vardhate

original: p. 36) na sannidhyaṃ bhavelliṅge tatsthānaṃ nāśamāpnuyāt |
analyzed: na sannidhyam bhavet liṅge tat sthānam nāśam āpnuyāt
chatra cāmara sevā ādi śibike pādukā ādiṣu
bali dīpe vādyaka ādi patite khaṇḍite sati
rājñām bhoga vināśaḥ syāt gaja aśva paśu nāśanam
sarva bhaṅgam bhavet sadyas grāma lakṣmīḥ bahis gatā
evam doṣa ādike prāpte śāntim pūrva uktam ācaret

original: aghoraṃ niyutaṃ hutvā mūlamantraṃ ca pārvati |
analyzed: aghoram niyutam hutvā mūlamantram ca pārvati
diśā homam śānti durgā mṛtyuñjaya manum guruḥ
tad ardha ardham ca hutvā atha yathā doṣa bala abalam

original: sahasrārdhaṃ ghaṭaṃ mantrī tadardhārdhaṃ ca secayet ||
analyzed: sahasra ardham ghaṭam mantrī tad ardha ardham ca secayet

original: dānaṃ ca vividhaṃ dadyāt sarvaṃ pūrvoktamācaret |
analyzed: dānam ca vividham dadyāt sarvam pūrva uktam ācaret
śānti karma mayā iti uktam liṅga bimba ādi nāśane
sarva sampad pradam nṝṇām sarvadā maṅgala pradam
deśa kośa abhivṛddhiḥ syāt mama loke vaset ciram
iti śrī vātulottare prāyaścitta kāṇḍe śiva pārvatī saṃvāde
svastu
ratha bhaṅga pravakṣyāmi kāmye naimittike yadi
vatsara ādi utsava ādīnām ādi madhya avasānake
śakaṭa ādi rathe bhinne pathite śithile sati

original: dagdhe naṣṭe khaṇḍite ca tadaṅge ca maheśvari ||
analyzed: dagdhe naṣṭe khaṇḍite ca tad aṅge ca maheśvari

original: tavotsave cādbhute ca yadi prāpte pramādataḥ |
analyzed: tava utsave ca adbhute ca yadi prāpte pramādataḥ

original: doṣaṃ śāntiṃ ca sandhānaṃ tatphalaṃ śṛṇu pārvati ||
analyzed: doṣam śāntim ca sandhānam tad phalam śṛṇu pārvati

original: cakre hīne tvalakṣmī syāt tadgrāmaṃ nāśanaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: cakre hīne tu alakṣmī syāt tad grāmam nāśanam bhavet

original: rājñā daṇḍe balaṃ hanti dhananāśaṃ ca pārvati ||
analyzed: rājñā daṇḍe balam hanti dhana nāśam ca pārvati

original: tiryadgāṇḍe ca sacivaṃ nāśanaṃ paṭṭikā bhavet |
analyzed: tiryadgāṇḍe ca sacivam nāśanam paṭṭikā bhavet
mūrti yuj palake stambhe sva rājyam pattana kṣayam

original: pāntarāle ca madhye vā yadi namre ca pārvati |
analyzed: ca madhye vā yadi namre ca pārvati
roga bādhā ca tat rājñaḥ sva strī nāśanam āpnuyāt
ratha dvāra ādike nāśe rāja lakṣmī bahis gatā
ratha bhittau ca vihīnake
durbhikṣam prāpnuyuḥ sarve mṛtyu bādhām ca pārvati
śalāke rajju bandhe ca senā nāyaka mantriṇām
nāśanam ca bhavet mṛtyuḥ balibera sthale śive

original: bhaume cāntaramadhye vā khaṇḍite mriyate'pi vā ||
analyzed: bhaume ca antara madhye vā khaṇḍite mriyate api vā
ākuñcite vā patane tat rājā mṛtyum āpnuyāt
bali bimbe ca patane deśika ādi jane sati
deśa nāśaḥ bhavet sadyas catur aṅga bala kṣayaḥ
rāja dānī vinaśyeta śatru bādhā bhavet nṛṇām
chatre ca eva patāke vā alaṅkāra vihīnake

original: yaśaḥ kīrtyādikaṃ hanti rājabhogaṃ ca naśyati ||
analyzed: yaśaḥ kīrti ādikam hanti rāja bhogam ca naśyati
ratha agra kalaśe bhinne ratha agre pātite sati
tat rājñaḥ sarva bhaṅga tvam daridra tvam na saṃśayaḥ
tri māsāt mṛtyum āpnoti rāja lakṣmīḥ bahis gatā
rajju chede dhvaje bhaṅge tad janena nipātite
jaya abhigamanam nā asti bandhu nāśam ca pārvati

original: sarvāṅge śithile jāte sarvārthaṃ naśyati dhruvam ||
analyzed: sarva aṅge śithile jāte sarva artham naśyati dhruvam

original: rathe vā patite devi khaṇḍite bhūtale yadi |
analyzed: rathe vā patite devi khaṇḍite bhū tale yadi
tad rāja maraṇam sadyas catur aṅga bala kṣayaḥ
tat rāṣṭram nāśam āpnoti tri varṣa antam na saṃśayaḥ

original: dikpālaṃ tu tato vakṣye patite ca maheśvari ||
analyzed: dikpālam tu tatas vakṣye patite ca maheśvari
sārvabhauma kṣaya prāpyām geha āgneyyām ca bhūpatiḥ
yame kṣayaḥ cakravarti maṇḍalikaḥ tathā sure
prabhu kṣayaḥ ca vāruṇyām vāyavyām prabhu sārathiḥ
some mṛtiḥ maṇḍalikaḥ īśe bhūpa sati kṣayaḥ
tasmāt śāntim prakartavyā sarva loka hitāya ca
sarva doṣa haram nṝṇām śāntim kuryāt nṛpa uttamaḥ
ratha bhaṅgam tadā rājñaḥ darśayet na kadācana
ācāryaḥ śilpibhiḥ ca eva sa śiṣyaiḥ cāraka ādibhiḥ
ratha bhaṅgam tadā dṛṣṭvā punar tatra eva sandhayet
su dṛḍham śilpibhiḥ kuryāt
puṇyāham vācayet tatra vighneśa arcana pūrvakam
cakra ādi mantram juhuyāt sa aṣṭottaraśata āhutim

original: ghoramantraṃ ca tasyārdhaṃ mūlamantraṃ ca pārvati |
analyzed: ghora mantram ca tasya ardham mūlamantram ca pārvati

original: p. 40) prāyaścittaṃ ca śāntiṃ ca diśāmantraṃ hunedguruḥ ||
analyzed: prāyaścittam ca śāntim ca diśā mantram hunet guruḥ
samidh ājya caru dravyai tuṭikaiḥ sarṣapaiḥ saha
pṛthak mantreṇa hotavyam tad aṅge śithile guruḥ
snāpayet ghaṭa toyena sa aṣṭottaraśatam guruḥ
bhinna sthānam ca tad bimbam snapayet ca maheśvari
tad ratham snapayet paścāt tad ardham ca pṛthak pṛthak
pūjayet ca tatas mantrī veda pārāyaṇa ādikaiḥ
daśadhā dāpayet dānam kṛcchra dānam maheśvari
rathasya paritas dikṣu praśastāḥ ca anna rāśayaḥ
kūśmāṇḍa śakalaiḥ sārdham tatas bhūta balim haret
lāṅguli ādi sphalaiḥ tāḍya śeṣam ca utsavam ācaret

original: mahāśāntiṃ tataḥ kuryāt vidhānaṃ na gurūttamaḥ |
analyzed: mahāśāntim tatas kuryāt vidhānam na guru uttamaḥ

original: tadrathaṃ yadi sandhānaṃ na kṛte cettadā śive ||
analyzed: tad ratham yadi sandhānam na kṛte ced tadā śive
tava bimba ca avaropya svasti sūktena deśikaḥ
śibikā ādyaiḥ samāropya utsavam ca samācaret

original: śeṣaṃ karma samāpyātha navaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ ratham |
analyzed: śeṣam karma samāpya atha navam kṛtvā dṛḍham ratham

original: p. 41) yathā pūrvoktavatkuryāt trimāse saptame śive ||
analyzed: yathā pūrva ukta vat kuryāt tri māse saptame śive
tad ūrdhve vatsare māse tad ṛkṣe tad tithau api
bīja karma ādi tīrtha antam punar ūtsavam ācaret
mahāśāntim ca pūrvedyus guruḥ kuryāt vidhānataḥ
ratha utsavam tatas kuryāt dhvaja āroha ādi pūrvakam
mahāśāntim pravakṣyāmi vistarāt śṛṇu pārvati

original: tavāgre maṇṭapaṃ kuryāt īśānye vātha deśikaḥ ||
analyzed: tava agre maṇṭapam kuryāt īśānye vā atha deśikaḥ
dvātriṃśat hasta paryantam caturaśram samantataḥ

original: hastamātraṃ connataṃ syāt madhye vediṃ salakṣaṇām ||
analyzed: hasta mātram ca unnatam syāt madhye vedim sa lakṣaṇām
dvātriṃśa stambha saṃyuktām catur dvāram prakalpayet
daṇḍam saṃsthāpya kudalīm toraṇaiḥ ca api alaṅkṛtam
dvi hasta saṃmitam kuṇḍam catur aśram catur diśi
vidikṣu vṛtta kuṇḍam syāt vedikā upari kalpayet
indra ca aiśānayoḥ madhye vṛtta kuṇḍam pradhānakam
kuṇḍana abhisamāyuktam mekhalā upari śobhitam
iti evam maṇṭapam ramyam śāntim kuryāt maheśvari
etad dineṣu niścitya satya vādī jita indriyaḥ
dīkṣāvān karma niṣṭhat jñaḥ viprān āhūya deśikaḥ

original: prātaḥ snānaṃ prakurvīta nityakarma samāpya ca ||
analyzed: prātar snānam prakurvīta nityakarma samāpya ca

original: tato devālayaṃ gatvā phalapuṣpaṃ samarpya ca |
analyzed: tatas devālayam gatvā phala puṣpam samarpya ca
prārthayet ca tatas mantrī śāntim kuryāt tava ājñayā
tatas karmāṇi kurvīta ācārya ādi dvijaiḥ saha

original: niśi sāyaṃ divā prātaḥ karmārambhaṃ samācaret ||
analyzed: niśi sāyam divā prātar karma ārambham samācaret

original: maṇṭapaṃ ca praviśyātha āsane copaviśya ca |
analyzed: maṇṭapam ca praviśya atha āsane ca upaviśya ca
guru vandana pūrva ādi prāṇāyāmam samācaret
dinam uddiśya saṃkalpya yathā vibhava vistaram
vighneśa marca nāndī ādi puṇya aham pañcagavyakam
madhuparkam ca varayet ācāryam yajamānakam
mūrtipān devi yathā ca āhuti saṃkhyayā
dina saṅkhya mitam jñātvā varayet vṛtvijān kramāt
veda pārāyaṇa artham tu ṣoḍaśa brāhmaṇān śive

original: japārthaṃ ca śatārdhaṃ syāt sevanārthaṃ ca pārvati |
analyzed: japa artham ca śatārdham syāt sevana artham ca pārvati

original: p. 43) rudrasaṅkhyān pūjanārthaṃ daśaviprān pṛthak pṛthak ||
analyzed: rudra saṅkhyān pūjana artham daśa viprān pṛthak pṛthak
pradakṣiṇa namaskārān ṣaṭ ghanān ca maheśvari
cāra artham daśa viprān ca pratyekam varayet guruḥ

original: vastraṃ ca bhūṣaṇaṃ datvā phalatāmbūlameva vā |
analyzed: vastram ca bhūṣaṇam da tvā phala tāmbūlam eva vā
deśikam makuṭa ādyaiḥ ca svarṇa yajñopavītakaiḥ
dukūla pādukā ādyaiḥ ca chatra vyajana pātrakaiḥ
suvarṇa kuṇḍalam ca eva aṅgulīyam maheśvari
da tvā vibhava sāreṇa deśikam tu samarcayet
maṇṭapam śodhayet paścāt saṃmārjya vipra gomayaiḥ
devālaye vitāna ādyaiḥ toraṇaiḥ ca api alaṅkṛtam

original: darbhadāmnā ca tānveṣṭya saṃskāraṃ ca daśāṣṭakān ||
analyzed: darbha dāmnā ca tān veṣṭya saṃskāram ca daśa aṣṭakān
maṇṭapa antastha kumbhānām sthāpayet pūjayet guruḥ

original: aṅkuraṃ tu prakurvīta sadyo vātha maheśvari ||
analyzed: aṅkuram tu prakurvīta sadyas vā atha maheśvari
vāstura akṣoghna havanam bali pūjām samārabhet
rakṣā sūtram bandhayitvā ācārya ādi dvijān pṛthak
veda pārāyaṇam kuryāt tat tat mantram japet priye

original: p. 44) rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā nirāhāro jitendriyaḥ ||
analyzed: rātrau jāgaraṇam kṛtvā nirāhāraḥ jita indriyaḥ
tatas prātar samutthāya nitya karma samāpya ca
puṇyāham ca tatas kuryāt kalaśān sādhayet priye
sahasram ca uttamam devi pūjayet ca yathāvidhi
janana agnim pratiṣṭhāpya guru kuṇḍa stha pāvake
viharet anya kuṇḍeṣu agni kārya uktam ācaret
agni madhye samāvāhya tava mūlena pārvati

original: aghoraṃ pūrvakuṇḍe tu āgneyyāṃ ca sudarśanam |
analyzed: aghoram pūrva kuṇḍe tu āgneyyām ca sudarśanam
mṛtyuñjayam dakṣiṇe syāt pañca durgān ca rākṣase

original: devyāstraṃ vāruṇe devi prāsādaṃ ca mamātmakam |
analyzed: devyā astram vāruṇe devi prāsādam ca mama ātmakam
vāyavyakuṇḍem āvāhya some tattvam kalām hunet
īśānye śānti durgām ca tad tad mantreṇa pārvati
aṣṭamūrtīḥ samāvāhya mūrtipāḥ ca tatas hunet

original: ghoramantraṃ cāyutaṃ syāt mūlamantraṃ tathaiva ca |
analyzed: ghora mantram ca ayutam syāt mūlamantram tathā eva ca

original: tasyārdhārdhaṃ ca juhuyāt tattatkuṇḍe ca pārvati ||
analyzed: tasya ardha ardham ca juhuyāt tad tad kuṇḍe ca pārvati
gaṇeśa kṣetrapālān ca dikpālān ca hunet pṛthak
nava grahān mūrti mantrān ratha devān hunet guruḥ
samidh ājya caru dravyaiḥ truṭikaiḥ sarṣapaiḥ saha

original: godhūmaṃ ca pṛthak lājān saktuṃ vrīhiṃ ca pārvati ||
analyzed: godhūmam ca pṛthak lājān saktum vrīhim ca pārvati
tad tad mantreṇa hotavyam uddeśa tyāga pūrvakam
pūrṇāhutim hunet ante uddiśya divase guruḥ
snapayet ghaṭa sāhastraiḥ rudra mantraiḥ ca sūktakaiḥ
mahā pūjām prakūrvīta bahudhā ca nivedayet
bali dānam tatas kuryāt daśa dānam pradāpayet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt yathā ca āhuti saṅkhyayā
kumbha saṃkhyā athavā devi bhakṣa bhojyaiḥ yathā īpsitam
bhinna sthānam ca tad gātrau saṃhāra uktena mārgataḥ
ratha pūjām ca hotavyam snapanam kārayet priye
tat devān ca visṛjya atha mahā bhūta balim haret

original: svarṇaṃ vā rājataṃ vātha rathaṃ kṛtvā tu dāpayet |
analyzed: svarṇam vā rājatam vā atha ratham kṛtvā tu dāpayet

original: dānāni buhudhā datvā bhūridānaṃ ca kārayet ||
analyzed: dānāni buhudhā da tvā bhūri dānam ca kārayet
mahā utsavam tatas kuryāt ācāryam pūjayet priye

original: p. 46) gobhūmyādīni datvātha draviṇaṃ ca yathepsitam ||
analyzed: go bhūmi ādīni da tvā atha draviṇam ca yathā īpsitam
tatra upakaraṇam devi sa vastra pratimā anvitam
kalaśāt maṇṭapam devi dāpayet pūrvakam ratham
deśikam toṣayet devi sarva doṣa nivāraṇam
dakṣiṇām dāpayet bhaktyā karma kuryāt ca bhūsurān
śānti karma samāpya atha tava liṅge guru uttamaḥ

original: itthaṃ kurvīta yo bhaktyā rathabhaṅge ca pārvati ||
analyzed: ittham kurvīta yaḥ bhaktyā ratha bhaṅge ca pārvati
cira āyuṣyam mudam putra pautra samanvitaḥ
sthirām lakṣmīm avāpnoti catur aṅga bala anvitaḥ

original: bhuktvā ca vipulān bhogān kīrtimān dhanavān bhavet ||
analyzed: bhuktvā ca vipulān bhogān kīrtimān dhanavān bhavet
ratha bhaṅga itu idam devi prāyaścitam idam śubham
iti śrī vātulottare prāyaścitta kāṇḍe rathabhaṅgaprāyaścitta
nirūpaṇavidhiḥ nāma catuścatvāriṃśat paṭalaḥ

original: p. 47) ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi yathākramam |
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi yathākramam
vāhana artham gaja aśva ādyaiḥ vṛṣabhaiḥ ca api alaṅkṛtaiḥ

original: nakhadantakṣate śṛṅgī ghāte yadi mṛte sati ||
analyzed: nakha danta kṣate śṛṅgī ghāte yadi mṛte sati

original: yadi vighne ca saṃprāpte nityabalyādi cotsave |
analyzed: yadi vighne ca saṃprāpte nitya bali ādi ca utsave
pakṣe māsotsave devi ayane vatsarotsavaiḥ
ādi madhya avasāne tu yadi prāpte maheśvari
bahudhā śatru bādhā syāt anāvṛṣṭiḥ bhaviṣyati
durbhikṣam saṃbhavet loke mahā māri bhayam nṛṇām
nidhanam prāpnuyāt rājā rāja lakṣmīḥ bahis gatā

original: na sānnidhyaṃ bhavelliṅge yadi naṣṭe ca pārvati |
analyzed: na sānnidhyam bhavet liṅge yadi naṣṭe ca pārvati
tasmāt tad doṣa śānti artham mahāśāntim samācaret
na kṛte karma bāhulye tad kāle śāntim ācaret
karma ārambha avasāna antam śeṣam ca utsavam ācaret
tad ūrdhva māse saṃprāpte tad ṛkṣe tad tithau api

original: trimāse pañcame vāpi saptame navame śive ||
analyzed: tri māse pañcame vā api saptame navame śive

original: p. 48) mahāśāntiṃ ca kurvīta vidhānaṃ śṛṇu pārvati |
analyzed: mahāśāntim ca kurvīta vidhānam śṛṇu pārvati
guruḥ deva agratas kuryāt uttama uttama maṇṭapam
sa vedikā samāyuktam sarva bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitam
dvi hastam saṃmitam kuṇḍam sa yoni nābhi saṃyutam
vedikāyāḥ madhyamasya paritas kuṇḍa kalpanam

original: caturaśraṃ tu vṛttaṃ vā pradhānaṃ parikīrtitam ||
analyzed: caturaśram tu vṛttam vā pradhānam parikīrtitam
catur dikṣu prakurvīta catur aśram ca kuṇḍakam
tri mekhalā samāyuktam gurūḥ tad lakṣaṇa ukta vat
dvijān āhvāpayet rātrau vighneśa arcana pūrvakam
nāndīmukham ca puṇyāham madhuparka samanvitam
varayet brāhmaṇān sarvān ācārya ādīn pṛthak pṛthak
sadyas aṅkuram prakartavyam kuṇḍa maṇṭapa śodhanam
vāstuḥ ā akṣoghna havanam balim vāstoḥ samācaret
vidyeśa ādi ghaṭāni aṣṭvā toraṇam gaḍḍuka ādikam
sthāpanam ca tatas kuryāt rakṣā bandham samācaret
sthāna śuddhim tatas kuryāt tad sthāne ca maheśvari

original: p. 49) khananaṃ haraṇaṃ dāhaṃ pūraṇaṃ gonivāsanam |
analyzed: khananam haraṇam dāham pūraṇam go nivāsanam

original: viprocchiṣṭaṃ ca gavyaṃ ca sthānaśuddhiriyaṃ priye ||
analyzed: vipra ucchiṣṭam ca gavyam ca sthāna śuddhiḥ iyam priye
saṃmārjana upalepam ca vikiret sarva pāṭikān
rakṣā bandham tatas kuryāt darbha dāmnā ca veṣṭayet
vāstoṣpate iti mantrābhyām pāvamānam udīrayet
bhū sūkta brahma suktābhyām tad sthānam prokṣayet guruḥ
vedapārāyaṇam kuryāt japet mantram yathā ukta vat
tatas prātar samutthāya nitya karma samāpya ca
vighneśam arcya puṇya aham saṅkalpa vidhi pūrvakam
dinam uddiśya saṅkalpya homa karma samārabhet

original: brahmāṇaṃ ca sadasyaṃ ca śatārdhān hotṛkā priye |
analyzed: brahmāṇam ca sadasyam ca śatārdhān hotṛkā priye
nānā sūkta ādi mantra jñān daśa pañca maheśvari
caturaḥ veda pāṭha artham catur dikṣu yathākramam
parārtham ṣaṣ ghanān devi rudra saṃkhyan ca secakān
pūjā artham daśa viprān ca namaskāra pradakṣiṇe
ekam ekam pṛthak mantrī brāhmaṇaiḥ ca samanvitaḥ
yāga gehe ca upaviśya āsaneṣu yathākramam
pradhāne madhyame kuṇḍe hotṛbhiḥ daśabhiḥ saha
dhanadena sadasyena brahmaṇā saha deśikaḥ
kuṇḍa saṃskāra pūrvam ca janayet pāvakam śive
aghoreṇa ayutam homam uddeśa tyāga pūrvakam
pratyekam daśabhiḥ vipraiḥ catur dikṣu pṛthak pṛthak
homayet manunā devi ṛtvigbhiḥ saha deśikaḥ
udumbara śamī dūrvā khadiram ca palāśa jam
tad tad kuṇḍeṣu juhuyāt pradhāna ādi yathākramam

original: ghṛtaṃ caru tilaṃ caiva sarṣapaṃ tuṭikaṃ tathā ||
analyzed: ghṛtam caru tilam ca eva sarṣapam tuṭikam tathā

original: marīcaṃ jīrakaṃ lājaṃ pṛthukaṃ ca hunetpṛthak |
analyzed: marīcam jīrakam lājam pṛthukam ca hunet pṛthak
pūrva ukta saṃkhyayā hutvā anyamantran yathākramam
mṛtyuñjaya manum pūrve dakṣe pāśupatam manum

original: śāntidurgā paścime ca mūlamantramantraṃ tu cottare ||
analyzed: śānti durgā paścime ca mūlamantra mantram tu ca uttare
pratyekam ayutam ca eva kuṇḍe kuṇḍe yathākramam
homayet manunā devi japeyuḥ brāhmaṇa uttamāḥ
nava graham vāstuśāntim rākṣoghnam bhuvaneśvarīm
catur astram kṣetrapālam gaṇeśam ca sarasvatīm
mṛtyuñjayam ca prāsādam saptaśatī ādikam japet
snapayet ghaṭa sāhasraiḥ tad ardhaiḥ vā maheśvari
pūrva uktena eva saṃpūjya sa vastra pratimā ādikaiḥ
auṣadham ca vinikṣipya mūlamantram japet priye
homa ante secayet devīm rudra mantraiḥ ca sūktakaiḥ
liṅgam pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpya gandhaiḥ ālipya deśikaḥ
pūjayet bahudhā mantrī naivedyam bahudhā śive
vali utsavam tatas paścāt go bhūmi ādīni dāpayet
gaja aśva vṛṣabham gatvā punar sandhānam ācaret
dakṣiṇām ca tatas dadyāt yathā vibhava vistaram

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt sahasraṃ ca maheśvari |
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt sahasram ca maheśvari
deśikam toṣayet ante tatra upakaraṇaiḥ saha
śānti karma mayā iti uktam sarva doṣa nivāraṇam
sarva pāpa haram devi subhikṣam tad kṣaṇāt bhavet
rājya durga ādi vṛddhiḥ syāt caturaṅga bala padam
sarva śatru haram sadyas sthirām lakṣmīm avāpnuyāt
iti śrī vātulottare prāyaścitta kāṇḍe śiva pārvatī saṃvāde
gaja aśva vṛṣabhādiśāntividhiḥ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśat paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi śastradhāra nṛṇām priye
senā nāyaka bhṛtyānām anyeṣām samavāyinām
paraspara virodhena yuddhe jāte maheśvari
muṣṭi yuddhe daṇḍa yuddhe nakha danta kṣate sati
pāṣāṇaiḥ āyudha ādyaiḥ ca kṣate jāte maheśvari

original: patite raktajāte ca manuje ca mṛte yadi ||
analyzed: patite rakta jāte ca manuje ca mṛte yadi
vighne jāte tad kāle nitya naimittike api vā

original: utsave balikāle vā doṣaṃ śāntiṃ śṛṇu priye ||
analyzed: utsave bali kāle vā doṣam śāntim śṛṇu priye
muṣṭi yuddhe mahā rogam daṇḍa yuddhe kula kṣayam
nakha danta kṣaye devi durbhikṣam jāyate bhuvi
pāṣāṇa saṃbhave yuddhe prajā nāśa tvam āpnuyāt
anāvṛṣṭiḥ atha anya tvam śoṇite patite yadi
kṣate jāte manuṣyāṇām māninaḥ bhaṅgam āpnuyuḥ

original: maraṇaṃ ca yadi prāpte rājā maraṇamāpnuyāt ||
analyzed: maraṇam ca yadi prāpte rājā maraṇam āpnuyāt
tava liṅgena sānnidhyam catur aṅga bala kṣayam
śriyam āyuḥ haret śīghram grāmantam nāśam āpnuyāt
tad doṣa śamana arthāya prāyaścittam vadāmi aham
pūrva ukta maṇṭapam kuryāt nava kuṇḍam ca pañca vā
sa lakṣaṇam ca kurvīta dvāra toraṇa bhūṣitam
tava ālayam ca saṃbhūṣya kṣālayet gomaya udakaiḥ
tatas prātar samutthāya nitya karma samāpya ca

original: ādau gaṇapatiṃ pūjya nāndīkarma tataḥ param ||
analyzed: ādau gaṇapatim pūjya nāndī karma tatas param
puṇyāham pañcagavyam ca prokṣayet manunā guruḥ
varayet bhūsurān devi pūrva ukta dvija saṃkhyayā
madhuparkam ca da tvā atha śodhayet maṇṭapaḥ guruḥ
dvāra toraṇa kumbhān ca pūjayet sva sva nāmabhiḥ
vedapārāyaṇam kuryāt caturastram japet priye
vāstu rakṣaḥ ghna havanam bali pūjām samācaret
deha śuddhim tatas kuryāt tad sthānam śodhayet guruḥ
khanana ādi viśuddhim ca saṃmārjya prokṣaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: bhūsūktaṃ pāvamānaṃ ca viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pārvati |
analyzed: bhūsūktam pāvamānam ca viṣṇusūktam ca pārvati
vāstusūktena vikiret sarṣapam ca astra mantrataḥ
rakṣā bandham tatas kuryāt adhivāsanam ārabhet
pūrva uktena vidhānena tad tad kuṇḍān ca homayet

original: bhūbījaṃ ca tato hutvā aṣṭottaraśataṃ priye |
analyzed: bhū bījam ca tatas hutvā aṣṭottaraśatam priye

original: bhūtebhyaśca baliṃ datvā gehasya parito guruḥ ||
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ ca balim da tvā gehasya paritas guruḥ
nṛtta gīta samāyuktam punar sūrya udaya antikam
punar prātar samutthāya nityakarma samāpya ca
puṇyāham vācayet paścāt liṅga śuddhim samācaret
bimba prāsāda śuddhim ca tad tad mantraiḥ ca dravyakaiḥ

original: śodhayecca tato mantrī yāgagehaṃ praviśya ca |
analyzed: śodhayet ca tatas mantrī yāga geham praviśya ca
brahmaṇā dhanadena atha hotṛbhiḥ ca yathā ukta vat
upaviśya yathānyāyam pratikuṇḍe maheśvari
janana agnim ca kurvīta viharet anya kuṇḍake
homayet mūlamantreṇa ayutam ca maheśvari

original: ādhāraṃ pūrvakuṇḍe tu āgneyyāṃ tu tavāstrakam ||
analyzed: ādhāram pūrva kuṇḍe tu āgneyyām tu tava astrakam

original: yāme mṛtyuñjayaṃ caiva diśāhomaṃ tu rākṣase |
analyzed: yāme mṛtyuñjayam ca eva diśā homam tu rākṣase
prāsādam vāruṇe devi vāyavye śānti daurgakām
kalā vṛddhim saumya deśe pañca brahmāṇam īśake
homayet ca pṛthak mantrī yathā pūrva ukta saṅkhyayā
pūrva ukta dravya homān ca upahomam ca pūrvavat
pūrṇāhutim hunet ante snapayet kalaśaiḥ priye
sahasraiḥ vidhivat mantrī tad ardha ardhena vā śive
phala pañcāmṛtam devi mahārudraiḥ yathāvidhi
anya sūktaiḥ ca saṃsnāpya udvartya āmalakaiḥ śive
aṣṭa gandham samālipya nānā puṣpaiḥ ca pūjayet
śālyānnam pañcabhakṣa ādyaiḥ naivedyam ca samarpayet

original: p. 56) nīrājanaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ prasannayajanaṃ caret |
analyzed: nīrājanam ca tāmbūlam prasanna yajanam caret

original: dānaṃ daśavidhaṃ datvā yathāśaktyā bahūn priye ||
analyzed: dānam daśavidham da tvā yathāśaktyā bahūn priye

original: tilaṃ ca puruṣaṃ kṛtvā svarṇaṃ vātha maheśvari |
analyzed: tilam ca puruṣam kṛtvā svarṇam vā atha maheśvari
dakṣiṇām dāpayet bhaktyā yathā vibhava vistaram
bali dānam ca utsavam ca brāhmaṇān bhojayet bahūn
rātrau dīpa utsavam kuryāt bhūtebhyaḥ ca balim haret
kriyā samarpaṇam devi kṛcchra dānam ca dāpayet
dakṣiṇām dāpayet bhaktyā ācārya ādi yathākramam
iti evam kārayet devi sarva doṣa haram nṛṇām
putra pautra ādi sampattiḥ sarvatra vijayaḥ bhavet

original: tava liṅge ca sānnidhyaṃ sarvaprāṇisukhaṃ bhavet ||
analyzed: tava liṅge ca sānnidhyam sarva prāṇi sukham bhavet

original: kṣate jāte nṛṇāṃ devi nāśanaṃ ca midaṃ mahat |
analyzed: kṣate jāte nṛṇām devi nāśanam ca midam mahat
catuṣpadām ca dvipadām vanyānām duṣṭa jīvinām
praveśe maraṇe prāpte pūrvavat doṣa saṃyute
prāyaścittam tad ardham vā yathā doṣa bala abalam
śāntim kurvīta mantra jñaḥ yathā pūrva ukta mārgataḥ
iti śrī vātulottare prāyaścitta kāṇḍe
ṣaṭcatvāriṃśat paṭalaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi pattana ādi gṛheṣu ca

original: utpāte codbhave devi prāyaścittaṃ śṛṇu priye ||
analyzed: utpāte ca udbhave devi prāyaścittam śṛṇu priye

original: pattane rājadhānyāṃ ca tava kṣetre ca durgake |
analyzed: pattane rājadhānyām ca tava kṣetre ca durgake
rājñām gehe ca anya gṛhe dvija ādīnām maheśvari
anaḍvān mahiṣa vyāghra khara uṣṭra ādi praveśane
yadi gehe ca adhirohe yadi akasmāt maheśvari
tat sthānam nāśam āpnoti mahiṣī mṛtim āpnuyāt

original: praveśe maraṇe prāpte yatra kutra sthale śive ||
analyzed: praveśe maraṇe prāpte yatra kutra sthale śive
tri māsāt mṛtyum āpnoti rāja pīḍā bhavet sadā

original: p. 58) valmīke yatra dṛśyante tadgṛhe pīḍyate sadā |
analyzed: valmīke yatra dṛśyante tad gṛhe pīḍyate sadā

original: tasya putrasya bhrātrā vā vyādhinā pīḍite bhṛśam ||
analyzed: tasya putrasya bhrātrā vā vyādhinā pīḍite bhṛśam
maṇḍūke agni mṛte devi kuṇḍe kumbha samudbhave

original: gonāśaṃ jananāśaṃ ca arthanāśaṃ ca pārvati |
analyzed: go nāśam jana nāśam ca artha nāśam ca pārvati

anyaiḥ vā prāṇibhiḥ duṣṭaiḥ dūṣite ca maheśvari

original: praveśe maraṇe tasmin sarvārthaṃ naśyati dhruvam ||
analyzed: praveśe maraṇe tasmin sarva artham naśyati dhruvam
diś phalam ca pravakṣyāmi praveśa ādi yathākramam

original: p. 59) some nṛpabhayaṃ devi īśe sarvārthanāśanam |
analyzed: some nṛpa bhayam devi īśe sarva artha nāśanam

original: yadi dvārāntaraṃ devi ṣaṇmāsaṃ tu vivarjayet |
analyzed: yadi dvāra antaram devi ṣaṣ māsam tu vivarjayet

original: gṛhamadhye praveśe ca vatsarāṇāṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||
analyzed: gṛha madhye praveśe ca vatsarāṇām na saṃśayaḥ
tad gṛham varjayet devi śayana āsana bhojanam
gamanam devi tat ca eva viśeṣeṇa vivarjayet
dvāre kaṇṭaka pāṣāṇa loṣṭāni anyāni pūrayet
devālaye rājagṛhe varjayet na kadācana

original: pattane vā gṛhe devi saptarātraṃ vivarjayet ||

original: tacchāntiṃ ca pravakṣyāmi rājñaḥ gehe dvijādiṣu ||
analyzed: tad śāntim ca pravakṣyāmi rājñaḥ gehe dvija ādiṣu

original: maṇṭape vā prapāṃyāṃ vā kurvīta samalaṅkṛte ||
analyzed: maṇṭape vā prapāṃyām vā kurvīta samalaṅkṛte

original: tatsthānaṃ śodhayetpūrvaṃ khananaṃ ca mṛdaṃ tyajet ||
analyzed: tat sthānam śodhayet pūrvam khananam ca mṛdam tyajet

original: p. 60) lavaṇaṃ vā mṛdaṃ pūrya kṣālayedgomayodakaiḥ |
analyzed: lavaṇam vā mṛdam pūrya kṣālayet gomaya udakaiḥ
candra tārā anukūle ca tithau api

original: taddine ca prakartavyaṃ śāntiṃ caiva vidhānataḥ |
analyzed: tad dine ca prakartavyam śāntim ca eva vidhānataḥ
tatas prātar samutthāya ācāryaḥ bhūsuraiḥ saha
mṛttikā snāna pūrvam ca kuśa gomaya bhasmanā
snānam kṛtvā vidhānena sandhyā ādi japa tarpaṇam

original: puṇyāhaṃ pañcagavyaṃ ca prokṣaṇaṃ prāśanaṃ priye |
analyzed: puṇyāham pañcagavyam ca prokṣaṇam prāśanam priye
nāndīm saṃvācya pūrva uktam madhuparkam yathāvidhi

original: yavaṃ ca sarṣapaṃ caiva māṣamudgaṃ vikīrya ca |
analyzed: yavam ca sarṣapam ca eva māṣa mudgam vikīrya ca

original: p. 61) bhūsūktaṃ pāvamānaṃ ca sarvatra prokṣayedguruḥ |
analyzed: bhūsūktam pāvamānam ca sarvatra prokṣayet guruḥ

original: vāstuhomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā vikirecca baliṃ guruḥ |

original: khāridvayaṃ tadardhaṃ vā tato nyūnaṃ na kārayet |
analyzed: khāri dvayam tad ardham vā tatas nyūnam na kārayet

nava pañca eka kalaśam pūjayet vidhinā guruḥ

pala ardhena suvarṇena karṣeṇa atha sva śaktitaḥ

original: durgāṃ ca kṣetrapālāṃśca tattadrūpān pṛthak pṛthak |

original: tataḥ kuṇḍāntikaṃ gatvā sthaṇḍile vā gurūttamaḥ |

sva gṛhya ukta prakāreṇa kuryāt agni mukha antikam

devyā uvāca
mahādeva namaḥ tubhyam mahīpati sukhāya ca

sūtra saṃkhyāḥ ca vīthiḥ ca tad sandhīn vyūha saṃkhyakāḥ
vyūha nāmāni auṣadhāni vistarāt kumbhadevatāḥ
tāsām pūjā ādi sarvāṇi homa kāryāṇi śaṅkari
tava liṅga agratas kuryāt maṇṭapam ca uttamottamam

kuṇḍa khāta ādikam sarvam mama liṅge yathā īritam

nitya naimittike kāmye pratiṣṭhāyām mahā utsave
prāyaścitte tathā utpāte yuddha ādau tad jaya ādike
sarva sandigdha kāryeṣu bandha karmaṇi śāmbhavi

kumbha saṃsthāpana arthāya sūtra pātam samācaret
sūtrāṇi ṣaṣ sūtrāṇi adhikāni ca
prāc agrāṇi udak agrāṇi su samāni likhet budhaḥ

original: teṣu sūtreṣu manuvinmadhye madhye pṛthak pṛthak ||
analyzed: teṣu sūtreṣu manu vid madhye madhye pṛthak pṛthak
hitvā ca eva catur sūtram mārjayīta pada ekatas

original: p. 65) dṛśyante ca gatavyūhā caiva viṃśādhikāstadā ||
analyzed: dṛśyante ca gata vyūhā ca eva viṃśa adhikāḥ tadā
nava koṣṭha samāyuktāḥ prativyūhe pṛthak pṛthak

sarva vyūhāḥ samāḥ kuryuḥ madhya vyūhāḥ tava ātmakāḥ

original: tanmadhye ca navavyūhāḥ tadbāhye kālikā vṛtiḥ ||
analyzed: tad madhye ca nava vyūhāḥ tad bāhye kālikā vṛtiḥ
tad madhye ṣoḍaśa vyūhāḥ teṣām bāhye rama āvṛtiḥ
caturviṃśati tad madhye parikīrtitāḥ

vana durga āvṛtiḥ teṣām bāhye vyūhāḥ maheśvari
catvāriṃśat iti khyātā madhya vyūham vinā priye
vyūha āvaraṇa pañca atra nava vyūhāḥ ca madhyame

original: vīthiṃ vinātha saṃmārjya koṣṭhalīnaṃ ca thā bhavet |
analyzed: vīthim vinā atha saṃmārjya koṣṭha līnam ca bhavet
rajobhiḥ pañcabhiḥ paścāt śveta pīta ādikaiḥ padam
rañjayet sarva koṣṭhāni padma daṣṭa dala ādikaiḥ
vīthiḥ ca śyāmalābhā iti rajasā pūrayet tatas
tad madhya sthāpana vyūhe madhyame ca navākṣarīm
svarān ṣoḍaśa saṃlikhya prācya ādiṣu yathākramam
rama āvaraṇa vyūhānām vyañjanam madhyame likhet
śāradā vyūha madhye tu diś vidikṣu ca deśikaḥ
mā ādi sa anta akṣarān likhya bālā bīja trayam param
avaśiṣṭa vyūha madhya koṣṭhake lekhayet budhaḥ
nava durga āvṛti sthānām vyūhānām madhyame pade
dhāraṇa ākhyān ca nāda ādi prāc ādi manu vittamaḥ
varṇa nyāsa kramaḥ hi evam pūrayet śāli taṇḍulaiḥ
tavātuka nava vyūha madhye dhānyam naga udbhave

original: prasthatrayaṃ pṛthak pūrva dhānyārdhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ tilam ||
analyzed: prastha trayam dhānya ardham taṇḍulam tilam

original: prasthaṃ tilaṃ ca saṃpūrya kālikāmanunā yajet ||

ramaya āvaraṇa vyūha madhya koṣṭheṣu śaṅkari

original: pṛthak prasthaṃ taṇḍulaṃ ca dhānyārdhaṃ tatra kovidaḥ |
analyzed: pṛthak prastham taṇḍulam ca dhānya ardham tatra kovidaḥ
tilam tad ardham saṃproktam śāradā mukhya bījakam

original: koṣṭhajāleṣu sarveṣu prasthaṃ dhānyaṃ pṛthak pṛthak ||

original: dhānyārdhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ pūrya taṇḍulārdhaṃ tilaṃ guruḥ |
analyzed: dhānya ardham taṇḍulam pūrya taṇḍula ardham tilam guruḥ

original: tāni koṣṭhāni saṃpūjya tava mūlena vallabhe ||

tulasī bilva patram ca pārijātam tamālakam

original: hibeṃ bhadramustā ca padmaṃ nīlotpalaṃ tathā ||
analyzed: hibeṃ bhadramustā ca padmam nīlotpalam tathā
ramā vyūha aṣṭa kumbheṣu sarveṣu paritas kramāt
dravya aṣṭakam pati vyūhe nyaset bhaktyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
śārada āvaraṇa vyūha madhya koṣṭha gateṣu ca
dvātriṃśat udakam vakṣye punar prāc āditas kramāt
tulasī marut ākhyam ca bilva patram ca taiḥ yutam
patrodakam iti khyātam padmam nīlotpalam tatas
rakta ākhyam utpalam ca iti smṛtam puṣpa udakam tava
nāraṅga vikaca āma uttha phalaiḥ yuktam phala udakam
pippala ākhyam idam toyam śuciḥ bhūtam tava ātmakam
palāśa aśvattha cūtānām pallavaiḥ pallava udakam
prāc ādi pañcaka vyūha madhya kumbheṣu vinyaset

original: p. 72) hrīberaṃ bhadramustā ca kuśākhyamiti tairyutam |
analyzed: hrīveram bhadramustā ca kuśākhyam iti taiḥ yutam
mūlodakam iti khyātam tava sannidhya dāyakam
vidārī utpala padmānām tribhiḥ kandaiḥ ca saṃyutam
kandodakam iti khyātam śrīgandham ca agarum tathā
nima ākhyam ca iti taiḥ yuktam gandhāmbhaḥ tu iti kīrtitam
tilaiḥ yavaiḥ ca siddhārthaiḥ siddha ambaḥ kathitam mayā
vahni ādi dakṣiṇa vyūha paṃcake madhyakeṣu ca
nikṣipet mūlamantrā ca vadan bhaktyā
māṇikka mukta vaiḍūryaiḥ yuktam ratnodakam smṛtam
svarṇa durvarṇa tāmraiḥ ca yutam lohodakam matam
ravikāntam ayaskāntam candrakāntam
kāntāmbhaḥ tu ucyate devi makṣika traya saṃyutam
mākṣika ambhaḥ tu madhya sthe tu abhraka traya saṃyutam
abhraka udakam ākhyātam daitya īśa vyūha pañcake
madhya koṣṭha gateṣu eśi tava mūla manum vadan
nyāsa sūkta ādi mantreṇa prāṇamantram vadan tadā
kālayā añjana saurāṣṭraiḥ saṃyutam jñāna vāri ca
sindhūra gairikābhyām ca dhātunā sahitam tribhiḥ
dhātūdakam iti khyātam haritālam manaśśilā
kucandanam ca taiḥ yuktam raktodakam iti smṛtam
saritpatiḥ sarit kṣetra mṛdbhiḥ yuktam ca mṛd jalam
triphalā saṃyutam vāri kaśāyā ambhaḥ samīritaḥ
pṛthak pañca udakāni ittham paścima vyūha pañcake
madhya kumbheṣu vinyasya durgāsu uktam vadan guruḥ

original: kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ ceti tairyuktaṃ ca rasodakam ||
analyzed: kṣīram dadhi ghṛtam ca iti taiḥ yuktam ca rasa udakam
tribhiḥ kuśaiḥ ca saṃyuktam kuśa udakam idam bhavet
vrīhi nīvāra māṣaiḥ ca yuktam dhānyodakam tu idam
kapi kuṅkuma karpūra gandhaiḥ
kardamodakam ākhyātam kānti maṅgala dāyakam

original: tamālagūṃ ca dūrvāgraṃ kuśāgraṃ ceti tairyutam |
analyzed: ca dūrvā agram kuśa agram ca iti taiḥ yutam
aṅgurā udakam iti uktam mārutāśa ādi pañcake
vyūha madhya stha kumbheṣu vinyaset arpayet tadā
drākṣā kharjūra kadalī tribhiḥ pakvaiḥ ca saṃyutam
pakva udakam idam mugdhe vyūha madhye gate ghaṭe
taṇḍulam mudga godhūma pṛthak pūrṇaiḥ ca saṃyutam
cūrṇodakam iti khyātam loka cañcala nāśa dam
tilaiḥ yava akṣataiḥ ca eva taṇḍula īśvatikaiḥ yutam
akṣatodakam iti uktam vyūha madhya stha kumbhake
śakravalli saha alakṣmī strībhiḥ valī udakam bhavet
campaka aśoka nāśānām kudmala etaiḥ ca saṃyutam
kudmala udakam ākhyātam jana sampad pradāyakam
jalanyā evam ca soma ādi prativyūhaḥ ca pañcake
madhya kumbheṣu vinyasyet āryā sūkta ādikam vadan
tintriṇī pakva saṃpanna gulam cūta gulam guḍam
ca taiḥ yuktam rajodakam atha ucyate
khura agaru paṭīrāṇām rajobhiḥ ca iti taiḥ yutam
rajaḥ udakam idam devi prāk yugma vyūha madhyayoḥ
kumbhayoḥ vinyaset tām ca bālā bīja traya nyaset
dvātriṃśat vyūha madhya stha kumbhānām dravyam īritam
prāc ādi paritas teṣām aṣṭa kumbheṣu atha ucyate

original: devadāruṃ ca penaṃ ca tālīsāṃkhyaṃ ca māṃsikam ||
analyzed: devadārum ca penam ca tālīsāṃkhyam ca māṃsikam
kumbha aṣṭakeṣu vinyasya dravya aṣṭakam idam priye
ca eva mallikā karavīrakam
padmam jātiḥ ca kaṃkoṣṭha caturaṅgula saṃjñakam
dakṣiṇa stha aṣṭaka vyūha pṛthak aṣṭa ghaṭeṣu ca
kramāt dravya aṣṭakam nyastvā mādhavī kuravaḥ tathā

original: bandhūkaṃ pāṭalaṃ caiva nandyāvartaṃ ca ketakī |
analyzed: bandhūkam pāṭalam ca eva nandyāvartam ca ketakī
jalam hema ākhya puṣpam ca paścima stha aṣṭa vyūhake
dravya aṣṭaka samākhyātam aṣṭa kumbheṣu vinyaset

original: saktuṃ sasaktūṃ śiṃ pañca kulatthaṃ māṣacūrṇakam ||
analyzed: saktum sa saktūm śim pañca kulattham māṣa cūrṇakam

original: pakvaṃ jambūdvayākhyaṃ ca lākṣācūrṇaṃ tathaiva ca |
analyzed: pakvam jambu dvaya ākhyam ca lākṣā cūrṇam tathā eva ca
udgvyūha aṣṭake ca aṣṭa kumbheṣu paritas nyaset
nava durga āvṛti vyūha madhya kumbheṣu atha ucyate

original: campakaṃ mallikāṃ puṣpaṃ punnāgaṃ ketakī tathā ||
analyzed: campakam mallikām puṣpam punnāgam ketakī tathā
sevantikā droṇapuṣpam padmam nīlotpalam tathā
ca

original: aśokaṃ damanaṃ caiva pāṭaliṃ bakulaṃ tathā |
analyzed: aśokam damanam ca eva pāṭalim bakulam tathā
śveta arkam ca eva rakta arkam bṛhatī vanamallikā
tatas duttūra kusumam nālikera prasūnakam
pūpapuṣpa dvayam ca eva śaṅkhapuṣpa sumam tathā
arjuna ākhya prasūnam ca catvāriṃśat sumam bhavet
madhya kumbheṣu vinyasyet vyūhānām baliḥ āvṛteḥ
candanam ghanasāram ca kapi māṃsī pacorakam
kuṅkumam ca agarum devi rocanā antam atha aṣṭakam

original: p. 77) teṣāṃ ca madhyakumbhānāṃ paritaḥ pṛthagaṣṭasu |
analyzed: teṣām ca madhya kumbhānām paritas pṛthak aṣṭasu
nyaset sarveṣu kumbheṣu tava mūla manum vadan
sarva vyūha stha kumbheṣu dravyam evam mayā īritam
kūrcāni pallavān ca eva nālikera phalāni ca
pṛthak yugma vastrāṇi
ghaṭa ānane ca paritas veṣṭayet vanyaset guruḥ
devatāḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi madhya vyūha ādi śailaje
oṅkāra rūpiṇī viśvā jagat māyā jana priyā
madhya ādi nava kumbheṣu jūṣaṇīya antam arcayet
prāc ādi kālikā vyūha madhya kumbheṣu devatāḥ

original: kālī karālī kalyāṇī kāntidā ca kalāvatī ||

analyzed: devatāḥ ṣoḍaśa etāḥ ca teṣu kumbheṣu pūjayet

original: p. 78) mādhavī māninī manyā mahāmāyā maheśvari |

analyzed: prāk ca vyūha aṣṭa kumbheṣu pṛthak saṃpūjayet guruḥ
dakṣiṇa vyūha kumbheṣu pṛthak aṣṭasu pūjayet
jāhnavī ca janmāyā japyā jaṅghālavīcikā
paścima vyūha kumbhānām madhyasthānām kalādhare
parite aṣṭa ghaṭeṣu eṣu yajet bhaktyā sukha anvitaḥ
gaṅgā gandhavatī gaurī guṇātītā guṇāvatī
go parāga hinī durgā caṇḍike
madhyagānām ca paritas pṛthak aṣṭa sukhā arcayet
prāc ādi saṃpravakṣyāmi ramā rājīva locanā
rājya pradā roga hartrī mahā kośa pradāyakī
dhanya dā dhana dā devī durita ghnī durāpahā
niṣkalaṅkā ahaga utpannā ramā vyūha kāmbake
yajet madhya stha kumbheṣu caturthī antam namaḥ ntikam
pṛthak sva nāmabhiḥ teṣām aṣṭa kumbheṣu devatāḥ
koṣṭha geṣu samabhyarcya śāntā śoka harā umā
śubhadā śaṅkhinī raudrī bhavyā bhadra antam ucyate
dakṣiṇa vyūha jāleṣu madhyagānām sva nāmabhiḥ
pūjayet paritas ca aṣṭa pṛthak kumbheṣu suvrate
paścima vyūha madhyānām koṣṭha gānām punar guruḥ
saṃpūjya paritas ca aṣṭa koṣṭha geṣu pṛthak priye
sukhandyā amara śreṣṭhā śaurya dā ca suvāsinī
madhyagānām udak vyūha pūjayet
evam ramā āvṛti sthānām kumbhānām devatāḥ pṛthak
saṃproktā samyak īrāṇi śārada āvaraṇe yathā
prāc ādi madhyagānām ca vāc pādāḥ vākyanāyakī
sarasvatī ca sarva īśī sāma gāna priyā parā
sthairya dā subhagā saukhyaḥ triṣu saubhāgya dāyinī
dvātriṃśat devatāḥ proktāḥ guṇa ādhāra antam ambike

original: cinmayī citirūpā ca cañcalā bodhinī prabhā ||
analyzed: cit mayī citi rūpā ca cañcalā bodhinī prabhā
candrikā dhāriṇī sūkṣmā devatā aṣṭa mayā īritāḥ
vyūha jāleṣu paritoṣṭa ghaṭeṣu ca
pṛthak sva nāmabhiḥ yaṣṭvā guruḥ
jñāna ātmikā kriyāśaktiḥ icchāśaktiḥ ca niścalā
tad rakṣa stha vyūha jāla madhya gānām kramāt pṛthak
paritas ca aṣṭa kumbheṣu sva nāma ādyaiḥ yajet tatas

original: nandinī nādinī jāyā gāndhārī ca taraṅgiṇī ||
analyzed: nandinī nādinī jāyā gāndhārī ca taraṅgiṇī

original: mālinī dāhinī mānyā madhyagānāṃ ca paścime |
analyzed: mālinī dāhinī mānyā madhyagānām ca paścime
paritas aṣṭasu kumbheṣu pṛthak tam nāmabhiḥ yajet
dhanvī dhīrā matiḥ medhā śuddhā buddhiḥ tapasvinī
ghora antāḥ devatāḥ ca aṣṭau udak vyūha kadambake
madhya gānām ca paritas veṣṭiteṣu prapūjayet
śārada āvaraṇe api evam devatāḥ samyak īritāḥ
durgā kapālinī ca āryā siṃharūḍhā tathā ambikā
cāmuṇḍī sarasā sarvā vaiṣṇavī caṇḍa vikramā
kalyāṇa kāriṇī ramyā pratiṣṭhā ca jita indriyā
nirāmayā nirābhāsā sarva gā sarva gocarā
nārasiṃhī ca vārāhī vāma mārga pradāyinī
pavitrā pāvamānī ca parama aiśvarya bhāvinī
catvāriṃśam imāḥ māye māyā proktā tava anaghe
bahis āvaraṇa vyūha madhya ge ca samarcayet
sanātani sadānandā sāvitrī ca guṇāgraṇīḥ
gagana sthā ca nāka sthā trikūṭa sthā akhila uttamā
bahis āvaraṇa vyūha madhya ghaṭa aṣṭasu
pūrva ādi paritas teṣu yajet tad nāmabhiḥ guruḥ
dakṣiṇe tu atha vakṣyāmi rucirā roga hāriṇī
paritas pūjayet kramāt
mahānāda aṭṭahāsī ca madhurā madhurapriyā
pāśa hastā padma hastā jñāna pustaka dhāriṇī
madhyagānām ca paritas pṛthak aṣṭasu pūjayet
sthāvarā jaṅgama ākhyā ca kalātītā kalā mayā
paritas tad madhya gātām aṣṭa kumbheṣu pūjayet
evam pañca āvṛti stheṣu vyūha kumbheṣu kālike
devatāḥ ca mayā iti uktāḥ prati kumbhe pṛthak kramāt
guruḥ sva sāmpradāyena ndeṃtrikam ca namaḥ ntikam
sva nāmabhiḥ pṛthak pūjya madhya kumbhe gaṇa ādikāḥ atas

original: p. 84) āvāhanādi ṣaṇmudrāṃ yonimudrāṃ ca kālinīm |
analyzed: āvāhana ādi ṣaṇmudrām yonimudrām ca kālinīm

original: dhenumudrāṃ ca liṅgākhyāṃ prasannākhyāṃ pradarśya ca ||
analyzed: dhenumudrām ca liṅga ākhyām prasannā ākhyām pradarśya ca
yajet sapta upapāśān ca prati kumbherī cakṣaṇaḥ
ā divā su ghaṭān sarvān niśāyāma caturthake

original: arghyaṃ gandhaṃ ca puṣpaṃ ca akṣataṃ dhūpameva ca |
analyzed: arghyam gandham ca puṣpam ca akṣatam dhūpam eva ca
dīpaḥ ca iti nivedya antam upacārāḥ ca sapta ca
prātasnāna ādikam kṛtvā sva nityāni samāpya ca
tava ālaye paṇṭape ca nāndī puṇyāha vācanam

original: varaṇaṃ madhuparkaṃ ca nītvā karma dvijaissaha |
analyzed: varaṇam madhuparkam ca nītvā karma dvijaiḥ saha
vedikām paritastheṣu kuṇḍeṣu navasu kramāt
homa karmāṇi kurvīta mūrtipaiḥ pāraga ādibhiḥ
samidh ājya caru vrīhi yavaiḥ dūrvā agrakaiḥ tilaiḥ
tava mūlena mantreṇa vāruṇa astreṇa deśikaḥ
hunet saṅgava kāla antam aṣṭottaraśata āhutiḥ
punar pūrṇāhutim kuryāt saṃpātam yojayet ghaṭe
liṅga śuddhi ādikam kṛtvā nitya pūjām samarpayet

original: p. 85) kumbhastha devatāḥ paścāt prasannārthaṃ yajetparam |
analyzed: kumbha stha devatāḥ paścāt prasanna artham yajet param
punar ṣoḍaśa nāḍī ādau bhūsuraiḥ karma vittamaḥ
chatra cāmara bhūṣā ādyaiḥ bhūmi pādyaiḥ janaiḥ naraḥ
brahmaghoṣaiḥ vādya ravaiḥ vīṇā veṇu ravaiḥ saha
nava kumbhān samuddhṛtya śiṣya skandha upari nyaset
geham pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bahis āvaraṇe tava
praviśet garbhageha anta sthaṇḍila upari vinyaset
vastrāṇi vastramantreṇa tvad liṅge bhrāmayet triśas
phalamantraiḥ tad phalāni vāyubījena pallavān
nava kumbha udakaiḥ siñcet suvarṇa pratimā ādibhiḥ
evam samyak ghaṭān sarvān kālikā āvaraṇa āditas
pūrva ādi madhya kumbhān ca tatas ca aṣṭau samuddharet
snāna maṇṭapam ārabhya liṅga dvāra avasānakam
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ viprāḥ panti rūpeṇa saṃmukhe
vyavasthitāḥ śuciḥ bhūtāḥ vadantaḥ tān manūn dvijāḥ

original: p. 86) sarvapaṅktisthakāḥ sarve ghaṭān sarvān yathākramam |
analyzed: sarva paṅkti sthakāḥ sarve ghaṭān sarvān yathākramam
samuddhṛtya ānayeyuḥ te dāpayeyuḥ gurum prati
taiḥ ghaṭaiḥ saicayet liṅgam sūkta mantrān vadan budhaḥ
punar tu udrikta kumbhān ca tad vastrāṇi phalāni api
vāma paṅktyā nayeyuḥ te maṇṭape vedikā upari
nyastā samūha rūpeṇa kālī sūkta ādikān vadan
ramāsu uktam śārada ākhya ambhasyādi manūn tadā
nava durgāsu ukta mantrān vadeyuḥ vedapāragāḥ
secana ante mahā pūjām vidhāya uktam prakārataḥ
tava utsavam tatas kuryāt mūla bimbe niyojayet
kriyā jālam samarpya ante daśa dānāni tat param
tad ante dakṣiṇām dadyāt bhojayet bhūsura uttamān

original: navaniṣkaṃ ghaṭān sarvān vastrāṇi ca phalānyapi |
analyzed: nava niṣkam ghaṭān sarvān vastrāṇi ca phalāni api
ratnāni pratimān ca eva maṇṭapam sarva bhūṣaṇam
tatra upakaraṇaiḥ sārdham deśika indrāya vallabhe
sva sampatyai sukha arthāya pradadyāt manuja īśvaraḥ

original: p. 87) yajamānāya ṣaṇṇiṣkaṃ brahmaṇe pañca ucyate |
analyzed: yajamānāya ṣaṣ niṣkam brahmaṇe pañcaḥ ucyate

original: niṣkatrayaṃ sadasyāya mūrtipe ca pṛthak dvayam ||
analyzed: niṣka trayam sadasyāya mūrtipe ca pṛthak dvayam
sārdha niṣkam pāragebhyaḥ jāpinām niṣkam ucyate
cārakebhyaḥ sārdha niṣkam tad ante bhūri dakṣiṇām

original: pṛthak pṛthak pradātavyaṃ phalaṃ vakṣyāmi tacchṛṇu |
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak pradātavyam phalam vakṣyāmi tat śṛṇu
tu aliṅge snāna karma iti sa śaktyā manuja adhipaḥ
sarva sampad balam kośam vaṃśa vṛddhi śriyam yaśaḥ
putra pautra prapautrān ca para rāṣṭra jaya ādikam
kṛpayā ananta rājyāni tadā prāpnoti asaṃśayaḥ
viśeṣam atha vakṣyāmi su gopyam sura durlabham
puratas dhikāra artham tvad kaṭākṣa akṣam ambike
tvad liṅge snapana ceti kṛtam śakreṇa bhaktitaḥ
punar deva gaṇena ittham sva pad artham kṛtam priye
daitya somau bhāgya artham kṛtam mātṛ gaṇena ca
sarva saubhāgya sampattyai mahī vṛddhyai jayāya ca
tasmāt vīkṣya iti kurvīta pratyaptam tava liṅgake
iti śrī paramarahasye vātulottare śiva pārvatī saṃvāde
naimittika karmakāṇḍe durgāsahasrakalaśakarmakathanam nāma
trayoviṃśati paṭalaḥ
snāna karma mayā iti uktam nava durgā vidhi kriyām
tava utpati ādi vakṣyāmi pṛthak bheda ādikām kriyām
śakti jāla ātmakam devi koṭi sūrya sama prabhā

original: kālī lakṣmīti vāṇīti tayā mūrtitrayo bhavat ||
analyzed: kālī lakṣmī iti vāṇī iti tayā mūrti trayaḥ bhavat
tasya pāda ādi guhya antā kālikā ākhyā samudbhavā

original: ramā nābhyā galāntā ca kaṇṭhādyā mastakāntakā ||
analyzed: ramā nābhyā gala antā ca kaṇṭha ādyā mastaka antakā
sarasvatī iti sañjātā tuṣṭi puṣṭi prakīrtitā
durgā iti āryā śūlinī iti kumārī ca ambikā abhidhā
mahiṣa asura nāśī ca caṇḍikā iti sarasvatī
vāgīti antaḥ kramāt tābhyām pṛthak dāna samanvitāḥ

original: durgā ca kālikā guhye āryā nābhau samudbhavā ||
analyzed: durgā ca kālikā guhye āryā nābhau samudbhavā
kālī mukhe bhagavatī rāmā pādāt kumārikā
ramā nābhau ca ambikā ākhyā tad mukhe mahiṣāntakī

original: vāṇī kaṇṭhe caṇḍikākhyā jihvāyāṃ ca sarasvatī |
analyzed: vāṇī kaṇṭhe caṇḍikā ākhyā jihvāyām ca sarasvatī
nāsikāyām ca vāgīśī pṛthak etāḥ samudbhavāḥ
tābhyaḥ pṛthak nava utpannāḥ prasannāḥ nāma dhārikāḥ
śailajā caṇḍaghaṇṭī iti sundarī brahmacāriṇī
gaurī iti śivadūtī ākhyā māhendrī ca agni saṃjñakā
vārāhī khaḍga dhārī iti vāruṇī mṛga vāhikā

original: kauberī śūlahastā ca brahmāṇī vaiṣṇavī parā ||
analyzed: kauberī śūla hastā ca brahmāṇī vaiṣṇavī parā
cāmuṇḍa iti śava ārūḍhā jaya iti vijaya iti ca
jitā parā jitā iti ākhyā rocanā iti digambarā
udyotanī iti umā saṃjñā mālādhārī yaśasvinī
daṇḍinī vindhyasaṃsthā iti gahinī iti trilottamā
śaṅkhinī śarabhā iti ākhyā suvratā iti sugandhinī

original: kārmukhā maṅgalā śoṇā hrādinī mohinī kṣamā ||
vajriṇī śaktihastā ca daṇḍahastā ca māninī |
analyzed: vajriṇī śakti hastā ca daṇḍa hastā ca māninī
kāpālinī kāmanī iti bhīmā devī iti bhairavī
iti etāḥ nava durga ākhyāḥ ca ekāśīti samudbhavāḥ
pṛthak kramāḥ samutpannāḥ tābhyāḥ ca ananta śaktayaḥ
tava utpattiḥ iti khyātā caṇḍī bhedaḥ mayā ucyate

original: ekacaṇḍī tricaṇḍīti pañca sapta naveti ca ||
analyzed: ekacaṇḍī tricaṇḍī iti pañca sapta nava iti ca
triṃśat ca ekāśīti saṃjñā śata ākhyā iti sahasrakā
caṇḍikā bhedaḥ iti etāḥ tu ayutāḥ lakṣa saṃjñayā kā
tathā eva daśa lakṣāṇām koṭyā anta ananta caṇḍikā
bhedāḥ ca vividhāḥ jñeyā sampad sānnidhya kārakāḥ
daśa lakṣa ādi koṭyā antāḥ sura loke samīritāḥ
bhū tala itu ayuta anta īśi samyak uktā kriyā saha
eka tri pañca caṇḍyā antāḥ
ekāśīti śata ityākhyā sahasra ākhyā śubha pradāḥ
kāmya karmaṇi saṃproktāḥ vaṃśa vṛddhi pradāyakāḥ
ayuta ākhyā iti lakṣa antā daśa lakṣa abhidhā gaje
caṇḍikā ca eva koṭyāntā saṃproktā japa karmaṇi
eka tri pañca caṇḍyā antāḥ naittike ca mayā īritā
naimittike ca sapta ādi navatriṃśa antakāḥ param
ekāśīti śata ākhyā īśi sahasra ākhyā śubha pradāḥ
kāmyā karmaṇi saṃproktāḥ daitya bādhā nivṛttaye

original: putradārādi vṛddhyarthaṃ prabhutvārthaṃ ca yaḥ pumān |
analyzed: putra dāra ādi vṛddhi artham prabhu tva artham ca yaḥ pumān

original: p. 92) ekacaṇḍī sadā bhaktyā jape naimittikarmaṇi |

analyzed: dhana rājya abhi vṛddhi artham maṇḍale ka artham ambike

original: tricaṇḍi vidhinā nityaṃ pararāja bhayāya ca ||
analyzed: tricaṇḍi vidhinā nityam para rāja bhayāya ca
bhūpa artham sarva bhoga artham pañcacaṇḍī japa kriyām
sapta ākhyām caṇḍi bhūmyā artham śatru nāśāya sampade
akaṇṭaka mahī prāptyai śatru senā kṣayāya ca
sārvabhauma adhikāra artham bala kośa abhivṛddhaye

original: pratyabde ca śaratkāle tathā cānyādine priye |
analyzed: pratyabde ca śarad kāle tathā ca anyā dine priye
vaṃśa vṛddhye ca rājya artham caturaṅga balāya ca
dhana lābhāya sampattyai triṃśaccaṇḍijapa kriyā
kadācid adbhuta utpanne saṅkaṭe viṣama ādike
mahā pāpa vināśa artham vāñchita arthāya kāminī
saṃkhyām apamṛtyu harāya ca
sampad jālāya yaśase puṣṭyai roga harāya ca
rājya sampādana arthāya sarva śatru jayāya ca
gata rājya īpsita arthāya naṣṭa dravyasya siddhaye
subhikṣa arthāya vaśyā artham mahā mṛtyu harāya ca
kāntyai sarva jana iṣṭāya śata caṇḍitriyā śubhā
sahasra ākhyām vāñchita artham ripu senā kṣayāya ca
parama aiśvarya kāṅkṣā artham mahā maṇi gaṇāya ca
bala vṛddhi ādi dāra artham magaṇya dravya siddhaye
rājya durga ādi vṛddhi artham durbhikṣe ripu nāśane
ayuta ākhyām mahā mārī bhaya ādau ripu saṅkaṭe
dvīpa antara gata dravya lābha artham suravandite
paśu jāla samuddhi artham gaja vājī rathāya ca
su ratna jāla siddhi artham kāmita arthāya śaṅkari
caṇḍī ca eva atha lakṣa ākhyam sarpa bādhāsu māraṇe
bhū gata dravya sidhi artham yadi dvīpa stham eva vā

original: sindhusthaṃ parvatasthaṃ ca nadīmadhyagataṃ tu vā |
analyzed: sindhu stham parvata stham ca nadī madhya gatam tu vā
sarva sampad samṛddhi artham bīja karmāṇi sādhayet
caṇḍī japa vidhim kartum dravya lābhe ca māninī

original: p. 94) ekacaṇḍyādi pañcāntaṃ navābdāntaṃ japet priye ||

analyzed: sapta abda antam ca sapta ādi triṃśa antam menakā ātmaje
eka adhikam aśīti ādi sahasra antam japet kriyām
nītvā bhaktyā vakṣyamāṇāḥ vidhinā manu vittamaḥ
yugma aṣṭa antam ca ayuta ākhyam japam kurvīta bhaktitaḥ
lakṣa caṇḍī japam karma vatsarāṇām mayā ucyate
tad ardha antam tri māsa antam yāvat tāvat aya avadhi
caṇḍībheda ādikāḥ ca iti mayā ākhyātāḥ naga udbhave
tava ālaya purobhāge prākāre ca eśakoṇake
catuṣpathe tathā udyāne japa vīthi stha maṇṭape
grāma sīmni nadī tīre rājadhānyām ca parvate
sindhu tīre grāmahāre japa sthānam idam śubham
ekacaṇḍi kriyāḥ prātar tricaṇḍīsaṅgave japet
madhyāhne pañca sapta ākhya japa arcana huta kriyām
navatriṃśam ekāśīti kriyām guruḥ
śata saṅkhyā vidhim rātrau gāna rātrau sahasrakām
ayuta ākhyam madhyarātrau japa homa tava arcanam
lakṣa saṃkhyā kriyām devi vāme kurvīta buddhimān

original: sarvāsāṃ caiva caṇḍīnāṃ karma kartuṃ varānane ||
analyzed: sarvāsām ca eva caṇḍīnām karma kartum varānane
tava yāmaḥ śubhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kṣipram iṣṭa artha dāyakaḥ
tasmāt jñātvā iti deveśi sarva caṇḍi kriyām guruḥ
tvad liṅge tava yāme ca prakuryāt śuddha cetasā
japa arcanam homa karma tarpaṇam bhojanam pṛthak
pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu snigdhe tava sānnidhya hetave
iti śrī vātulottare naimittika karmakāṇḍe śiva pārvatī saṃvāde

original: durgotpattyādi caṇḍī bhedakarma nirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatiḥ
analyzed: durgā utpatti ādi caṇḍī bheda karma nirūpaṇam nāma pañcaviṃśatiḥ
paṭalaḥ

original: atha vakṣyāmyahaṃ devi nitya caṇḍi japakriyām |
analyzed: atha vakṣyāmi aham devi nitya caṇḍi japa kriyām
tvad liṅga agre śāṅkare ca maṇṭapam caturaśrakam
pañca hastam iti kuryāt catu dvāra samanvitam

original: [asmin patre etāvadeva vartate | itaḥ paraṃ alekhaḥ]
analyzed: asmin patre etāvat eva vartate itas param alekhaḥ
caṇḍī bhedāḥ kriyāḥ ca astaḥ samyak uktāḥ mayā agaje
sampad rājya jaya arthāya nava durgā vidhim śṛṇu
karma ārambha dināt pūrva pakṣe ca eva prabhu uttamaḥ
tava aṅge śāṅkare bhāge nava hastaiḥ ca maṇṭapam
caturaśra samāyuktam dikṣu dvāra upaśobhitam
pañca tri bhūma bhitti ādi vātāyana yutam priye
darpaṇa udara saṃkāśam tad agre kalaśa anvitam
vedikām caturaśrakām
tad madhyame prakurvīta paritas kuṇḍa karma ca
caturaśrāṇi vṛttāni diś vidikṣu vicakṣaṇaḥ
śiva indrayoḥ pradhāna ākhyam vṛtta kuṇḍam sureśvari
vidhinā nava kuṇḍāni yoninā abhiyutāni ca
kuṇḍa sadmāni sadma antar mekhalā tritayāni ca
kuṇḍa mānāni khātāni bhūṣaṇāni purā ukta vat
dravya jālāni sarva dravyāṇi suvrate

original: sampādya bahudhā bhaktyā saṃśodhya kṣālitāni ca |
analyzed: sampādya bahudhā bhaktyā saṃśodhya kṣālitāni ca
śubha sthale nyaset tāni tad mūla manunā guruḥ
devī ālayam alaṃkṛtya tatas karma samārabhet
āśvayujyām site pakṣe navamyā antam manūttamaḥ
pratipad prātar utthāya snātvā nadyām dvijaiḥ saha
śuddha ātmānaḥ cāraka ādyāḥ tad ādau gomaya udakaiḥ

original: lepanaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ kuryuḥ tava gehaṃ nagātmaje |
analyzed: lepanam prokṣaṇam kuryuḥ tava geham naga ātmaje
samyak saṃśodhya mūlena vāruṇa astreṇa haṃsahe
raṅga vālyai rañjayitvā tava agre maṇṭapa ādike
rajobhiḥ pañcabhiḥ tatra pūrayet kamalāni ca
sva nitya ādi sa mālya ante guru ādyāḥ te dvijottamaḥ
vapayeyuḥ ca mūlena kṣura mantreṇa sundari
sunadyām ca eva loṣṭa ādyaiḥ sa celam snānam ācaret
tantra iva ācamya saṃjapya svarṇa raupya ādikam ghaṭam
jayet
ratha yāna ādike nyastvā veda ghoṣaiḥ dvijaiḥ saha
sarva vādya ravaiḥ nāṭyaiḥ tava geham praviśya ca
nadī toyam ca vardhinyām yojayet manu vittamaḥ
pūjayet prārthayet devīm vakṣyamāṇa vidhānataḥ
śakti jāla ātmakam devi namaḥ te bhoga dāyakī
navadurgā kriyām kartum anujñām dehi caṇḍike
iti saṃprārthya sat bhaktyā tava agre yogamaṇṭape
maṇḍalāni likhet pūrvam sampūjya gaṇanāyakam
guruḥ nāndī ādikam gavyam puṇyāham vacayet param
deśikam varayet ādau dhanadam brahma saṃjñakam
homa artham aṣṭamūrti īśān veda artham ṣoḍaśa dvijān
viṃśat dvijān japa arthāya nava sūkta prajāpakān
tarpaṇa artham ca eka vipram rudra saṃkhyān ca secakān

original: trīn viprān cārakārthaṃ ca tanmūlamanunā kramāt |
analyzed: trīn viprān cāraka artham ca tad mūla manunā kramāt

original: madhuparkaṃ ca kṛcchraṃ ca datvā mūlena kautukam ||
analyzed: madhuparkam ca kṛcchram ca da tvā mūlena kautukam
badhnīyāt mūlabera ādi rakṣā mantreṇa śāṅkarī
vidhinā mṛdam ānīya nyastvā tad bīja maṇṭape
ketum mantreṇa yaṣṭvā atha phala ādyaiḥ ca nivedayet
yāga bhūmim samāsādya brahmaṇā dhanada ādikaiḥ
puṇyāham vācya tad mantraiḥ kuryāt maṇṭapa saṃskṛtam

original: sthānaśuddhiṃ ca bimbākhyaṃ hutvā tanmaṇṭape guruḥ ||
analyzed: sthāna śuddhim ca bimba ākhyam hutvā tad maṇṭape guruḥ
vedikā pūrva bhāga ādi dvāra kumbha ādikāḥ nyaset
koṇa ākhyam gaṇḍakāḥ devi vidyeśyā ākhya ghaṭa aṣṭakam
dvāra deśeṣu koṇeṣu dvāra kumbha samīpa ge
vedikāyām ca aṣṭa dikṣu madhya deśe ca madhyame
kamalāni likhet teṣu cakram aṣṭa dalāni ca
śaṅkham āvarta padmāni trikoṇam vartulam tathā
yathākrameṇa saṃlekhya pūrayet śāli taṇḍulaiḥ
pṛthak prastha mitam dhānyam tad ardham taṇḍulam tilam
tasya ardham ca eva saṃpūrya yajet tad mūlamantrataḥ
tantunā veṣṭita ghaṭān vinyaset taṇḍula upari
gandha udakaiḥ candana ādyaiḥ payobhiḥ ca hima udakaiḥ
kaṣāyaiḥ madhunā pūrya mūla kumbham tu sarpiṣā
pūrayitvā kramāt devīm mātṛkābhiḥ vila uttamaḥ
maṇīcakam ca mūlena kramukāni nyaset punar
kūrca ādi navaratnāni pallavān ca phalāni ca
nikṣipya mūlamantreṇa suvarṇam pratimāḥ tatas
niṣkam niṣka ardha mānena kartavyāḥ pratimāḥ śubhāḥ
dukūlam tantu jam vā api śveta pīta ādi bhedataḥ
nava vastre saptabhiḥ vā kumbha vastra mitam priye
tena eva ācchādya kalaśān procyante devatā pṛthak
prāc ādi gaṅgā yamunām yajet godāvarīm guruḥ

original: sarasvatīṃ nirmadāṃ ca sinduṃ kāverikāṃ tataḥ |
analyzed: sarasvatīm nirmadām ca sindum kāverikām tatas
tāmraparṇīm kramāt dvārā kumbheṣu āvāhya pūjayet

original: kāntidāṃ karuṇāṃ bālāṃ kalyāṇīṃ kogeśū ca |
analyzed: kānti dām karuṇām bālām kalyāṇīm kogeśū ca

original: gāndhārīṃ gāṇi durgāṃ ca gāyatrīṃ gānahāyakīm ||
analyzed: gāndhārīm gāṇi durgām ca gāyatrīm gānahāyakīm
gaḍḍuka ākhya ghaṭeṣu etāḥ pṛthak tam nāmabhiḥ saha

original: vāgīśīṃ vasudāṃ(dhāṃ) vegāṃ vārāhīṃ ca tataḥ punaḥ |
analyzed: vāgīśīm vasudāṃdhām vegām vārāhīm ca tatas punar
vedikāṣu aṣṭa ghaṭeṣu aṣṭa vidyeśīḥ arcayet punar

original: ghaṭatraye ca mūlena kālīṃ lakṣmīṃ sarasvatīm |
analyzed: ghaṭa traye ca mūlena kālīm lakṣmīm sarasvatīm

original: yāgakumbhe ca yāgeśīṃ mūladurgāṃ ca taṭghaṭe ||
analyzed: yāga kumbhe ca yāgeśīm mūladurgām ca taṭ ghaṭe
āvāhana ādi saṃskāraiḥ upacāraiḥ ca pañcabhiḥ
kumbha traya puras bhāge svarṇa raupya ādi pittalaiḥ
pala traya mite nālau yantram kurvīta bhaktitaḥ
likhet aṣṭadalam tatra pūrayet śāli taṇḍulaiḥ
nava akṣaram likhet yantre svara yuktaḥ prakārataḥ
manunā yaṣṭvā nyaset tad maṇḍala upari
yajet prāc ukta mārgeṇa vedikā paritas tu adhas
navārṇa sāmpradāya jñāḥ ca upaviśya pṛthak janaḥ
argala ādi rahasya antām nava akṣaryā samanvitām
japeyuḥ te saptaśatim tri vāram saṃpuṭa anvitān
brahmāstram śaṅkare koṇe vahnau vahnyastram ucyate
daitya koṇe ca cakra astram māruta astram tathā anile
pradhāna kuṇḍa sāmīpye yāga mantra japet vijaḥ

original: p. 102) devīsūktaṃ ca tadrakṣe navavāraṃ japet param ||
analyzed: devī sūktam ca tad rakṣe nava vāram japet param
tarpayet saumya digbhāge daśa aṃśam ca payaḥ ambubhiḥ
catu dvāre catur vedān vadeyuḥ ca aṣṭa bhūsurāḥ
tava gehe catur dikṣu tathā eva aṣṭa praghoṣakāḥ
paritas prāṅkaṇe devi nava durgā prajāpakāḥ
vināyaka manum dakṣe kālī sūktam rama ātmakam
gosūktam śārada ākhyam ca durga sūktam japet param
sūktam pratyaṅgira ākhyam ca śānti durga ākhyam ucyate
pṛthak sahasram prajapet yāvat homa avasānakam
secakān secanam kuryuḥ tava liṅgam sudhā rasaiḥ
payaḥ mbubhiḥ ca tad mantraiḥ homa karma samārabhet
śodhayet nava kuṇḍāni vīkṣaṇa ādi prabhedataḥ
prāgāmi paritastheṣu kuṇḍeṣu navasu kramāt
mūrtipādi gurun yaṣṭvā brahmāṇam ca vasu pradam
kuṇḍa ādi devatāḥ sarvāḥ vakṣyāmāṇa vidhānataḥ
gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ yaṣṭvā pṛthak tāsām ca nāmabhiḥ
vāmadevī vajriṇī iti vaṃśa dā bala vṛddhi dā
mahāmāyā iti saṃproktāḥ kuṇḍānām devatāḥ imāḥ
pṛthak āvāhya saṃpūjya pratikuṇḍe dhana pradaḥ
kṣitimūrtim pūrva kuṇḍe agni ākhyām agni gocare
dakṣiṇe yajñamūrtim ca sūrya ākhyām daitya kuṇḍake
vāruṇyām jalamūrtim ca mārutākhyām atha anile
soma ākhyām saumya deśa sthe vyoma saṃjñām ca śaṅkare
kuṇḍeṣu aṣṭasu saṃpūjya pradhāne mūla saṃjñakām
uṣā ādi mūrtipān devi dvijeṣu aṣṭasu pūjayet
vijayā janayet agnim jvālā kāṣṭha ādi bhedataḥ
pradhāna kuṇḍa yonau ca nyastvā saṃskāram ācaret
kuṇḍa madhye nyaset agnim garbhādhāna ādi ṣoḍaśa
kriyāḥ kuryāt yathānyāyam mūrtikuṇḍa aṣṭasu kramāt
tad agnim sarva kuṇḍeṣu viharet ca mukha kriyāḥ

original: gururādau svakuṇḍe ca samidājya caruṃ priye |
analyzed: guruḥ ādau sva kuṇḍe ca samidh ājya carum priye

original: p. 104) sarṣapaṃ caiva godhūmaṃ tilaṃ ca tuṭikaṃ tataḥ |
analyzed: sarṣapam ca eva godhūmam tilam ca tuṭikam tatas

original: jātīphalaṃ ca durvāgraṃ pāyasānnaṃ daśa kramāt |
analyzed: jātīphalam ca durvā agram pāyasa annam daśa kramāt
kālikā ādiḥ tribhiḥ mantraiḥ samidh ājya carūn hunet
mūlena ca nava annena ṣaṣ dravyam sarṣapa ādikam
sarva dravyāṇi durgāṇi yāminyām anuvittamaḥ
homayeyuḥ mūrtipāḥ te pṛthak kuṇḍa aṣṭake punar
śata āhutiḥ kālikāyāḥ ramāyāḥ dviśata āhutiḥ
tri śatāḥ ca sarasvatyāḥ mūlamantra āhutiḥ tatas
sahasra ardhāḥ ca saṃproktāḥ nava akṣaryā sahasrakāḥ
durgā mantreṇa sarveṣu kuṇḍeṣu navaja pṛthak
sahasrāhuti saṃkhyātāḥ pratikuṇḍe naga udbhave
pūrṇāhutiḥ ca homa ante hutvā kuṇḍa balim haret

original: mekhalāyāḥ pṛthak kuṇḍapūrve ca haviṣā param |
analyzed: mekhalāyāḥ pṛthak kuṇḍa pūrve ca haviṣā param
nava piṇḍān prakurvīta guru kuṇḍāt yathā kramam

original: nyastvā piṇḍe parisnigdhe kāṣṭhadīpān prabodhya ca |
analyzed: nyastvā piṇḍe parisnigdhe kāṣṭha dīpān prabodhya ca
homa karma samākhyātā vedi kumbhān yajet guruḥ
tatas navākṣarīyantram yaṣṭvā sacā atam arcayet
vedikā adhas ca paritas kamalāni likhet bhuvi

original: pṛthak prasthamitaṃ dhānyaṃ tadardhaṃ taṇḍulaṃ tilam |
analyzed: pṛthak prastha mitam dhānyam tad ardham taṇḍulam tilam
saṃpūrya aṣṭa ghaṭān paścāt diś vidikṣu nyaset tatas
pradhāna kuṇḍa sāmīpye ghaṭam vāgīśi saṃjñakam
pūrayet gandha toyena pallavān ca phalāni ca
ratnam antar suvarṇena pratimāpaṇa mānataḥ
pṛthak pṛthak parinyastvā vastram ācchādya pūjayet
durgā kumbham samādāya ā veda maṅgala nisvanaiḥ
mūrtipādi dvijaiḥ sārdham prākāre ca tava ālayam
pradakṣiṇa vaśāt mantrī ghaṭam antar praveśayet
liṅgam saṃpūjya mūlena durgā kumbha udakena ca
tasyāḥ sūktena saṃsiñcet yathāvidhi purassaram
mahā pūjā prakartavyā mātṛkā nyāsa pūrvakam

original: p. 106) ṣoḍhā nyāsādi sarvāṇi pūjākāle samācaret ||
analyzed: ṣoḍhā nyāsa ādi sarvāṇi pūjā kāle samācaret
tribhiḥ mantraiḥ kālikā ādyaiḥ kālīm lakṣmīm sarasvatīm
dinadurgām samāvāhya ṣaṇmudrām darśayet guruḥ

original: tāsāṃ ca nāmabhiḥ paścāt sahasraiśca pṛthak param |
analyzed: tāsām ca nāmabhiḥ paścāt sahasraiḥ ca pṛthak param
pūjām prāc ukta mārgeṇa vidhāya vidhivat guruḥ
naivedyam dhūpa dīpābhyām mūlena ca nivedayet
samidh ājya carūn hutvā mūlena aṣṭa uttara āhutiḥ
tava agra stham ca naivedyam visarjya vidhivat tatas
dadyāt mūlena tāmbūlam dīpa oghān bhrāmayet punar

original: vāhanaṃ ca dhvajaṃ yaṣṭvā parivārān samarcayet |
analyzed: vāhanam ca dhvajam yaṣṭvā parivārān samarcayet
bhūtān āhūya ghaṇṭā ādyaiḥ balim dadyāt atho guruḥ
tad ante ca utsavam kuryāt yathā vibhava vistaram
padma dīpaiḥ paribhrāmya devīm antar praveśayet
prasanna arghyam ca da tvā yus candra dīpam pradarśayet
karmam śālam ca arpayitvā bhūsurān bhojayet prabhuḥ
śuddha ātmānaḥ ca tat sāyam deśika ādyāḥ dvijottamāḥ

original: p. 107) devīṃ pañcopacārādyaiḥ bhaktyā saṃpūjya lālase ||
analyzed: devīm pañca upacāra ādyaiḥ bhaktyā saṃpūjya lālase
liṅgasya īśāna digbhāge prāṅkaṇe dvijamaṇṭape
saṃśodhya vidhivat tatra tasmin nava padam likhet

original: śāliṃ ca taṇḍulaṃ pūrya prasthaṃ prasthārdhameva ca |
analyzed: śālim ca taṇḍulam pūrya prastham prastha ardham eva ca
tava bījena arcayitvā tripade ca tripālikāḥ
nyasyet śarāvāḥ ca pada traye
saṃpūjya gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ navabījāni caṇḍike

original: śāliṃ ca sarṣapaṃ śimbaṃ māṣaṃ mudgaṃ yavaṃ tilam |
analyzed: śālim ca sarṣapam śimbam māṣam mudgam yavam tilam
niṣpāvam ca kulattha antam salila āplāvitāni ca
sudhā bījena payasā secayitvā atha nirvaset
navadevi samāvāhya somam saṃpūjayet param
pañca vādya khaiḥ sārdham dhūpa dīpau pradarśayet
nivedayet sudhā mantraiḥ pṛthak mūlena māninī
soma kumbham ca payasā saṃpūrya atha vidhāna vid
bīja karma samāpya ante garbha geham praveśayet
siñcet pañcāmṛtaiḥ liṅgam śrīsūktena payaḥ dakaiḥ
devīsūktena durgāyāḥ sūktena ca śubha udakaiḥ
tvarita ākhyena sūktena niśā sūktena mātrikaḥ
secana ante mahā pūjām guruḥ āsana pūrvakam

original: kālīṃ ramāṃ śāradāṃ ca pṛthak mūlena saṃjayet |
analyzed: kālīm ramām śāradām ca pṛthak mūlena saṃjayet

original: mūladurgāṃ dineśīṃ ca ḍāmare ca yatheritam ||
analyzed: mūladurgām dineśīm ca ḍāmare ca yathā īritam
tad kalpa ukta prakāreṇa pūjā karma samācaret
nāmabhiḥ pūjayet paścāt sāhasraiḥ kālikā ādikāḥ
durgā nāma sahasra etām dinadevīm yajet param

original: śālyānnaṃ saghṛtaṃ bhakṣaṃ pāyasaṃ ca payodadhi ||
analyzed: śālyānnam sa ghṛtam bhakṣam pāyasam ca payaḥ dadhi

original: citrāntaṃ kusumānnaṃ ca mūlenāgre nyaset kramāt ||
analyzed: citra antam kusuma annam ca mūlena agre nyaset kramāt
phalāni pañcajālāni nava mantreṇa nāyakī
nivedayet atha ambāya dhūpa dīpa ādi deśikaḥ
raṅga pūjā prakartavyā tava tṛpti pradāyakī

original: p. 109) dhvajāntaṃ gopurāntaṃ vā yathāvidhi vidhānavit ||
analyzed: dhvaja antam gopura antam vā yathāvidhi vidhāna vid
tathā u naivedyam udvāsya tāmbūlāni arpayet tatas
dīpa oghān bhrāmayet paścāt hima antam giri saṃbhave
mantra āśiṣā dadyāt akṣatān ca niśāmayān
tava agre vā atha paritas prāṅkaṇa antar manu uttamaḥ
suvāsinī dampatīḥ ca kanyakāḥ śata saṃkhyakāḥ
abhyaṅga udvartana ādyaiḥ ca toṣaye strī jana ādikān
pūjayet dhūpa dīpa antam tatas vastrāṇi dāpayet
nava vastre saptabhiḥ vā dāna vastram idam priye
śveta pīta ādi vastrāṇi kambukāni tathā eva ca
dukūla ādīni vastrāṇi nava tantu udbhavāni ca
saṃśodhya prokṣayet tāni prājāpatya ādi mantrakaiḥ
gandha puṣpa ādikaiḥ arcya tava mūlam samuccaran
dāna karma tatas kuryāt indra ādi īśa avadhi kramāt

original: diksthānāṃ ca śvetavastraṃ kañcukāni tathaiva ca ||
analyzed: diksthānām ca śveta vastram kañcukāni tathā eva ca
kālī mantram vadan bhaktyā koṇa pārśva gayoḥ tatas

original: p. 110) kañcukaṃ pītavastraṃ ca ramāmantraṃ samuccaran ||
analyzed: kañcukam pīta vastram ca ramā mantram samuccaran
rakta vastram pradātavyam antarāle pṛthak tayoḥ
citra vastram kañcuka ādi śāradā mūlam uccaran
tṛpti artham mūladurgāyāḥ mithuna arcā tatas param
yathā vitta anusāreṇa da tvā pūjām vidhāya ca
durgā ādi dinadevīḥ ca navamyā antam kramāt pṛthak

original: ekaikottaravṛddhyā tā yaṣṭvā vastraṃ tathā guruḥ ||
analyzed: ekaika uttara vṛddhyā tāḥ yaṣṭvā vastram tathā guruḥ
kañcukam kaṇṭha sūtrāṇi pradadyāt nūpura ādikam
devatā varṇa vastrāṇi kañcukāni tathā eva ca
dampatīḥ kanyakāḥ ca eva bhojayeḥ trī kudambakān
bījam ketum vāhanam ca parivārān yajet atha
jaya ghaṇṭā ādikaiḥ nādaiḥ pañca vādya ravaiḥ saha
bali devīḥ samāhūya tad tad dravya samanvitaḥ
dvāra ādi bali pīṭha antam dikpālānām ca
śāstā ādi bali devīnām dhvaja antam dāpayet balim
pālika antam pṛthak da tvā sva nāma ādyaiḥ guru uttamaḥ

original: p. 111) tadante cotsavaṃ kuryāt bahudhā vibhavādikaiḥ ||
analyzed: tad ante ca utsavam kuryāt bahudhā vibhava ādikaiḥ
sabhā pūjām vidhāya atha baliberam ca bhaktitaḥ
praviśya prāṅkaṇam paścāt pradakṣiṇa vaśāt priye
garbha geham nayet bimbam nyastvā liṅgaḥ tu dakṣiṇe
liṅge saṃyojya caitanyam himadīpam pradarśayet
namaḥ te jagat ādhāre namaḥ te loka pāvane
pratipad karma jālāni gṛhāṇa parameśvari
prārthayitvā iti sat bhaktyā kṛtam karma samarpayet
deśika ādi janāḥ sarve vīṇā veṇu khādikaiḥ
veda ghoṣa ādikaiḥ śaṅkhaiḥ vividhaiḥ vādya nissvanaiḥ
purāṇa śravaṇaiḥ bhaktyā vandi māgadha pāṭhakaiḥ
bhaktyā ādyā nartakaiḥ hāsakaiḥ saha
dvāra kumbha ādikān sarvān guru kuṇḍa stha pāvakam
vedi madhya gatam yantram bīja vāpam taraṅgiṇīm
navamyā antam ca saṃrakṣya japa pārāyaṇa ādikam
homa kriyām vedika stha ghaṭa arcām yantra pūjanam

original: p. 112) sūktādi secanaṃ karma pṛthak kalpoktapūjanam ||
analyzed: sūkta ādi secanam karma pṛthak kalpa ukta pūjanam

original: vastradānaṃ cotsavaṃ ca sabhāpūjāṃ ca bhojanam |
analyzed: vastra dānam ca utsavam ca sabhā pūjām ca bhojanam
navamī antam kramāt evam sarvam karma kudambakam
prakurvīta jagat māye viśeṣam adhunā ucyate

original: dvitīyāyāṃ tithau prātaḥ snātvā karma dvijaissaha ||
analyzed: dvitīyāyām tithau prātar snātvā karma dvijaiḥ saha
tava ālayam praviśya atha puṇyāham vācya bhaktitaḥ
liṅgam yantram ca saṃsecya prokṣya durgā ādi sūktakaiḥ
pūjām pañca upacāra ādyaiḥ vidhāya vidhivattamaḥ
pūrva ghasra arcitām durgām tad mūla manunāt tatas

original: svadehe ca samāropya kālīṃ lakṣmīṃ sarasvatīm |
analyzed: sva dehe ca samāropya kālīm lakṣmīm sarasvatīm

original: āryāmūlena tāṃ devīṃ liṅge yantre ca tatparam ||
analyzed: āryā mūlena tām devīm liṅge yantre ca tad param
yaṣṭvā bījam niśā toyaiḥ ūkṣṇam kārayet tatas
homam prāk ukta vat mantrī āryā mūlena tatparam
kumbhāni antam yajet paścāt saṃpāta ājyam samarpya ca
homa karma samarpya āryaḥ āryā kumbham samuddharet

original: p. 113) gehaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ghaṭamantaḥ praveśya ca ||
analyzed: geham pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ghaṭam antar praveśya ca
āryāsu uktena saṃsecya śeṣam pūrva ukta mārgataḥ
tad rātrau te vaśu uddha ātmā kālikā ādyaḥ ca devatāḥ
kalpa ukta vat yajet tāḥ ca tathā ācāryām samarcayet
śeṣam pūrva ukta vat kuryāt karma jāla arpaṇam tatas
namaḥ tubhyam sadānande jagat āhlāda kāriṇī
dvitīyā karma jālāni gṛhāṇa suravandite
tri vāram iti saṃprārthya kṛtam karma samarpayet
tṛtīyā prātar utthāya snātvā vipra uttamaiḥ saha

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācya garbhāntaṃ liṅgaṃ secya vidhānataḥ |
analyzed: puṇyāham vācya garbha antam liṅgam secya vidhānataḥ
yantram ca vedikā madhya stham prokṣya pañca upacārakaiḥ
saṃpūjya mūlamantreṇa prāgāryā svayam ātmani
saṃyojya śūlinīm tatra samāvāhya yajet guruḥ
sevana ādi kriyā jālam homa karma avasānakam
huta śeṣam samarpya atha śūlinī ghaṭam uddharan
liṅgam prāc ukta mārgeṇa secayitvā samarcayet
kṛta karmāṇi tad rātrau prārthana ādi maheśvari
namaḥ tubhyam kalādhāre maṅgale maṅgala prade
tṛtīyāyām kṛtam karma gṛhāṇa idam sureśvari
bahudhā prārthayitvā iti kriyā jālam samarpayet
bherī paṭaha śaṅkha ādyaiḥ vinidrām ācayet tatas

original: caturthe'hniguru prātaḥ snātvā nityaṃ nivartya ca |
analyzed: caturthe ahni guru prātar snātvā nityam nivartya ca
etat eva iti mantreṇa puṇyāham yāga sadmani

original: liṅgagehe ca saṃvācya yantraliṅgaṃ samarcya ca |
analyzed: liṅga gehe ca saṃvācya yantra liṅgam samarcya ca
śūlinīm yojayet ehe kumārīm arcayet tadā
bījāni gandha toyena secayitvā vidhānataḥ
vidhāya homa karmāntam kumārī kumbham uddharet
praveśya garbha geha antar kumārī sūktam uccaran
siñcet liṅgam śanais bhaktyā śeṣam prāk ukta vat priye
devīm saṃprārthya mūlena vakṣyamāṇena māninī
bhadrakālī namaḥ te astu mahā bhaya vināśinī

original: gṛhāṇedaṃ kāmyakarma caturthyāṃ ca mayā kṛtam |
analyzed: gṛhāṇa idam kāmya karma caturthyām ca mayā kṛtam
vinidrā karma kartavyam pañcamyām prātar utthitaḥ
snātvā liṅgam yajet yantram upacāraiḥ ca pañcabhiḥ
kumārīm hṛdi saṃyujya mūlena āvāhya ca ambikām
sarvam karma atha homa antam ambikā ghaṭa secanam

original: bījaṃ payodakaiḥ secyaṃ rātrau karma samarpaṇam ||
analyzed: bījam payaḥ udakaiḥ secyam rātrau karma samarpaṇam
sugandhīni namaḥ tubhyam sampad jāla pradāyikī
pañcamyām āmbake karma gṛhāṇa idam tilottame
iti prārthya mahādevīm paścāt jāgaraṇam nayet
ṣaṣṭyām prātar samutthāya su snātvā bhūsuraiḥ saha
pavamāna ādi mantreṇa prokṣayet paritas tatas
saṃprokṣya yantra liṅgam ca siñcet pañca upacārakaiḥ
yaṣṭvā ambikām ca mūlena hṛdi saṃyojayet guruḥ

original: mahiṣaghniṃ samāvāhya liṅge yantre ca tāṃ yajet ||
analyzed: mahiṣaghnim samāvāhya liṅge yantre ca tām yajet
jala udakena bījāni secayitvā kriyāḥ param
homa karma samāpya āryaḥ prāc ukta vidhinā agaje
mahiṣa agnī ghaṭena atha tad sūktena eva secayet
tuṣṭi artham prārthayet devīm vaṃśa vṛddhi pradāyakīm
mahiṣa ghnī namaḥ tubhyam kāmita artha pradāyinī

original: mayā ṣaṣṭyāṃ kṛtaṃ karma gṛhāṇa surapūjite |
analyzed: mayā ṣaṣṭyām kṛtam karma gṛhāṇa sura pūjite
iti arcayet kriyā jālām arcayet mūlamantrataḥ
tatas nidrām nivārya aiśi saptamī prātar utthitaḥ
snāna ādīni sva nityāni samāpya vidhinā tatas
puṇyāha salilaiḥ ādau guruḥ liṅga ālaya ādike

original: yāgabhūmau ca sarvatra prokṣya mūlājanā varam |
analyzed: yāga bhūmau ca sarvatra prokṣya mūlājanāḥ varam
yantram liṅgān ca kumbhān ca saptabhiḥ ca upacārakaiḥ

original: yaṣṭvā tā mahiṣaghnīṃ ca hṛdi saṃyojya mūlataḥ ||
analyzed: yaṣṭvā tāḥ mahiṣa ghnīm ca hṛdi saṃyojya mūlataḥ

original: mūlena liṅge yantre ca punarāvāhya caṇḍikām |
analyzed: mūlena liṅge yantre ca punar āvāhya caṇḍikām
niśi pūjām arcayitvā tuṣṭi artham prārthayet tadā
namaḥ te giri saṃbhūte sarva śatru bhayaṅkarī
saptamyām kṛta karma ogham gṛhāṇa āśu dhana prade
iti kriyāḥ samarpya ante bodhayeyuḥ mahājanāḥ
tathā aṣṭamī prabhāte ca guruḥ utthāya bhaktitaḥ
cāra kāka ādyaiḥ dijaḥ sārdham snātvā nityakriyām nayet

original: puṇyāhaṃ manunā vācya liṅgaṃ yantraṃ ca secayet |
analyzed: puṇyāham manunā vācya liṅgam yantram ca secayet
navāḥ tena yajet sapta upacārakaiḥ
caṇḍikām hṛdi saṃyojya mūlamantreṇa māninī
sarasvatīm samāvāhya manunā liṅga yantrayoḥ
bījāni secayet ante homa karma ukta vat punar
maṇṭapa stha ghaṭān yantram śāradā kumbham eva ca
yaṣṭvā tad kumbham ādāya sarva ghoṣaiḥ dvijaiḥ saha
punar praveśya garbha antar tad sūktena manuttamaḥ
siñcet prāk ukta vat pūjām vidhāya manunā apriye
prārthanā ādi arpaṇam paścāt śāradāmanunā tatas
kalāvati namaḥ tubhyam akāra ādi akṣara ātmike
dina aṣṭake kṛtam karma gṛhāṇa sura nāyaki

original: p. 118) iti tvāṃ prārthya sadbhaktyā kriyāssarvāssamarpayet ||
analyzed: iti tvām prārthya sat bhaktyā kriyāḥ sarvāḥ samarpayet
nidrām ninati hāsa ādyaiḥ navamyām prātar utthitaḥ
snānam vidhāya nityāni nivartayet

original: punarnāndīṃ ca gavyaṃ ca gehe bimbe ca maṇṭape |
analyzed: punar nāndīm ca gavyam ca gehe bimbe ca maṇṭape

original: pṛthak puṇyāha toyena prokṣya tanmunā guruḥ ||
analyzed: pṛthak puṇya aha toyena prokṣya guruḥ
śāradām hṛdi yojya atha vāgīśīm arcayet punar
bīja aṅkurāṇi sampūjya sudhā bījena tat param
homam pūrva ukta vat kuryuḥ prati kuṇḍe ca bhūsurāḥ

original: pratiślokaiḥ pradhānākhye pāyasaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ tilam |
analyzed: pratiślokaiḥ pradhāna ākhye pāyasam ca ghṛtam tilam
yathā uktam ḍāmare tantre sarva tantra uttama uttamam
argala ādyaiḥ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ saptaśatyā punar guruḥ
juhuyāt āhutiḥ sarvā su vastram kañcukam punar
tatas pūrṇāhutim paścāt nava kuṇḍeṣu suvrate
samāpya homa karmāṇi saṃpāta ājya sureśvari

original: kumbhe yantre ca liṅge ca samarcyātha pṛthagyajet |
analyzed: kumbhe yantre ca liṅge ca samarcya atha pṛthak yajet
yātrā artham pūrṇa yāga artham pūrayet kalaśa dvayam
prāk ghaṭa udakam ādāya vedi madhye ghaṭa anvitā
pṛthak tad mūlamantreṇa

original: tatkumbhaṃ caiśabhāge ca nyastvā yaṣṭvā janā param |
analyzed: tad kumbham ca aiśa bhāge ca nyastvā yaṣṭvā param
dvāra gaḍḍuka koṇa sthān ghaṭān guruḥ
sudhā bījena mūlena pūrayet kuṅkuma udakaiḥ
brahmaghoṣa ādikaiḥ ghoṣaiḥ vāgīśa ākhya ghaṭam dvijaḥ
deśika ādi samādāya praviśet garbhamandiram
vāgīśī sūkta mantreṇa liṅgam saṃsicya bhaktitaḥ

original: pūjāṃ baliṃ cotsavaṃ ca bhojanaṃ pūrvavaccaret |
analyzed: pūjām balim ca utsavam ca bhojanam pūrvavat caret
tad kṣapāyām ca su snātvā liṅga śuddhim vidhāya ca
secaye vividhaiḥ sūktaiḥ nāma pūjā ādibhiḥ param
mahākālī ādi devīḥ ca yathākalpam yajet guruḥ
naivedyam ukta vat devyāḥ kusumāni niśā kṣatān
samarcya mūlamantreṇa vastra dānam atas param
bhojayet vipra mukhyān ca kanyakāḥ ca suvāsinīm
dampatī bhojayitvā ante bali dānāt yathotsavam

original: tavāgre kaṭakaṃ nyastvā yaṣṭvā mūlena śaṅkari ||
analyzed: tava agre kaṭakam nyastvā yaṣṭvā mūlena śaṅkari

original: rocanaṃ kuṅkumaṃ gandhaṃ niśācūrṇaṃ ghanaṃ guruḥ |

analyzed: tava agra sthe ca kaṭake lolayet ca śubha udakaiḥ
pūjayet prārthayet bhaktyā cūrṇam mūlena mantra vid
nava rātra vrata sthānām saṃpūrṇa phala dāyikī
nava durgā ātmake devi namaḥ tubhyam śubha prade
cūrṇa utsavam kariṣyāmi gṛhāṇa suravandite
iti saṃprārthya saṃjapya cūrṇa toyam manūttamaḥ

original: mūlaliṅgaṃ ca bimbaughaṃ pālake vāhanaṃ dhvajam ||
analyzed: mūlaliṅgam ca bimba ogham pālake vāhanam dhvajam
digīśān mātaraḥ ca eva balideviḥ ca tatparam
kṣetreśīm aṅkuram devi parivāra amarān pṛthak
dvāra kumbha ādikān sarvān tat yantram kuṇḍa devatāḥ

original: pṛthak saṃprokṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sabhābimbaṃ punarguruḥ ||
analyzed: pṛthak saṃprokṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sabhā bimbam punar guruḥ

original: tadbimbamanunā prokṣya svakaṃ dehaṃ tataḥ param |
analyzed: tad bimba manunā prokṣya svakam deham tatas param

original: p. 121) dhanadāya sadasyāya brahmaṇe ca kramāt priye ||
analyzed: dhanadāya sadasyāya brahmaṇe ca kramāt priye
mūrtipebhyaḥ pāragebhyaḥ jāpakebhyaḥ tatas param
pradadyāt cūrṇa salilam bhūsurebhyaḥ pṛthak punar
nṛpa ādibhyaḥ ca sarvebhyaḥ tat toyam ca eva sampade
bhūta bali utsavam kuryāt grāma sīmāntam eva vā
grāma antam ratha vīthyā antam muṣṭinā vikiret balim
mahā balim samāpya āryaḥ prākāram ca praveśayet
āsu jāla ātmikām ante tad mūla manunā prabhuḥ
pūjya santarpya santāḍya nālikera phala ādikaiḥ

original: bimbe ca garbhagehāntaṃ nyastvā liṅgasya dakṣiṇe |
analyzed: bimbe ca garbhageha antam nyastvā liṅgasya dakṣiṇe
tat caitanyam mūlaliṅge bhojayitvā su bhaktitaḥ
bhrāmyatām himadīpena prasanna arghyam pradāpayet

original: tato mantrī sarvaghoṣa.iḥ yāgagehaṃ praveśya ca ||
analyzed: tatas mantrī sarva ghoṣaiḥ yāga geham praveśya ca
sva kuṇḍa agnim ca saṃprokṣya vahni mantreṇa deśikaḥ
jāta ādi pūrṇa homa antam mayā adatta āhuti prabho

original: svīkṛtya vāñchitārthaṃ me datvā gaccha hutāśana |
analyzed: svīkṛtya vāñchita artham me da tvā gaccha hutāśana

original: p. 122) ityuktvāgniṃ visṛjyātha yantraṃ saṃprārthya bhaktitaḥ ||
analyzed: iti uktvā agnim visṛjya atha yantram saṃprārthya bhaktitaḥ
ramā devi namaḥ tubhyam rājya maṅgala dāyakī
pūjām gṛhāṇa kṛpayā rājya aiśvaryam prayacchame
iti yantram prārthayitvā yāga īśa ākhya ghaṭam param
yāgeśvari namaḥ tubhyam sarva yāga phala prade

original: gṛhāṇa tava kumbhārcāṃ dehi me dhanasampadam |
analyzed: gṛhāṇa tava kumbha arcām dehi me dhana sampadam
mūlena prārthayitvā iti pūjayet śāradāghaṭam
sarasvati namaḥ tubhyam vidya sampad pradāyikī
ghaṭa arcanam gṛhāṇa idam sarva vidyāḥ prayaccha me
mahā lakṣmi namaḥ tubhyam dhana rājya pradāyinī

original: kośaṃ vīyaṃ jayaṃ dehi gṛhāṇedaṃ kṛtārcanam ||
analyzed: kośam jayam dehi gṛhāṇa idam kṛta arcanam
mahākāli namaḥ te astu tava kalpa ukta pūjanam

original: gṛhītvā putradārādi vaṃśavṛddhiṃ ca dehi me ||
analyzed: gṛhītvā putra dāra ādi vaṃśa vṛddhim ca dehi me
namaḥ tubhyam mūlamāye nija ānanda svarūpiṇī

original: vividhān vibhavān dehi gṛhaṇa tava pūjanam ||
