analyzed: vividhān vibhavān dehi gṛhaṇa tava pūjanam

original: namo vidyeśī nāmākhyaḥ sadā kumbheṣu saṃsthitaḥ |
analyzed: namaḥ vidyeśī nāma ākhyaḥ sadā kumbheṣu saṃsthitaḥ
kumbha aṣṭaka arcanam yūyam gṛhṇantu su randitāḥ
kumbheśvari namaḥ tubhyam sarva kumbha adhivāsinī
sarva kumbha arcanam devi gṛhāṇa kula vṛddhi de
dvāra kumbha ādikān sarvān iti prārthya visarjayet
karma dvijaiḥ cāraka ādyaiḥ veda maṅgala nisvanaiḥ
vādya jāla ravaiḥ sārdham hāsakaiḥ gīta nartakaiḥ
chatra cāmara saṃyuktaiḥ ghaṇṭā nādaiḥ janaiḥ saha
cāra kumbha ādikān sarvān tad yantram ca tad aṅkuram
samuddhṛtya kramāt bhaktyā malamantram vadan tadā
pradakṣiṇa vaśāt geham nītvā garbham praveśya ca

original: yantraṃ pīṭhe ca vinyasya tanmantraṃ pūjayecchatam ||
analyzed: yantram pīṭhe ca vinyasya tad mantram pūjayet śatam
prāk ghaṭa stha udakaiḥ ādau siñcet pāṭājanā padam
dvāra kumbha jalaiḥ pīṭham pīṭha mantreṇa bhaktitaḥ
tad koṇam koṇa kumbha sthaiḥ koṇa mantreṇa caṇḍike
granthi mantreḥ antarālam gaḍḍuka stha udakaiḥ param
liṅgam prāc ukta sūktena vidyeśyā ādi ghaṭa udakaiḥ
kālikā ādyaiḥ tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ tat tri kumbha udakaiḥ param
devī sūktam vadan paścāt mūla durgā ghaṭa udakaiḥ
kautuka ādi parityajya mūla bimba ādi mānini
nyastvā liṅga uttare bhaktyā kautukam mūlam uccaran
yāga kumbha stha udakena cūrṇayātrā ghaṭa udakaiḥ
bali bimbam ca tat yantram yāga mantreṇa secayet
ramāsūktena tat secya daśa saṅkhyā upacārakaiḥ
yaṣṭvā bīja aṅkuraiḥ paścāt sudhā bījena cāryayet
bhrāmayet bahu dīpa oghān mantraiḥ puṣpa akṣaṇān punar
samarcya mūlamantreṇa navamī antam guru uttamaḥ

original: prasannārthaṃ punaḥ pūjāṃ vidhāya prārthya śāmbhavīm ||
analyzed: prasanna artham punar pūjām vidhāya prārthya śāmbhavīm
namaḥ devyai mahāmāye sarvadā ānanda rūpiṇī
navarātra ukta karma ogham navamī antam mayā kṛtam

original: samyak svīkṛtya tatsarvaṃ kriyāpūrṇaṃ phalaṃ śriyam |
analyzed: samyak svīkṛtya tat sarvam kriyā pūrṇam phalam śriyam
dehi me putra dāra ādi vaṃśa vṛddhim naga udbhave
iti uktvā mūlamanunā kriyāḥ sarvāḥ samarpayet

original: p. 125) dakṣiṇāṃ dāpayettatra gurvādibhyaḥ kramāt priye ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇām dāpayet tatra guru ādibhyaḥ kramāt priye
nava niṣkam deśikāya pradadyāt dhanadāya ca

original: pañca tribrahmaṇe devi sārdhaniṣkaṃ ca niṣkakam ||
analyzed: pañca tri brahmaṇe devi sārdha niṣkam ca niṣkakam
hotṛbhyaḥ cārakebhyaḥ ca jāpakebhyaḥ ca tat param
niṣka ardham sūkta jāpibhyaḥ secakebhyaḥ tathā eva ca
tathā tad pūjakebhyaḥ ca tad tarpaṇa kṛte tathā
niṣka ardha ardham prabhū bhaktyā cārakebhyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: dakṣiṇāṃ ca pṛthak datvā tāsāṃ te bhūridakṣiṇam |
analyzed: dakṣiṇām ca pṛthak da tvā tāsām te bhūri dakṣiṇam
śaktyā vitta anusāreṇa karma upakaraṇa ādikam
dadyāt tat maṇṭapam sarvam mantriṇe maṅgalāya ca
go bhūmi ādīni dānāni bhūsurebhyaḥ śubhāya ca
dāna ante bhūmipa ādīnām putra dāra ādi kāṅkṣiṇām
pāda udakam ca aṅkurāṇi kautukāni pradāpayet
sahadevīm samabhyarcya sa vastram kañcuka ādikam
suvāsinyai ca
gṛhītvā dhanadaḥ paścāt deśika ādi dvijaiḥ saha
veda ghoṣaiḥ vādya ravaiḥ śaṅkha ghaṇṭā rava ādikaiḥ
prabhu uttama ādikaiḥ sārdham praveśya ārya ālayam punar
deśika agnau tu saṃyujya pūjayet upacārakaiḥ
navamyā antam kṛtam karma mayā iti uktam tava anaghe
sarva pāpa haram divyam sarvadā maṅgala pradam
rājya durga pradam rājñaḥ dhana kośa bala pradam
putra pautra prapautra ādi vaṃśa vṛddhi pradam priye
āyuḥ ārogya dam puṃsām dhairyam vīryam manaḥ jayam
yaśaḥ pradam śoka haram sarva dāridrya nāśanam
navarātra ukta karmā idam catur varṇa udbhave nare
pratyabdam ca eva yaḥ kuryāt sat bhaktyā śuddha cetasā
vipraḥ ced aihike jñānam śriyam bhogān bahūn api
mokṣam āpnoti dehānte rājya aiśvaryam jayam yaśaḥ
dhanāni ratna jālāni sarva sampad balāni ca
dravya jñānāni dharmāṇi sārūpyam kṣatriya uttamaḥ
vaiśyaḥ ced dhana dhānyāni sāmīpyam labhate dhruvam
śūdra sukham sadā ārogyam vṛddhim sālokyam āpnuyāt

original: itthaṃ jñātveti karmaughaṃ navamyantaṃ payaḥ pumān |
analyzed: ittham jñātvā iti karma ogham navamī antam payaḥ pumān

original: samyak kurvīta sampattyai vaṃśavṛddhyai śubhāya ca ||
analyzed: samyak kurvīta sampattyai vaṃśa vṛddhyai śubhāya ca
nava durgā kramaḥ hi evam tūla ākarma vadāmi aham
iti śrī vātulottare durgā bhede śiva pārvatī saṃvāde kāmya kāṇḍe
navarātriyajanavivaraṇam nāma ekonatriṃśat paṭalaḥ
devī
śrutam deva mayā sarvam tvad prasādāt maheśvara
idānīm tulā bhāram

original: kiṃ nimittaṃ tadārohaḥ kiñca dravyaṃ ca kiṃ phalam |
analyzed: kim nimittam tad ārohaḥ kiñca dravyam ca kim phalam

original: tadvidhānaṃ kathaṃ samyak vistareṇa vada prabho ||
analyzed: tad vidhānam katham samyak vistareṇa vada prabho
īśvaraḥ

original: p. 128) sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahādevi tvayā yatparibhāṣitam |
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam mahādevi tvayā yat paribhāṣitam
tat sarvam ca pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu śva ekāgra mānasā
purā gaṅgā nadī tīre ṛṣi deva gaṇa āśrite

original: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca papraccha loke ko hyadhiko bhavet ||
analyzed: puṇyam pāpam ca papraccha loke kaḥ hi adhikaḥ bhavet
aham syāt loke aham pāpa pūruṣaḥ
paraspara virodhena viṣṇum śaraṇam āgatau
kimartham āgatau brūtam iti prāha janārdanaḥ

original: iti tadvacananaṃ śrutvā mā virodhaḥ parasparam ||
analyzed: iti tat vacananam śrutvā mā virodhaḥ parasparam
tatas sarva gataḥ viṣṇuḥ śūla ārohaṇam abravīt
tatra puṇyam vā adhikam syāt athavā pāpa pūruṣaḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau viniścitya manaśśāntiṃ samāgatau |
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tau viniścitya manaḥ śāntim samāgatau
kupitau sāntvayan tau hi tulām uddhārayet hariḥ

original: ubhau sthitau tulāpātre madhye dhṛtvā janārdanaḥ |
analyzed: ubhau sthitau tulā pātre madhye dhṛtvā janārdanaḥ
atha ulayat yathā nyāyyam tulite tena viṣṇunā
puṇyam bhū bhāgam ca samāviśat
pāpam ca lāghavāt gauri tad śa tvāt ucchritaḥ khilā
tulāyām adhikam dṛṣṭvā lajjitaḥ pāpa pūruṣaḥ
avaruhya tulā pātrān svayam bhūmim samāgamat
tat ārabhya tulam dṛṣṭvā dūrāt eva palāyate
tasmāt tulām āruhanti manujāḥ tathā
dharma adharma kṛtam bhāram tulayā vijigīṣayā
etasmāt karaṇāt loke tulābhāram viśiṣyate
tasyāḥ smaraṇa mātreṇa sarva pāpa vināśanam
kadācid ca tulā ārohe sarva mṛtyu bhayam nṛṇām
apasmāra ādi saṃprāptam tad kṣaṇāt eva naśyati
brahmahatyā ādi pāpānām prāyaścittam idam smṛtam

original: iti datvā varaṃ viṣṇuḥ tulāyai lokarakṣakaḥ |
analyzed: iti da tvā varam viṣṇuḥ tulāyai loka rakṣakaḥ
śivālaya ādiṣu sthitvā tule tvam pāpa hāriṇī

original: nuda pāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ nityaṃ bhaktānāṃ ca hitaprade |
analyzed: nuda pāpam nṛṇām nityam bhaktānām ca hita prade
iti ājñayā mayā viṣṇuḥ tulā bhāram idam priye

original: taddravyaṃ ca pṛthagbhedaṃ tadvidhaṃ tatphalaṃ śṛṇu |
analyzed: tad dravyam ca pṛthak bhedam tadvidham tad phalam śṛṇu
krameṇa saṃpravakṣyāmi nimittāni pṛthak pṛthak
svarṇena vitta śaktaḥ ced tulām ārohayet tadā
cakravartī nṛpaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sa bhavet sapta janmani
tad ante śiva sāyujyam iha api sukham aśnute
rājate vyādhi nāśaḥ syāt putra pautra ādi saṃyutaḥ

original: ciraṃ bhuktvā bahūn bhogān viṣṇuloke mahīyate |
analyzed: ciram bhuktvā bahūn bhogān viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: tāmreṇa śatrunāśaṃ syāt ihaloke sukhaṃ bhavet ||
analyzed: tāmreṇa śatru nāśam syāt ihaloke sukham bhavet

original: tadante brahmalokaṃ syāt phalaṃ guhyaṃ varānane |
analyzed: tad ante brahma lokam syāt phalam guhyam varānane
kāṃsyena jvara nāśam syāt sarva śānti karam nṛṇām
trapuṇā roga nāśāya kīrtaye dhana vṛddhaye
dāruṇā sarva nāśaḥ syāt śilayā sva kula kṣayam
mṛṇmayam putra nāśāya tat dravyam varjayet priye

original: daghnā ca dhanavṛddhiḥ syāt sarvaśatrujayo bhavet ||
analyzed: daghnā ca dhana vṛddhiḥ syāt sarva śatru jayaḥ bhavet
āyuḥ vṛddhi karam ca ājye su buddhiḥ ca manohare
mākṣikeṇa tulā ārohe bhūta grasta ādi śānti yuj
guḍa śarkarayā vā api sthira lakṣmīm avāpnuyāt
tila taila samārohe apamṛtyu vināśanam
nālikera phala ārohe śīghram putra ādi saṃpadaḥ
kadalī panasa āmra ādyaiḥ putra mitra samṛddhi dam
drākṣā kharjūrakaiḥ tuṣṭaḥ ihaloke paratra ca
candana agaru karpūra tulārohe maheśvari
śīghram śriyam avāpnoti sarva tāpa nivāraṇam
śveta vastra tulā ārohe tuṣṭi puṣṭi pradam śive
etad dravyāṇi sampādya yathā śaktyā anusārataḥ
sāmba liṅga ādikaiḥ kṣetre hari īśe śumbha vidviṣe
ṣaṇmukhe ca gaṇādhyakṣe tat samāruhya bhaktitaḥ
brahma kṣatriya vaiśyaiḥ vā śūdraiḥ ca manuja uttamaiḥ
ṛṣi deva gaṇaiḥ devi mām uddiśya yathā ukta vat
sudinam ca eva niścitya candra tārā anukūlakam
devālaya purobhāge śākare vā viśeṣataḥ

original: maṇṭapaṃ kārayedbhaktyā kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile'pi vā ||
analyzed: maṇṭapam kārayet bhaktyā kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍile api vā
puṣpa maṇṭapikām vā api dvāra toraṇa bhūṣitam

original: stambhaṃ tatra dṛḍhībhūtaṃ sāradārumayaṃ tu vā ||
analyzed: stambham tatra dṛḍhībhūtam sāradāru mayam tu vā

original: pañcalohena tulayā rajvā patrai prayujya ca |
analyzed: pañcalohena tulayā rajvā patraiḥ prayujya ca
tulām saṃyojya kūṭastham śāstrataḥ

original: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya nityakarma samāpya ca |
analyzed: tatas prātar samutthāya nityakarma samāpya ca
brāhmaṇaiḥ saha śuddha ātmā maṅgalasnānam ācaret
vastra āharaṇa mālyaiḥ ca alaṅkṛtya varānane
devālayam samāgatya maṇṭapam praviśet priye
gaṇeśvaram samārādhya nāndī puṇyāham ācaret
madhuparkam tatas kuryāt varayet bhūsura uttamān
ācāryam yajamānam ca ṛtvijam vedapāragam

original: brāhmaṇaṃ ca sadasyaṃ ca japapārāyaṇa dvijān ||
analyzed: brāhmaṇam ca sadasyam ca japa pārāyaṇa dvijān

original: suvarṇaṃ ca phalaṃ vastraṃ datvā ca varayet priye |
analyzed: suvarṇam ca phalam vastram da tvā ca varayet priye

original: tato niśīthe saṃprāpte saṃskṛte maṇṭape guruḥ ||
analyzed: tatas niśīthe saṃprāpte saṃskṛte maṇṭape guruḥ
dvāra toraṇa kumbhān ca pūjayet ca manohare
vāstuḥ ā akṣoghna homam ca balim vāstoḥ samācaret
japa pārāyaṇam kuryāt catur astram tathā eva ca
gaṇeśa kṣetrapālam ca mṛtyuñjaya nava graham
ācārya yajamāna ādyaiḥ upavāsam ca jāgaram
pañcagavyam ca pītvā tu jita indriya dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya nityakarma samāpya ca |
analyzed: tatas prātar samutthāya nityakarma samāpya ca
tatas maṇṭapam āsādya gaṇeśam pūjayet guruḥ
homayet mūlamantreṇa aṣṭottarasahasrakam
mṛtyuñjayam diśā homam gṛha homam samācaret
catur dikṣu krameṇa eva samidh ājya carūn kramāt
tilam ca sarṣapam mantrī homayet ṛtvijaiḥ saha

original: īśānye pūrvabhāge ca kalaśān sthāpayet guruḥ |
analyzed: īśānye pūrva bhāge ca kalaśān sthāpayet guruḥ
yāvat varṣa mitam mugdhe śiva kumbham ca vardhinīm
tāvat saṃkhyān su saṃpūjya homa ante secayet camām
aṣṭa gandhaiḥ samālipya vastra ābharaṇa puṣpakaiḥ
naivedyam dīpa jālaiḥ ca toṣayet ca sureśvari
prārthayet yajamānaḥ tu svarṇa puṣpa kara sthitaḥ
devadeva jagannātha saṃsāra abdhi bhaya apaha
tulām āroḍhum icchāmi tvad prīti artham tvad ājñayā
iti puṣpa añjalim da tvā tulāmaṇṭapam āviśet
saṃpūjya ca tulām mantrī brahmā viṣṇu śiva ādikān
viṣṇu māyām jagaddhātrīm pratimām svarṇa nirmitām

original: tulākūṭe ca madhye ca sthāpayetpūjayecca mām ||
analyzed: tulā kūṭe ca madhye ca sthāpayet pūjayet ca mām
dakṣiṇe viṣṇum abhyarcya vāme brahmāṇam arcayet
dikpālakān ca sampūjya paritas ca yathākramam
tulā pātre ca aśvinyau candra bhāskarau
śūlapāṇim paraśupāṇim catur vedān yathākramam
mṛtyuñjayam tulā dravye pūjayet sva sva nāmabhiḥ
gandha puṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya naivedya antam sureśvari
prārthayet yajamānaḥ tu kṛta añjali puṭa sthitaḥ
namaḥ te jagat ādhāre namaḥ te sarva sākṣiṇe

original: p. 135) māmuddhara tulādevi rakṣa rakṣa namo'stute |
analyzed: mām uddhara tulādevi rakṣa rakṣa namaḥ astu te
iti saṃprārthayet bhaktyā phala svarṇa kara svayam
pradakṣiṇa trayam kṛtvā veda maṅgala nisvanaiḥ

original: tulādravyaṃ ca pūrvoktaṃ svasya dakṣiṇato nyaset ||
analyzed: tulā dravyam ca pūrva uktam svasya dakṣiṇatas nyaset
vāme tulām samāropya upaviśya guru uttamaḥ
kiñcid dravyam viśeṣeṇa svasmāt bhāram sureśvari
kara tālaiḥ veda ghoṣaiḥ govinda iti samuccaret

original: kṣaṇamātraṃ tata sthitvā manasā cintayecca mām ||
analyzed: kṣaṇa mātram tata sthitvā manasā cintayet ca mām
tris āvṛtya ca santolya tulā pātram adhas nayet

original: avaruhyaṃ phalaṃ svarṇaṃ gurave ca samarpayet ||
analyzed: avaruhyam phalam svarṇam gurave ca samarpayet

original: alaṅkāraṃ ca vastraṃ ca gobhūmyādi viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: alaṅkāram ca vastram ca go bhūmi ādi viśeṣataḥ

original: pūjayecca yathā bhaktyā dānāni vividhāni ca ||
analyzed: pūjayet ca yathā bhaktyā dānāni vividhāni ca

original: brāhmaṇebhyaśca datvā tu savatsāṃ gāṃ sureśvari |
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ca da tvā tu sa vatsām gām sureśvari
dakṣiṇām dāpayet bhaktyā karma kṛdbhyaḥ ca deśikaḥ
tulā dravyam ca vibhajet devatā artham vibhāgakam
bhūmi dāna artham ekam ca dāpayet ca pṛthak pṛthak
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt yathāśaktyā varānane
vipra āśīrvacanam gṛhya tad ante ca samarpaṇam
tulā bhāram mayā iti uktam devatā artham sureśvari
tava snehena vaktavyam kim anyat śrotum icchasi
iti śrī vātulottare durgā bhede śiva pārvati saṃvāde kāmya kāṇḍe
tulābhārakriyāvivaraṇam nāma dvātriṃśat paṭalaḥ
svasti
vande vighneśvaram devam sarva vighna ādi daivatam
tat namāmi gaṇādhyakṣa vande vāñchita siddhaye
devī uvāca
bhasma uddhūlita sarva aṅga jaṭā jūṭa digambara
sarva deva gaṇaiḥ śambho siddha vidyādharaiḥ saha
kinnaraiḥ yakṣa gandharvaiḥ muni saṅghaiḥ samāvṛta
parivāra gaṇaiḥ sārdham sarva loka hitāya ca
guhyāt guhyatamam samyak rahasyam sura durlabham
paripṛcchāmi deveśa prasanna ātman jagatpate
aṣṭāviṃśati mantrāṇi vātula antāni śaṅkara
tvayā īritāni gopyāni tāni bhedāni samyak
tantreṣu mad liṅga lakṣaṇa ādi katham vada
lakṣaṇam pañca sūtrāṇām sakṛt mad liṅga pīṭhayoḥ
prākāra dvāra harmya ādi mūla prāsāda lakṣaṇam
dvāra ādi bali devānām vāhanasya dhvajasya ca

original: teṣāṃ pṛthak padaṃ deva vāpī kūpataṭākayoḥ ||
analyzed: teṣām pṛthak padam deva vāpī kūpa taṭākayoḥ
paritas parivāra ākhya vimbānām lakṣaṇam katham

original: teṣāṃ ca nilayānāṃ cedāyataṃ connataṃ vada ||
analyzed: teṣām ca nilayānām ced āyatam ca unnatam vada
dravya ambara nāgāragehe bandhana lakṣaṇam

original: snāna yāga sabhāsthāna kuṇḍānāṃ caiva lakṣaṇam ||
analyzed: snāna yāga sabhā sthāna kuṇḍānām ca eva lakṣaṇam
lakṣaṇam tad padam vada
prāsāda gopura agra ādi kumbhanyāsa kramaḥ katham
deśika ādi dvijātīnām padam tat geha bandhanam
nṛpa ādīnām ca sarveṣām ālayānām ca lakṣaṇam
go śālā ādi gaja aśvānām katham āpaṇika ādinām
cārāṇām sevaka ādīnām vādyakānām gṛha ādikam

original: kathaṃ ratisthalaṃ deva vaiśyānāṃ nilayaṃ vada |
analyzed: katham rati sthalam deva vaiśyānām nilayam vada
svarṇakāra ādi jātīnām kāṃsya tāmra kṛtām padam
rajaka ādi ambara kṛtā cakriṇām dhvajinām gṛhān
śilpinām ambarāṇām ca padam sandhi kṛtām vada
puṣpa udyāna sthalam kutra sūtra sopāna lakṣaṇam
puṣpa nyāsa sthalam deva tulasyāḥ lakṣaṇam
śibikā ādi ratha aṅgānām nilayam lakṣaṇa ādikam
ātitheyī anna saṃsthānam dīpa stambhasya lakṣaṇam
dīpa jāla ādi mālānām ratha vīthi ādi lakṣaṇam
sopānasya upavīthīnām lakṣaṇam ca katham vada
pūjaka asparśakāḥ ca eva
ācārya lakṣaṇam kim vā nityakarma kramaḥ katham
naimittika arcanam karma pavitra āropaṇam katham
nitya naimittike kāmye snāna karma kramaḥ katham
tava utpattiḥ katham bhedam nava durgā vidhiḥ katham
tulā bhāra kriyām deva kṛtikā dīpa lakṣaṇam
kālam ratha āroha kramam vada
damana āropaṇam deva vasanta utsava lakṣaṇam

original: taddravyaṃ sāmpradāyaṃ ca bandhe jīrṇe kathaṃ vada ||
analyzed: tad dravyam sāmpradāyam ca bandhe jīrṇe katham vada
karaka apātra jāla ādi karaṇānām ca lakṣaṇam
bherī paṭaha śaṅkha ādi vādyānām mauriṇām tathā
vīṇā mṛdaṅga tāla ādi tittivīṇā ādi nādakam
nitya ādi karma lopānām prāyaścitta vidhiḥ katham

original: liṅge bimbe tadaṅgecedbhinne naṣṭe hṛte katham ||
analyzed: liṅge bimbe tad aṅge ced bhinne naṣṭe hṛte katham
mūla prāsāda śikhare maṇṭape gopura ādike
tad agra kalaśe deva prākāre prāṅkaṇa ādike

original: dīpastambhe dhvaje dvāre parivāre ca vāhane |
analyzed: dīpa stambhe dhvaje dvāre parivāre ca vāhane
bali pīṭha gaṇe yatra pātra jāla ādike athavā
deśika ādi jana stome cārake sevaka ādike

original: vādyajāle vādake cetpatite ca mṛte katham ||
analyzed: vādya jāle vādake ced patite ca mṛte katham

original: halite khaṇḍite bhinne palite dahane yathā |
analyzed: halite khaṇḍite bhinne palite dahane yathā
kadācid adbhuta utpāte para rāja bhaye katham

original: p. 141) yasmin tantre ca yadguhyaṃ mantramudrādilakṣaṇam |
analyzed: yasmin tantre ca yat guhyam mantra mudrā ādi lakṣaṇam
devatā vivṛtim sarva karmaṇām naitrika ādinām
etad tantre ca tat sarvam vistarā prāṇa vallabhā

original: prītyā mudā mahādeva mama sānnidhya hetave ||
analyzed: prītyā mudā mahādeva mama sānnidhya hetave
sa sāmpradāya yukta ātman brūhi me bhoga dāyaka

original: iti śrīparamarahasye vātulottare śivaṃ prati pārvatīsaṃvāde praśne
analyzed: iti śrī paramarahasye vātulottare śivam prati pārvatī saṃvāde praśne
nirūpaṇa paṭalaḥ prathamaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi tava liṅga ādi lakṣaṇam
kalā bhedam ca udbhavam ca sakṛt tvad liṅga pīṭhayoḥ
lakṣaṇam pañca sūtram ca geha bandhana lakṣaṇam

original: tadaṅge kalpanaṃ devi krameṇa śṛṇu pārvati ||
analyzed: tad aṅge kalpanam devi krameṇa śṛṇu pārvati

original: layaṃ gacchanti bhūtāni saṃhāre tvakhilaṃ yataḥ |
analyzed: layam gacchanti bhūtāni saṃhāre tu akhilam yatas
sṛṣṭi kāle yathā sṛṣṭiḥ tasmāt liṅgam udāhṛtam
dvividham liṅgam ākhyātam niṣkalam sakalam priye

original: p. 142) niṣkalaṃ mama rūpaṃ ca sakalaṃ tava rūpakam ||
analyzed: niṣkalam mama rūpam ca sakalam tava rūpakam
ubhayoḥ saṃpuṭam yatra liṅga ākāra samudbhavam
parātparataram hi asmāt śiva śakteḥ samudbhavam

original: niṣkalaṃ hi kalāhīnaṃ sakalaṃ tu kalānvitam |
analyzed: niṣkalam hi kalā hīnam sakalam tu kalā anvitam
sakalam niṣkala upetam liṅga ākāram maheśvari
muni deva manuṣyaiḥ ca pūjitam liṅgam ādarāt
yoginām rakṣaṇa arthāya śāstrāṇām udbhavāya ca
prāṇinām upakārāya devatānām hitāya ca
rākṣasānām vadha arthāya tasmāt liṅga samudbhavam
svayambhuvam sāmba liṅgam durlabham ca varānane

original: svarṇarekhā ca madbhedaṃ tava bhedaṃ ca cihnitam ||
analyzed: svarṇa rekhā ca mad bhedam tava bhedam ca cihnitam
tava bhāge ca adhike ca sarva liṅga uttama uttamam
sarva abhīṣṭa pradam liṅgam tava loke praśasyate

original: rājataṃ yatra dṛśyante cihnaṃ viṣṇośca śaktayaḥ |
analyzed: rājatam yatra dṛśyante cihnam viṣṇoḥ ca śaktayaḥ
pravālam yatra dṛśyante brahma śaktyā sarasvatī
ūrdhva rekhā bhavet śaktiḥ tiryañc rekhā śiva smṛtaḥ

original: p. 143) iti cihnāni vartante durlabhaṃ śṛṇu pārvati ||
analyzed: iti cihnāni vartante durlabham śṛṇu pārvati

original: tryaṅgulordhve yadā liṅgaṃ dṛśyate ca maheśvari |
analyzed: tri aṅgula ūrdhve yadā liṅgam dṛśyate ca maheśvari
phakva jambū phala ākāram nālikera ākṛtim śive
vartulam paṅkaja ākāram tvad liṅgam putra pautra dam

original: nadītīre saṅgame ca udyāne parvate taṭe |
analyzed: nadī tīre saṅgame ca udyāne parvate taṭe
eṣu sthāne samudbhūte nava liṅge maheśvari
sarva abhīṣṭa pradam loke rājñaḥ rājya abhivṛddhi dam
liṅga lakṣaṇam ākhyātam pīṭha lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: liṅgasya vistaraṃ pīṭhaṃ unnataṃ vā maheśvari |
analyzed: liṅgasya vistaram pīṭham unnatam vā maheśvari
tad samam caturaśram syāt tat nālam ca tad ardhakam

original: unnataṃ ca tadardhaṃ syāt ekaditri ca paṭṭikām |
analyzed: unnatam ca tad ardham syāt ca paṭṭikām

original: vāṇīṃ lakṣmīṃ mahākālīṃ brahmāviṣṇuṃ ca rudrakān ||
analyzed: vāṇīm lakṣmīm mahākālīm brahmā viṣṇum ca rudrakān

original: tava pīṭhaṃ ca śaktiśca āśritaṃ ca ubhau sthitaḥ |
analyzed: tava pīṭham ca śaktiḥ ca āśritam ca ubhau sthitaḥ
liṅga mūlena saṃsthāpya sarvalakṣaṇa lakṣitam

original: ūrdhvabhāgaṃ ca tyaktvādau liṅgaṃ saṃyojya pīṭhake |
analyzed: ūrdhva bhāgam ca tyaktvā ādau liṅgam saṃyojya pīṭhake

original: p. 144) pūrvāsyaṃ ca sthitaṃ liṅgaṃ praṇālaṃ cottare nyaset ||
analyzed: pūrva āsyam ca sthitam liṅgam praṇālam ca uttare nyaset
pratyak mukhasya liṅgasya praṇālam dakṣiṇe nyaset
udak mukhasya liṅgasya paścima abhimukhe nyaset
dakṣiṇa abhimukhe liṅge pūrvasya abhimukhe nyaset
pīṭha adhike bhavet mṛtyuḥ hīne liṅge maheśvari
pañca sūtra vihīnaḥ ced kula kṣaya karam nṛṇām

original: pīṭhasya lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ gehabaddhaṃ tataḥ śṛṇu ||
analyzed: pīṭhasya lakṣaṇam proktam geha baddham tatas śṛṇu

original: prītasya triguṇaṃ garbhaṃ tadardhaṃ cāntaraṃ priye |
analyzed: prītasya triguṇam garbham tad ardham ca antaram priye
dvāra dvaya samāyuktam lakṣmīmaṇṭapa bāhyatas

original: garbhasya dviguṇaṃ kuryāt taddvāraṃ ca prakalpayet |
analyzed: garbhasya dviguṇam kuryāt tad dvāram ca prakalpayet
maṇṭapasya tri guṇitam prākāram priye

original: vāhanaṃ maṇṭapaṃ kuryāt tadardhāṃ ca pārvati |
analyzed: vāhanam maṇṭapam kuryāt tad ardhām ca pārvati
prākāram ca tri guṇitam bahis prākāra kalpanam
maṇṭapasya adhikam dvāram bahidvāram tu pārvati
prathame liṅga bhitti syāt dvitīye dvāra bhittikā
tṛtīye gopure devi caturthe pīṭha bhittikā

original: p. 145) bahi prākārabhitti syāt pañcamāvaraṇaṃ priye ||
analyzed: bahi prākāra bhitti syāt pañcama āvaraṇam priye
garbhagṛhe catu stambham tad bāhye ca aṣṭabhiḥ priye
maṇṭape dvādaśa stambham prākāra ādiṣu sarvatas
aṣṭottaraśata stambham dviśatam triśatam priye
mūti yuj paṭṭikā ādīni antaram ca tad antaram

original: gehārdhaṃ śikharaṃ kuryāt tadardhaṃ kalaśe nyaset |
analyzed: geha ardham śikharam kuryāt tad ardham kalaśe nyaset
svarṇa raupya ādi tāmra ādyaiḥ kumbham kṛtvā ca śilpinā

original: eka tripañca kumbhaṃ syāt saptakumbhaṃ nyaset priye |
analyzed: eka tri pañca kumbham syāt sapta kumbham nyaset priye
prāsāda ādiṣu sarvatra tad kumbham sthāpayet guruḥ
śilpi śāstra ukta mārgeṇa geham kṛtvā vidhānataḥ

original: yadi hīne kṛtaṃ gehe lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvamuktavat ||
analyzed: yadi hīne kṛtam gehe lakṣaṇam pūrvam ukta vat
pūjāḥ na arhati tat liṅgam piśāca brahmarākṣasaiḥ

original: sa bhavecca mahāmārī tadgrāme pīḍyate sadā ||
analyzed: sa bhavet ca mahā mārī tad grāme pīḍyate sadā
tasmāt sarva prayatnena lakṣaṇam vīkṣya mukta vat
upadeśa dguroḥ śilpī kurvīta tava ca ālayam
śilāyāḥ nirmitam geham samuddharet

original: p. 146) ante mama puraṃ prāpya ihaiva sukhamaśnute ||
analyzed: ante mama puram prāpya iha eva sukham aśnute
ca iṣṭake dāru jam vā api putra pautra ādi sampadaḥ
sarva bhogān ca labhate sarvatra vijayaḥ bhavet

original: dehānte mama lokaṃ tu āpnotyeva na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: dehānte mama lokam tu āpnoti eva na saṃśayaḥ
lakṣaṇam ca ālayasya uktam tadā aṅgāni nigadyate

original: kumbhaṃ pīṭhaṃ ca vāstuṃ ca vāhanadhvajasaṃyutam |
analyzed: kumbham pīṭham ca vāstum ca vāhana dhvaja saṃyutam
etat pañcāṅgam iti uktam tatra doṣaḥ mayā ucyate
kumbha nāśe kīrti nāśam pīṭha nāśe dhana kṣayam
vāstu vāhana nāśe tu dhvaja nāśe bhavet yadi

original: nityādi sarvakarmāṇi pūjā nārhanti ca tadālaye |
analyzed: nitya ādi sarva karmāṇi pūjāḥ na arhanti ca tad ālaye

original: dharmārthaṃ kāmamokṣāṇāṃ na praśastaṃ ca pārvati ||
analyzed: dharma artham kāma mokṣāṇām na praśastam ca pārvati
devatām sannidhāna artham asurāṇām ca nāśanam
tasmāt pañcāṅga yuktam ca ālayam parikalpayet
ālayam ca aṅgam iti uktam dvārapāla ādikān śṛṇu
iti śrī vātulottare nitya kāṇḍe liṅga lakṣaṇa ādi
gehabandhanalakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ
atas param pravakṣyāmi dvārapāla ādi lakṣaṇam
vāhanam dhvaja pīṭham syāt parivāra ālayam śṛṇu

original: śilāditāmrakaṃ vāpi kāṃsyaṃ vā pittalaṃ priye |
analyzed: śilā ādi tāmrakam vā api kāṃsyam vā pittalam priye

original: rājataṃ svarṇajaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tava liṅge viśeṣataḥ ||
analyzed: rājatam svarṇa jam śreṣṭham tava liṅge viśeṣataḥ
liṅgasya pañca guṇitam ucchritam ca maheśvari
tri pañca hasta mānam vā tava bimba ākṛtim guruḥ
haste daṇḍam ca dhṛtvā atha śaṅkha cakra ādi dhāriṇaḥ
antardvāre gopure ca dvārasya ubhaya pārśvataḥ
caṇḍikām ambikān nāma dvārapāle maheśvari
ślādinī mohinī nāma gopura ubhaya pārśvataḥ
kātyāyinī jayantī ca lakṣaṇena samanvite
su dṛḍham sthāpayet devi yathā vidhi ukta mārgataḥ

original: tava liṅge dvārapāle lakṣaṇaṃ kathitaṃ priye |
analyzed: tava liṅge dvārapāle lakṣaṇam kathitam priye

original: vāhanaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi śilādi dravya bhedataḥ ||
analyzed: vāhanam ca pravakṣyāmi śilā ādi dravya bhedataḥ
ligasya ūrdhvam ca kurvīta vistāram sārdha hastakam
liṅgasya triguṇam vā atha lakṣaṇa ukta vat
sthāpayet vidhinā mantrī pīṭha maṇṭapayoḥ dhvaje

original: iti bhedasthale devi vāhanasya tu lakṣaṇam ||
analyzed: iti bheda sthale devi vāhanasya tu lakṣaṇam

original: dhvajasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye tava liṅge maheśvari |
analyzed: dhvajasya lakṣaṇam vakṣye tava liṅge maheśvari

original: śilādaṇḍaṃ candanaṃ ca devadāruṃ ca gandhajam ||
analyzed: śilādaṇḍam candanam ca devadārum ca gandha jam
padmasāram garbhasāram dṛṣṭvā daṇḍam parigrahet
śikhara stha ghaṭa agrasya daṇḍa āyatam priye

original: pañcahastādhikaṃ kṛtvā khātvā stambhaṃ ca bhūtale |
analyzed: pañca hasta adhikam kṛtvā khātvā stambham ca bhū tale
caturaśram daṇḍamūle eka dvi trim ca paṭṭikām
tad ūrdhve ca aṣṭa dhārāḥ ca tasya ūrdhve vartula ākṛtiḥ
mastake vāhanam nyasya dhvaja vedim prakalpayet
śilā ceṣṭakayā baddhvā sārdha hasta pramāṇataḥ
pañca traya antaram kuryāt sthāpayet vidhinā guruḥ
śilā daṇḍam sthāpanam ca vaṃśa vṛddhi kara priye
sarva śatru jayam nṝṇām svarṇam rājya pradam śive
dhvaja lakṣaṇam iti uktam bali pīṭham tatas śṛṇu
śilā ādi nirmitam pīṭham tri pañca aṅgula vistṛtam

original: tasyordhvaṃ ca prakurvīta caturaśraṃ ca vṛttakam ||
analyzed: tasya ūrdhvam ca prakurvīta catur aśram ca vṛttakam
tad tad mūrti aṅkitam pīṭham padmam vā atha maheśvari
caṇḍikā ādyāḥ devatāḥ ca sthāpayet guruḥ

original: devatāṃśca tato vakṣye śṛṇu devi yathākramam |
analyzed: devatān ca tatas vakṣye śṛṇu devi yathākramam
caṇḍikām ambikām siṃham ca agratas

original: dakṣiṇe gaṇanāthaṃ ca śaṃkaraṃ ca maheśvari |
analyzed: dakṣiṇe gaṇanātham ca śaṃkaram ca maheśvari

original: svasvadikṣu ca dikpālān brahmāṇaṃ śāṅkare diśi ||
analyzed: sva sva dikṣu ca dikpālān brahmāṇam śāṅkare diśi
anantam nairṛte sthāne prathama āvaraṇe śive
dvitīye sapta mātṛḥ ca pīṭha lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: hastamātraṃ ca vistāraṃ ūrdhvaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ priye |
analyzed: hasta mātram ca vistāram ūrdhvam sapta aṅgulam priye
vīrabhadram gaṇeśam ca tad pīṭhe dvāra deśataḥ
paṅkti rūpam ca tad pīṭhe kamala ākṛti saptakam
tad bahis ca catur dikṣu ūrdhva adhas ca sthale śive
mātṛbhyaḥ lokamātṛbhyaḥ sarva mātṛ gaṇeṣu api

original: p. 150) yamadeśe ca saṃprāpya śāstāraṃ ca samīpataḥ |
analyzed: yama deśe ca saṃprāpya śāstāram ca samīpatas
vāyoḥ ca puratas durgā durgā sāmīpyataḥ guham
dhanadam soma sāmīpye sthāpayet ca maheśvari
soma īśa anantare madhye muṇḍinīm sthāpayet guruḥ
liṅga pīṭha ākṛtim kuryāt sapta aṅgula su vistaram
sapta aṅgulam tad ūrdhve tu pañca sūtram sa lakṣaṇam
gopura dvāra pārśve tu bahis antar ca sthāpayet
gopura agre mahākālīm karālīm vahni gocare

original: yamadeśe ca virajāṃ daityadeśe ca mandarām |
analyzed: yama deśe ca virajām daitya deśe ca mandarām
vindhya ākhyām ca eva vāruṇyām suprabhām vāyugocare
saumya sthāne siṃha vaktrām śāṅkare daitya mardinīm
prāc ādi sthāpayet pīṭham kṣetrapālam ca śāṅkare
vistāram hasta mātram ca caturaśram su paṅkajam
tri pīṭham ca samāyuktam tad ūrdhvam hasta mātrakam

original: kṣetrapālaṃ ca saṃsthāpya mahāpīṭhaṃ tataḥ śṛṇu |
analyzed: kṣetrapālam ca saṃsthāpya mahā pīṭham tatas śṛṇu
sārdha hasta mitam kuryāt caturaśram sa vistaram

original: p. 151) tadūrdhvaṃ ca samaṃ liṅgaṃ aṣṭapatraṃ ca mūrdhani |
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam ca samam liṅgam aṣṭa pattram ca mūrdhani

original: tripīṭhaṃ ca samāyuktaṃ paṭṭikāṃ kārayet priye ||
analyzed: tri pīṭham ca samāyuktam paṭṭikām kārayet priye
adhas pīṭhe ca aṣṭa dikṣu kamala ākṛti mukta vat
liṅga agre dhvaja sāmīpye gopura dvāra bāhyatas
sthāpayet ca mahā pīṭham devatāḥ parikalpayet
brahmaghoṣīm sughoṣīm ca yatheṣṭam sukha rāgiṇīm
su mukhīm su bhujām ca eva pramodihi ātmanīm punar
prāc ādi paritas pīṭhe kalpayet ca maheśvari
piṅgalā ākhyām tu adhas pūjya sukeśīm ūrdhvatas priye

original: evaṃ saṃsthāpya tatpīṭhe tava gehe guruḥ śive ||
analyzed: evam saṃsthāpya tad pīṭhe tava gehe guruḥ śive
pīṭhasya lakṣaṇam proktam parivāra ālayam śṛṇu
bahis prākāra paritas īśāna ādi yathākramam

original: garbhagṛhaṃ maṇṭapaṃ ca pañca saptakaraṃ priye |
analyzed: garbhagṛham maṇṭapam ca pañca sapta karam priye
caturaśra āyatam kuryāt hasta mātram tad ucchrayam
bhiti antara dvayam kuryāt tatra dvāram prakalpayet
catu stambham ca antarāle tad bahis ca aṣṭabhiḥ priye
kūṭa ākāram ca kurvīta śilpi śāstra ukta mārgataḥ

original: tadagre kalaśaṃ nyasya kumbhamekaṃ ca svarṇajam ||
analyzed: tad agre kalaśam nyasya kumbham ekam ca svarṇa jam
sthāpayet parivārān ca vīra īśa ādi yathākramam

original: ṣaṇmukhaṃ ca gaṇeśaṃ ca gopālaṃ mārutātmajam ||
analyzed: ṣaṇmukham ca gaṇeśam ca gopālam mārutātmajam
tad tad mūrtim prakurvīta śilā ādi dravya bhedataḥ

original: ekahastaṃ trihastaṃ vā pañcahasta nava priye ||
analyzed: eka hastam tri hastam vā pañca hasta nava priye
lakṣaṇena samāyuktam tad tad āyudha bhūṣaṇam
tat tat vāhana saṃyuktam śilpi śāstre yathā ukta vat
sthāpayet vidhinā mantrī yathā pūrva ukta mārgataḥ
parivāra ālayam śreṣṭham anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ śive
kārayet bahudhā bhaktyā tad tad mūrtim tad ālayam
sthāpayet vidhinā mantrī bahis prākāra deśake
parivāra ālayam proktam kūpa sthānam śṛṇu priye
tava ālaye ca aiśa bhāge prākāre ca maheśvari

original: bhūmiṃ khātvā jalāntaṃ vā caturaśraṃ ca vṛttakam |
analyzed: bhūmim khātvā jala antam vā caturaśram ca vṛttakam

original: vistāraṃ ca tripañcā vā badhvā ceṣṭaśilādibhiḥ ||
analyzed: vistāram ca tri pañcā vā badhvā ca iṣṭa śilā ādibhiḥ

original: p. 153) puruṣāntaṃ jalaṃ cāntaḥ dvitripūrṣamitaṃ priye |
analyzed: puruṣa antam jalam ca antar dvi tri pūrṣa mitam priye

original: matsyaḥ kūrmaṃ paṅkajaṃ ca svarṇaṃ vā rājataṃ priye ||
analyzed: matsyaḥ kūrmam paṅkajam ca svarṇam vā rājatam priye
nikṣipet jala madhye tu chādayet phalakam priye
darśanam ca na kurvīta śodhayet varṣa varṣake
kūpa lakṣaṇam iti uktam taṭākā lakṣaṇam śṛṇu
tava ālaya agratas kuryāt paścime vā atha ca uttare
aśīti hastam khātvā atha caturaśra samantataḥ
sopānam ca catur dikṣu śilābhiḥ ca iṣṭakaiḥ priye

original: badhvā ca paṭṭikāṃ śilpī tripañcanavakaṃ pṛthak |
analyzed: badhvā ca paṭṭikām śilpī tri pañca navakam pṛthak

original: jalāntaṃ ca dṛḍhaṃ vadhvā jalaṃ ca puruṣāvadhi ||
analyzed: jala antam ca dṛḍham vadhvāḥ jalam ca puruṣa avadhi
khātvā jala sthānam prakalpayet
matsyam kūrmam paṅkajam ca kārayet lakṣaṇa anvitam
vinyaset ca tatas mantrī madhye maṇṭapa lakṣaṇam
kārayet tava liṅga agre taṭākam ca manoharam
yaḥ kuryāt devadeveśi nṛpaḥ vā bhūsura uttamaḥ
vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ athavā devi sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt

original: p. 154) anye ca mama sāmīpyaṃ satya satyaṃ varānane |
analyzed: anye ca mama sāmīpyam satya satyam varānane
iti śrī vātulottare nitya kāṇḍe dvārapālādi taṭākalakṣaṇavidhiḥ nāma
tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi dravya āgāra ādi lakṣaṇam
dhana āgāra ambara gṛham snāna yāga gṛham pṛthak
namaḥ te devadeveśa sarva deva namaskṛta
ca ratha ādi utsava karmaṇi

original: ācāryatve ca ka śreṣṭhaḥ ke janāsparśakā vada |
analyzed: ācārya tve ca ka śreṣṭhaḥ ke jana asparśakāḥ vada
sparśakāḥ deva garbhāgāra ādi bhedataḥ

original: tatra doṣaṃ phalaṃ śāntiṃ śrotumicchāmyahaṃ guro |
analyzed: tatra doṣam phalam śāntim śrotum icchāmi aham guro
śivaḥ

original: śṛṇu vakṣyāmyahaṃ devi sarvaṃ lokahitāya ca ||
analyzed: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi aham devi sarvam loka hitāya ca
rājya kośa abhivṛddhi artham rahasya sura durlabham
caturaṅga bala arthāya subhikṣa artham manohare
dīkṣāvān sakulīnaḥ ca veda śāstra āgama anvitaḥ

original: p. 155) vaṃśavān tattvavedī ca sa dvijo liṅgapūjakaḥ ||
analyzed: vaṃśavān tattva vedī ca sa dvijaḥ liṅga pūjakaḥ
kuṭumbī satya vādī ca liṅga arcana rataḥ śuciḥ
liṅga sānnidhya vettā ca mita bhāṣī jita indriyaḥ
yājñikaḥ ca āstikaḥ dharmī kṛta saṃskāra pūrvakaḥ
varṇa āśrama ācāra paraḥ tava liṅga arcana arhakaḥ
dayāvān dāna śūraḥ ca sadā santuṣṭavān kṣamī
jana anusāra matimān sāmba liṅga arcane varaḥ
sthira liṅga ādi liṅgānām pūjakāḥ sparśakāḥ ime
ācārya lakṣaṇam vakṣye śṛṇu devi varānane
āryāvarta udbhava śrīmān sarva lakṣaṇa lakṣitaḥ
yatra viprāḥ sat ācārāḥ yatayaḥ ca tapodhanāḥ

original: santi vedāstathā yajñāḥ āryāvarta iti smṛtaḥ ||
analyzed: santi vedāḥ tathā yajñāḥ āryāvartaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
vayaḥ ṣoḍaśakāt ūrdhvam adhas saptatiḥ ucyate
kriyā ādi jñāna paryantam eka tantre su niścitam
adhyāpanam ca kartavyam aṣṭāviṃśati saṃhitāḥ

original: p. 156) uktāni pratisiddhāni punaḥ saṃbhāvitāni ca ||
analyzed: uktāni pratisiddhāni punar saṃbhāvitāni ca
sāpekṣa nirapekṣāṇi mama vākyā ahi anekadhā
karma kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
deva agni pūjakaḥ nityam guru bhakti parāyaṇaḥ
sāṃpradāya viśuddha ātmā dīkṣām dadyāt ca śiṣyake

original: āstikaḥ karma kurvīta ācāryaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate ||
analyzed: āstikaḥ karma kurvīta ācāryaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ucyate

original: anyathā tu kṛtaṃ yattu ābhicārastathaiva ca |
analyzed: anyathā tu kṛtam yat tu ābhicāraḥ tathā eva ca
tat phalam devadeveśi kartuḥ vaṃśasya nāśanam
devī
ācārya vaṃśa deveśa bhavet bahu jane yadi
tad karmakena kartavyam vada śambho mayi priya
śivaḥ
śṛṇu devi varārohe tava snehāt mayā adhunā
pravakṣyāmi samāsena śiva dam vṛddhi dam priye
vayaḥ vṛddhena tad vaṃśe tāntrikam tu samācaret
tad anyena kṛtam ced tu śatrabhiḥ bhayam ādiśet
roga bādhā tad rāṣṭre tu viśeṣataḥ
tasmāt yatnena girije vayaḥ hīnaḥ na kārayet
tad vṛddhena eva kurvīta kīrti śrī rājya siddhaye

original: rājavaṃśe tathā devi prabhuvaṃśe tathaiva ca ||
analyzed: rāja vaṃśe tathā devi prabhu vaṃśe tathā eva ca
gṛhiṇā yajvinā vaṃśe tat tat āryeṇa kārayet
anyathā doṣam āpnoti tasmāt yatnena varjayet
iti samyak samākhyātam praśna uttaram aham priye
devi
yadi akasmāt vaya pūjām ca utsava karmaṇi

original: na kṛte cettadādeka kathaṃ karmakṛtaṃ vada |
analyzed: na kṛte ced tadā ādeka katham karma kṛtam vada
deśika indreṇa na kṛte yadi akasmāt maheśvara

original: utsavādīni karmāṇi kartavyaṃ kena ca prabho |
analyzed: utsava ādīni karmāṇi kartavyam kena ca prabho
śivaḥ

original: utsavādīni karmāṇi na kṛte ca guruḥ priye ||
analyzed: utsava ādīni karmāṇi na kṛte ca guruḥ priye
deśika indrasya sahajaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ vā maheśvari

original: p. 158) tatputro vātha pautro vā bāndhavo vā tadājñayā ||
analyzed: tad putraḥ vā atha pautraḥ vā bāndhavaḥ vā tad ājñayā
sa dīkṣitāḥ tad ādeśāḥ āgama artha viśāradāḥ
sagotra jān ca kurvīta na ukta doṣaḥ kathañcana
āryakena arcite mūḍhaiḥ gāyatryā akṣara samanvitam
yāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi ta vat nirayam aśnute

original: tatkarma niṣphalaṃ devi na sānnidhyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: tat karma niṣphalam devi na sānnidhyam na saṃśayaḥ
devī
idānīm śrotum icchāmi ācāryasya jaṭādhara

original: brahmahatyādi pāpe ca yadi prāpte kathaṃ vada |
analyzed: brahmahatyā ādi pāpe ca yadi prāpte katham vada
śivaḥ

original: śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi ācāryasya dvijasya ca ||
analyzed: śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi ācāryasya dvijasya ca
brahmahatyā ādi pāpam vā upapātakam eva vā
jñānāt ajñānataḥ vā api yadi prāpte varānane

original: tatra karma na kurvīta ācāryaḥ sarvakarmasu |
analyzed: tatra karma na kurvīta ācāryaḥ sarva karmasu
prāyaścittam kadā nā asti brahmahatyā ādi saṃbhave
yadi akasmāt parokṣeta pātake ca upapātake

original: p. 159) prāyaścittena śuddhiḥ syāt yathā doṣabalābalāt ||
analyzed: prāyaścittena śuddhiḥ syāt yathā doṣa bala abalāt
tat pāpam ca nivṛtya atha nṛpasya anujñayā śive

original: tataḥ karmārhako devi tatra karma samācaret ||
analyzed: tatas karma arhakaḥ devi tatra karma samācaret
prāyaścittāt vinā tantra karma kuryāt na buddhimān
na spṛśet liṅga bimbe vā nā arcayet ca maheśvari
yadi bimbam spṛśet liṅgam pūjām ca utsavam ācaret
na sānnidhyam bhavet liṅge lakṣmīḥ grāmāt bahis gatā
catur aṅga balam hanti tad rājā mṛtyum āpnuyāt
śatrubhiḥ pīḍyate devi jvara apasmāraka ādibhiḥ

original: tasmād jñātvā guruḥ samyak prāyaścittaṃ samācaret |
analyzed: tasmāt jñātvā guruḥ samyak prāyaścittam samācaret
ācārya lakṣaṇam proktam aspṛśyān śṛṇu pārvati
sparśakān devi kṛta doṣa janān api
a dīkṣita urcite liṅge tu asānnidhyam bhavet dhruvam
a dīkṣitaḥ caturvedī na spṛśet ca api mā arcayet
bubhukṣuḥ vā mumukṣuḥ vā samayī sādhakaḥ api vā
ācāryaḥ dīkṣitaḥ devam pūjayet svartha siddhaye

original: p. 160) yathā mṛgapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīto yāti vane gajaḥ ||
analyzed: yathā mṛgapatim dṛṣṭvā bhītaḥ yāti vane gajaḥ
a dīkṣite arcite liṅge tathā bhītaḥ maheśvari
śraddhā hīnaḥ ati kṛpaṇaḥ bahu bhāṣita dīkṣitaḥ
kṛtaghnaḥ veda hīnaḥ ca durācārī ca durjanaḥ
liṅgam asparśakāḥ ca ete satya hīna ādayaḥ dvijāḥ
tava liṅga ādikam liṅgam sthira ākhyam sampad ātmakam

original: tasmād jñātvā dvijā hyete na spṛśeyuḥ kadācana ||
analyzed: tasmāt jñātvā dvijāḥ hi ete na spṛśeyuḥ kadācana
sparśayeyuḥ te tu asānnidhyam bhavet dhruvam
tasmāt ittham muhur jñātvā śānti karma samācaret
geha praveśakān vakṣye mukha nāsi ādi bhedataḥ
śrotriyāḥ sukha nāsyantam gantum yogyam varānane
ramā maṇṭapa madhyantam dvijāḥ sarve api vanditāḥ
pramādāt agragatiṣu mūlam prāṇamanum japet
pṛthak śata kumbhaiḥ ca secayet
dvijetarā khāpālikā antam kṣatriyāḥ vāhana antakāḥ
vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ prāṅkaṇa antam tad agra gamana ādiṣu

original: p. 161) mahāśāntiṃ prakartavyaṃ nāndī gavyādi māntrikaḥ ||
analyzed: mahāśāntim prakartavyam nāndī gavya ādi māntrikaḥ
puṇyāham vācya varayet deśikam ca hiraṇya dam
catvāraḥ hotṛkān vedapāragān ca tathā guruḥ
jāpakam daśa viprān ca secakān rudra saṃkhyakān
varayet mūlamantreṇa liṅga pañcāmṛta ādikaiḥ
rudra mantraiḥ ca sūkta ādyaiḥ salilaiḥ gandha saṃyutaiḥ
homayet tava mūlena tava astreṇa kalādhare
manunā śānti durgāyāḥ ghora durgā ādi mantrakaiḥ

original: samidājyaṃ caruṃ kṣaudraṃ tuṭikaṃ sarṣapaṃ tilam ||
analyzed: samidh ājyam carum kṣaudram tuṭikam sarṣapam tilam
go kṣīram ca eva dūrvā agram ayuta ardha āhuti kramāt
japa pārāyaṇaiḥ sārdham homayet nanuvittamaḥ
tava mūlam tava astram ca pañca durgā manūn kramāt
gaṇeśam yoginī mantrān caṇḍīn saptaśatīn guruḥ

original: ayutārdhaṃ sahasraṃ ca pṛthak mantraṃ japettadā |
analyzed: ayuta ardham sahasram ca pṛthak mantram japet tadā
punar pūrṇāhutim kuryāt sampātam ca samarpayet
sahasra ardha ghaṭaiḥ siñcet tasya ardhaiḥ ca tad ardhakaiḥ
bahudhā pūjayet devīm śāli ādi annam nivedayet
dīpa jālam paribhrāmya dānam daśavidham punar
da tvā vipra gaṇān bhojya kriyā jālam samarpayet
dakṣiṇām dāpayet ante praveśa agha harāya ca
śāntim vināśa durbhikṣam sannidhānam vinaśyati
tasmāt śāntim prakartavyā guruḥ prāc ukta mārgataḥ
rajakaḥ nāpitaḥ ca eva karmakārī dhvajī priyā
citra tāraḥ kulālaḥ ca punar ambara sandhi kṛt
kaivartakaḥ svarṇa kārī dhvaja antam praviśet sadā
doṣa bhāga agra gamane rāṣṭra nāśaḥ bala kṣayaḥ
rājā ca nidhanam yāyāḥ anāvṛṣṭiḥ bhaviṣyati
mūlena ghora durgāyāḥ mantreṇa ca guru uttamaḥ
śāntim prāk ukta vat kuryāt sahasra ardha ghaṭaiḥ śivām
vipra mukhyān ca saṃbhojyām mahā bhūta balim haret
mṛta jāta ādika utpanna sūtaka āviṣṭa mānuṣe
bali dvāra ādi liṅga aṅgam praviṣṭe ced katham vada

original: p. 163) prākāre prāṅkaṇe devi vāhanākhye ramā sthale ||
analyzed: prākāre prāṅkaṇe devi vāhana ākhye ramā sthale
na asi aṅga bhī sabhā sthāne parivāra ālaya ādike
dhanāgāram ātitheyī anna sadmani
naivadya bhakṣa śālāyām prāsāda śikhara ādike
dhvaja ālaye mahā pīṭhe gopure dharmamaṇṭape

original: tavālaye ca sarvatra rathavīthyāṃ ca māninī |
analyzed: tava ālaye ca sarvatra ratha vīthyām ca māninī
vṛddhi kṣaya maghā ariṣṭa jane ca eva praveśite
pṛthak doṣam pravakṣyāmi vistareṇa naga udbhave
durbhikṣam roga bādhā syāt śatru bādhā bhavet sadā
para rāja bhayam rājñaḥ rāja sainyam vinaśyati
tad rājā mṛtim āpnoti bala nāśaḥ dhana kṣayaḥ
nidhanam kośa nāśaḥ ca rāja dāni vinaśyati

original: dhānyanāśaṃ ca sasyādi rājyanāśaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||
analyzed: dhānya nāśam ca sasya ādi rājya nāśam na saṃśayaḥ
kīrti nāśaḥ bhūta bādhā mahā mārī bhayam nṛṇām
sampad jāla ādikam sarvam nāśam āpnoti asaṃśayaḥ
iti adyān ca mahuḥ jñātvā dhana rajyā abhivṛddhaye
sūtaka āviṣṭa manujaḥ kadācid na praveśayet
sakṛpa śāntim vighneśa arcana pūrvakam
nāndī gavya ādi puṇyāham vācayet tad anantaram

original: guruṃ ca dhanadaṃ caiva hotṛkān ghoṣakān pṛthak |
analyzed: gurum ca dhanadam ca eva hotṛkān ghoṣakān pṛthak
caturaḥ varayet devi jāpakān nava saṃkhyakān
sūtakān ca tathā viprān secaka arudra saṃkhyakān
liṅga śudhyan gavya mantraiḥ ādau gavyena secayet
punar puṇya aha toyena liṅgam pañcāmṛtaiḥ param
rudra mantraiḥ śuddha jalaiḥ sūktaiḥ ca navabhiḥ śivām
sūkta nāmāni vakṣyāmi śrīsūktam tava saṃjñakam
pañca durgā ādi sūktān ca sūktam pratyaṅgira ākhyakam
ramā sūkta ādibhiḥ snigdhe sūkta nāma mayā īritam
gavya mantreṇa tat gavyam prāṇa ākhyena payaḥ guruḥ
carubhiḥ samidh ājya ādyaiḥ gavyena payasā hunet
tathā sahasra saṃkhyā antaḥ ca āhutiḥ manu vittamaḥ
sahasra ardha āhutibhiḥ vā śatam aṣṭa uttara āhutiḥ

original: p. 165) punaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ kuryāt sampātājyaṃ samarpayet ||
analyzed: punar pūrṇāhutim kuryāt sampāta ājyam samarpayet
sūtaka āviṣṭa matye ced yatra yatra gamiṣyati
tad tad mūlena hotavyam pṛthak evam vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: śatakumbhe tadā siñcet sarṣapaṃ lavaṇaṃ tilam |
analyzed: śatakumbhe tadā siñcet sarṣapam lavaṇam tilam
kūśmāṇḍam māṣa dhānyam ca bhūsurebhyaḥ pradāpayet
bahu viprān ca saṃbhojya pūjayet mūla devatā
sādhāraṇa kramaḥ hi evam adhipam procyate adhunā
garbhe na asyām ramā sthāne pratiṣṭhe sūtaka anvite
dvije ca eva mahāśānti kriyā prāc ukta mārgataḥ
prāṇamantreṇa mūlena tava aṅga manubhiḥ tatas
ayuta ardhaḥ ca tasya ardha tad ardhaḥ ca āhutīḥ hunet
snapaye ghaṭa sāhasraiḥ sahasrārdheḥ tad ardakaiḥ
go bhūmi ādīni dānāni dadyāt tad doṣa śāntaye

original: viprāṃścaiva bahūn bhojyā śeṣaṃ karma puroktavat |
analyzed: viprān ca eva bahūn bhojyā śeṣam karma purā ukta vat
brahma hā madyapā svarṇa steyī ca gurutalpa gaḥ
tad saṃyoga ādayaḥ viprāḥ liṅga geham naga ātmaje
na viśeyuḥ na pramādāt devatā ālayam
yadi praveśayeyuḥ te prākāra ādi prabhedake

original: pṛthak doṣaṃ ca tacchāntiṃ śṛṇu devi yathākramam ||
analyzed: pṛthak doṣam ca tad śāntim śṛṇu devi yathākramam
brahma hatyāpite mantye prākāra anta praveśite

original: rājño rāṣṭrasya bhaṅgatvaṃ durbhikṣa syānna saṃśayaḥ ||
analyzed: rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya syāt na saṃśayaḥ
tad janam ca parityajya vidhivat śāntim ācaret

original: tatra śānti prakurvīta akṛte bahudoṣa bhāk ||
analyzed: tatra śānti prakurvīta akṛte bahu doṣa bhāj

original: maṇṭape sukha nāsye cet praviṣṭe brahmaghātake |
analyzed: maṇṭape sukha nāsye ced praviṣṭe brahmaghātake
para rāja bhayam rājñaḥ virājya tvam na saṃśayaḥ
dhana dāra ādi rāja bhogaḥ tathā eva ca
tasmāt jñātvā iti doṣa oghān tad kṣaṇāt tam parityajet

original: śāntiṃ ca vidhivat kṛtvā mahābhūtabaliṃ haret |
analyzed: śāntim ca vidhivat kṛtvā mahā bhūta balim haret
brahma hā garbha geha antar praviṣṭe ced maheśvari
pramādāt liṅga saṃsparśe sannidhānam vinaśyati
rājñaḥ mṛtiḥ bhavet sadyas rāja dānī tathā eva ca
śatru bādhā virājya tvam rāja vaṃśa kṣayaḥ bhavet
tasya amātyāḥ sainya pādyāḥ vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ
mahā mārī bhayam nṝṇām prajā nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: parityajya tadai śū brahmahādi janān guruḥ ||
analyzed: parityajya tadai śū brahma hādi janān guruḥ
punar śāntim prakartavyā vakṣyamāṇena mārgataḥ
tad śāntim saṃpravakṣyāmi saṃkṣepeṇa kalādhare
vināyakam samabhyarcya nāndīkarma tatas param
puṇyāham vācayet tatra pavamāna ādi mantrakaiḥ
prākāra veśanī devam aṣṭottaraśataiḥ ghaṭaiḥ
secayet tat vidhānena na prāṅkaṇe ca praveśite
snapaye dvi śataiḥ kumbhaiḥ aṣṭāyugma adhikaiḥ śivān
maṇṭape bhūsurābhye ca sukha śālām praveśite

original: sahasrārdhaghaṭaiḥ siñcaiḥ deva devīṃ ca śāmbhavīm ||
analyzed: sahasra ardha ghaṭaiḥ deva devīm ca śāmbhavīm
liṅga geham praviṣṭaḥ ced liṅga saṃsparśane yadi
vidhivat ghaṭa sāhasraiḥ sāmba liṅgam tava ātmakam
tatas homam prakurvīta mama gāyatri mantrataḥ
mūlamantreṇa ghoreṇa prāṇamantreṇa deśikaḥ
ayuta ardha ardha āhutibhiḥ ayuta ardha āhutiḥ hunet
ayutam maṇṭapena asyām liṅga geha praveśane
samidh ājya ādibhiḥ dravyaiḥ hunet sārdha ayuta āhutiḥ
gāyatrīm mūlamantram ca ghoramantrīm navākṣarīm
brahma mantram ca dikpālān parivāra manūn api
japet homa avasāna antam daśa dānam tatas param
anna dāna ādikam dadyāt tad doṣa śamanāya ca
bhojayet bahu viprān ca prākāra ādi sthale śucā
iti śrī vātulottare durgā bhede nityakarmakāṇḍe śiva pārvatī saṃvāde
liṅgapūjakādi nirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭādaśa paṭalaḥ
mahādeva namaḥ tubhyam mahīpati hitā sukhāya ca
namaḥ te jagat ādhāra namaḥ te phālalocana
mad liṅge naittikam karma ghaṭi bhedena śaṅkara
tad karma nivṛtiḥ nāma ghaṭi bhedena vistarāt

original: p. 169) uṣatkālādi rātrāntaṃ guruḥ kālādi māninī |

analyzed: śṛṇu vakṣye viśeṣeṇa sampad rājya abhivṛddhaye
uṣaḥ kāle kam utthāya sva gurum cintayet budhaḥ
namaḥ te devadeveśa sarva deva namaskṛta
liṅga saṃpūjakāḥ ke ca ratha ādi utsava karmaṇi

original: ācāryatve ca kaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ke janā sparśakā vada ||
analyzed: ācārya tve ca kaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ke janāḥ sparśakāḥ vada
tathā eva asparśakāḥ deva garbhāgāra ādi bhedataḥ

original: tatra doṣaṃ phalaṃ śāntiṃ śrotumicchāmyahaṃ guro ||
analyzed: tatra doṣam phalam śāntim śrotum icchāmi aham guro
śṛṇu vakṣyāmi aham devi sarva loka hitāya ca
rājya kośa abhivṛddhi artham rahasya sura durlabham
caturaṅga bala arthāya subhikṣa artham manohare
dīkṣāvān sat kulīnaḥ ca veda śāstra āgama anvitaḥ

original: vaṃśavān tattvavedī ca sa dvijo liṅgapūjakaḥ ||
analyzed: vaṃśavān tattva vedī ca sa dvijaḥ liṅga pūjakaḥ
kuṭumbī satya vādī ca liṅga arcana rataḥ śuciḥ
liṅga sānnidhya vettā ca mita bhāṣī jita indriyaḥ
yājñikaḥ ca āstikaḥ dharmī iduhindi sammandha kannaḍa lipi
mahādeva namaḥ tubhyam mahīpati sukhāya ca
mahājanam udārthāya rājya kośa abhivṛddhaye
namaḥ te jadādhāre namaḥ te phālalocana
mad liṅge naittikam karma ghaṭi bhedena śaṃkara
tad karma vivṛtiḥ nāma katham karma mitam śiva
vipra saṃkhyān daiśika ādi pṛthak teṣām ca dakṣiṇām
tat tat mantram tat palam ca śrotum icchāmi aham vada
śaṅkaraḥ uvāca
tvad liṅge naittikam karma ghaṭi bhedena vistarāt
śṛṇu vakṣye viśeṣeṇa sampad rājya abhivṛddhaye
uṣaḥ kāle samutthāya sva gurum cintayet budhaḥ
cāraka ādi dvijaiḥ sārdham nadīm gatvā aruṇa udaye
śauca ācāra vidhim nītvā snātvā vipra gaṇaiḥ saha
nāḍyām ca nava pañcāśat sva nityāni samāpayet
tava ālayam samāgatya vipra bṛnda ādikaiḥ saha
pālike prārthayitvā āryaḥ kavoṭa udghāṭanam kriyāt
jaya ghaṇṭā ādi nādena śaṅkha bherī ādi nissvanaiḥ
sarva vādya ravaiḥ sārdham stotram gītam ca nartanam
vīṇī veṇu ravaiḥ devi vādayet tava bodhane

original: samyak prabodhya dīpāṃśca dīpamantraṃ vadan budhaḥ |
analyzed: samyak prabodhya dīpān ca dīpa mantram vadan budhaḥ

original: deśikānujñayā viprāḥ liṅgaṃ pīṭhaṃ ca tadgṛham ||
analyzed: deśika anujñayā viprāḥ liṅgam pīṭham ca tad gṛham
saṃśodhya kṣālayeyuḥ te siddhi sādhanam asūyakaiḥ
saṃmārjya vāyubījena prokṣaṇam saudha bījataḥ
kṣālanam vāruṇa astreṇa tava mūlena śailaje

original: sukhanāsiṃ maṇṭapaṃ ca vāhanākhyaṃ ca gopuram ||
analyzed: sukhanāsim maṇṭapam ca vāhana ākhyam ca gopuram
sabhā maṇṭapa harmya ādi parivāra ālaya ādikam
ṣaṣṭi nāḍyām dvija ādyāḥ ca varṇa bhedena cārakāḥ

original: tatra tatra pṛthak kuryuḥ bahirdvārāvadhi priye |
analyzed: tatra tatra pṛthak kuryuḥ bahis dvāra avadhi priye
tava agre dvāra deśe ca dharmaśravaṇa maṇṭape
ghaṭisthāne sabhā ākhye ca parivāra niketane
rañjayet raṅga vālya ādyaiḥ rajobhiḥ pañcabhiḥ param
naḍikā prathama ādau tu ghaṭikā pātram arcayet
saura mantreṇa svanaiḥ
nadī toyam samānīya vardhanyām yojya mūlataḥ
sva śākhā ukta dvijaiḥ sārdham tava vandana pūrvakam
guruḥ antar praviśya atha liṅga dakṣiṇa bhāgake
maṇḍalāni likhet ādau samārādhya vināyakam
nāndī karma ādi puṇyāham mūla liṅga gṛha āditaḥ
sūpa dhānya ādi sarvatra vāpayet varayet dvijān
gurum pitāmaham dravya dāyakam bimbavāhanam
sadasyam caturaḥ veda ghoṣakān pañca sūktakān
pañca pūjakān jāpakān tathā

original: pradakṣiṇa kṛtastrīṃśca nṛtyarthaṃ trīn janān tadā ||
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa kṛtaḥ trīn ca nṛti artham trīn janān tadā
cāra artham daśa viprān ca pṛthak tad mūlamantrataḥ

original: pavamāna ghaṭaṃ nyasya kumbhaṃ yaṣṭvā vidhānataḥ ||
analyzed: pavamāna ghaṭam nyasya kumbham yaṣṭvā vidhānataḥ
gavya kumbha stha gavyena gavya mantram udīrayet
pāvamānena sūktena tad ghaṭa stha udakena ca
siñcet liṅgam ca gaṅgāyāḥ sahasraiḥ nāmabhiḥ param
yaṣṭvā pañca upacāra ādyaiḥ tava bīja samanvitaiḥ
sārdha dvi nāḍyā dadhi annam samarpya manunā tava
tāmbūlam dāpayet devyāḥ sa vatsa āgām nirīkṣayet
pañcāṅga śravaṇam paścāt nīrājyam bhrāmayet tatas

original: mantraiḥ puṣpaṃ samabhyarcya punaḥ pañcāmṛtaiḥ śivām |
analyzed: mantraiḥ puṣpam samabhyarcya punar pañcāmṛtaiḥ śivām
taiḥ mantraiḥ secayet liṅgam rudra mantreṇa tatparam
rudra saṃkhyā vṛtam rudram tvad antar secya bhaktitaḥ
kālīsūktena durgāyāḥ sūktena ārya abhidhena ca
śūlinīsūktamantreṇa secayitvā pṛthak guruḥ
rudra kumbha udakena ante kālī ghaṭa jalena tu
tava ālaya catur dikṣu veda pārāyaṇa ādikam

original: kālīmanuṃ ca sauraṃ ca natikaṃ tarpaṇaṃ tadā ||
analyzed: kālī manum ca sauram ca natikam tarpaṇam tadā
durgā manum ca vahni astram śūlini manum uttamam
japet tava upahāra antam pṛthak pallava saṃyutam
pradakṣiṇam natim ca eva bali dāna avadhi priye
kālī mālā manum paścāt durgā mālā abhidham guruḥ

original: āryā bhagavatī mālāṃ tava mālāmanuṃ kramāt |
analyzed: āryā bhagavatī mālām tava mālā manum kramāt

original: japan sahasramardhaṃ vā śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tu vā ||
analyzed: japan sahasram ardham vā śatam aṣṭa uttaram tu vā
tvad liṅga dakṣiṇe bhāge paścime vā atha ca uttare

original: koṇe koṇāntarāle vā mūlagehe tvathāpi vā ||
analyzed: koṇe koṇa antarāle vā mūlagehe tu atha api vā

original: maṇṭape vāhanākhye ca pṛthaṅmantrān japet tadā |
analyzed: maṇṭape vāhana ākhye ca pṛthak mantrān japet tadā
karvīta manunā prārthya kālī kalpa ukta vat guruḥ
yaṣṭvā tad nāmabhiḥ liṅgam sahasraiḥ bīja saṃyutaiḥ
durgā ārya śūlinīnām ca sahasraiḥ nāmabhiḥ yajet
pañca puṣpa añjaliḥ da tvā sāmpradāya ukta vat yathā
upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ tava mūlam japet śatam
madhuśarkarayā yuktam bāla cūta phalaiḥ yutam
pāyasam bhakṣa pānīya lehya coṣya ādi saṃyutam
mūlena dhūpa dīpa ādikam guruḥ
nivedayet tatas bhaktyā dvāram ācchādya vastrataḥ
homa geham praviśya atha mūlena aṣṭa uttaram śatam

original: hutvā sampātamādāya tava mūlan vadan budhaḥ |
analyzed: hutvā sampātam ādāya tava mūlan vadan budhaḥ
prakṣālya pādau ācamya ghaṇṭā tāḍana pūrvakam
tyajet ācchādanam paścāt nivedyāni visarjayet
prasanna arghyām ca da tva ante tāmbūla arpaṇam āditas
bhrāmayet dīpa jālān ca nīrājya antam ca buddhimān
nīra dīpam darśayitvā mantra puṣpa arcanam tatas
parivārān samabhyarcya jaya ghaṇṭā rava ādikaiḥ
bhūtān āhūya mūlena mālāmantreṇa deśikaḥ
bali dānam ca ṣaṇṇāḍyām utsavam ca pracārayet
padma dīpam samarcya īśi pāda prakṣālana āditas
tava bimbam praviśya antar candra dīpam pradarśayet
karma jālam samarpya ante sat bhaktyā mantra vittamaḥ
karma saṃpūrṇa tā vācyai kṛcchram dadyāt param guruḥ
pañca uttaram ṣaṣṭi karma prātaḥkāle mayā īritam
sarva bhoga pradam divyam sarva agha ogha vināśanam
subhikṣa dam śoka haram sarva śatru jaya pradam
vaṃśa vṛddhi karam sadyas kāmita artha pradam priye

original: iti śrīvātulottare durgā bhede nityakarmakāṇḍe śivapārvatīsaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī vātulottare durgā bhede nityakarmakāṇḍe śiva pārvatī saṃvāde
nāma ekonaviṃśati paṭalaḥ
madhyāhna naimittika karma pravakṣyāmi atha sundari
saṅgavī saptanāḍī ādi dvādaśāntam manu uttamaḥ
śuddha ātmā bhūsuraiḥ sārdham sva nityāni samāpya ca

original: deśakālau ca saṃkīrtya tava putraṃ yajetparam ||
analyzed: deśa kālau ca saṃkīrtya tava putram yajet param
puṇyāham vācya varayet ukta vat bhūsura uttamān

original: guruṃ ca dhanadaṃ caiva sadasyaṃ sarvato'dhikam ||
analyzed: gurum ca dhanadam ca eva sadasyam sarvatas adhikam
secakān rudra saṃkhyān ca vāhakam veda vādikam

original: p. 177) sūktakān pūjakān devi pṛthak pañca dvijottamān ||
analyzed: sūktakān pūjakān devi pṛthak pañca dvijottamān
mantra pallava saṃyuktān jāpakān pañcaviṃśatiḥ

original: pradakṣiṇa janān pañca natyarthaṃ pañca bhūsurān ||
analyzed: pañca nati artham pañca bhūsurān
dharma śāstra pravaktāram jyotiṣa jñam jana priye
varayet tava mūlena kṛcchram dadyāt sva śaktitaḥ
rudra saṃkhya dvijaiḥ sārdham yaṣṭvā rudra ghaṭam punar
sudhā rasa eramā kumbham nyastvā tad vidhinā arcya ca
liṅgam sudhā rasaiḥ siñcet te sarve nyāsa pūrvakāḥ
rudra mantra amba danta sthe pṛthak ā ekādaśa āhutiḥ
secayitvā janaiḥ liṅgam mantra jālān japet kramāt
catur vedān geha dikṣu vidikṣu astra manūn punar
brahmāstram vāruṇa astram ca tava astram cakra saṃjñakam
ramā mantram kumārī ākhyam ambikā manu saṃyutam
nava durgā manum devi vāhana ākhyam gaṇeśvaram

original: skandaṃ ca vīrabhadraṃ ca vāyuputramanuṃ guruḥ ||
analyzed: skandam ca vīrabhadram ca vāyuputra manum guruḥ
pālike parivāra ākhyam tava mūla manum tadā

original: p. 178) caṇḍīṃ saptaśatīṃ tatra vivārṇajñā dvijottamāḥ ||
analyzed: caṇḍīm saptaśatīm tatra dvijottamāḥ
tava saṃkhyāḥ ca te proktāḥ sāmpradāya vidaḥ tadā
ramā kumbhasya pūrva ādi paritas pariveṣṭitāḥ
japeyuḥ tam spṛśeyuḥ te secana antam vicakṣaṇāḥ
pradakṣiṇam ca eva dīpa antam parivartayet
dharma śāstra purāṇāni vācayitvā tad agrake
rudra kumbha udakena ante liṅgam secya manu uttamaḥ
naivedyam vividham sthāpya dīpa jālān ca darśayet
trayodaśe ca nāḍī ādau siñcet pañcāmṛtaiḥ punar
pañca puṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya ramāsu uktena tat param
kumāryāḥ ca eva sūktena devīsūktena mantra vid
ambikāsu ukta manunā ghanasāra udaka ādikaiḥ
vana ākhyāyāḥ ca sūktena ramā kumbha udakena ca
ramā nāma sahasra ādyaiḥ kumārī nāmabhiḥ tadā
sahasraiḥ ambikāyāḥ ca mahiṣāntakyāḥ ca nāmabhiḥ
gāyatrī nāmabhiḥ paścāt sahasraiḥ kusuma akṣataiḥ

original: p. 179) yaṣṭvā saṃprārthya bahudhā liṅgamudrāṃ pradarśayet ||
analyzed: yaṣṭvā saṃprārthya bahudhā liṅga mudrām pradarśayet
naivedyam dhūpa dīpa ādyam arpayitvā vidhānataḥ
ghaṭikā atithi saṃkhyā antam bhaktyā pūjām vidhāya ca
mahā pūjā prakartavyā ramā kalpa ukta vat guruḥ
pūjayet sa upacāra ādyaiḥ tava mūlāḥ tadā
śālyānnam sūpa śāka ādyam ghṛta bhakṣa samanvitam

original: pāyasaṃ lehya coṣyādi ṣaḍrasaiḥ saṃyutaṃ priye ||
analyzed: pāyasam lehya coṣya ādi ṣaṣ rasaiḥ saṃyutam priye
devasya tvā iti mantreṇa puṣpa akṣata jala anvitaḥ
nivedayet tatas devyai dvāra ācchādana pūrvakam
pālike vāhanam yaṣṭvā a haviḥ dadyāt sva nāmabhiḥ
brahmaṇā dhanadena aryaḥ sadasyena sa deha vat

original: yāgabhūmiṃ tato gatvā kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍilādike |
analyzed: yāga bhūmim tatas gatvā kuṇḍe vā sthaṇḍila ādike
samidh ājyaiḥ ca payasā sarpiṣā caruṇā saha
tava mūlena juhuyāt aṣṭottaraśata āhutiḥ
pūrṇāhutim hunet ante homa karma samāpya ca

original: taccheṣaṃ ca samādāya mūlamantraṃ vadan guruḥ |
analyzed: tad śeṣam ca samādāya mūlamantram vadan guruḥ
liṅga āgneyyām ca nikṣipya sampāta ājya samanvitaḥ

original: saṃkṣālya hastau pādau ca ācamya saha bhaktitaḥ |
analyzed: saṃkṣālya hastau pādau ca ācamya saha bhaktitaḥ
ghaṇṭā tāḍana pūrva ādi dvārasya ācchādanam tyajet
naivedyam visṛjet ante tatra saṃkṣālya tat param
prasanna arghyam ca tāmbūlam tatvā arcya guruḥ ācamet
kapila aṃgām samānīya pradakṣiṇa vaśāt tatas
sa vatsām maṇḍanaiḥ yuktām mūlena agre yajet tadā
nirīkṣya arcya haviḥ da tvā prārthayitvā vidhānataḥ
veda maṅgala ghoṣa ādyaiḥ pañca vādya ravaiḥ saha
sat bhaktaiḥ gāyaka ādyaiḥ ca vandi māgadha pāṭakaiḥ
prabhu uttamaiḥ janaiḥ sārdham dīpa oghān bhrāmayet guruḥ
dhūpam dadyāt paṭa ākāram dīpam vṛttena bhrāmayet
tri vāram ca eka dīpam ca pañca vāram śara ākhyakān
sapta śeṣa ākhyakān devi cakra dīpān tathā eva ca
nava vāram bhauma dīpān daśa nīrājanam tatas

original: trivāraṃ caiva candrākhyaṃ tattanmantrān vadan budhaḥ |
analyzed: tri vāram ca eva candra ākhyam tad tad mantrān vadan budhaḥ
pṛthak saṃbhrāmayet ante mantra puṣpa arcana anvitaḥ
parivārān samabhyarcya dhūpa dīpa ādikaiḥ param
bhūtān āhūya ghaṇṭā ādyaiḥ nāḍyān aṣṭādaśa kramāt
dvāra ādi bali pīṭha antam balim dadyāt sva nāmabhiḥ
kṣetrapāya tatas da tvā tad tad mantreṇa deśikaḥ
tad ante ca utsavam kuryāt utsava ante tad agrake
tava bimbam paribhrāmya padma dīpena suvrate
tat pāṅkaṇam praviśya atha niśā mantreṇa mantra vid
niśā toyam samādāya tava beram triśas punar
tava mantram vadan bhrāmya visṛjet vāma gocare
tava bimbam praveśya antar pāda prakṣālanāt itas
liṅgasya dakṣiṇe nyastvā tat caitanyam niyojayet

original: arghyaṃ datvā prasannārthaṃ candradīpaṃ pradarśya ca ||
analyzed: arghyam da tvā prasanna artham candra dīpam pradarśya ca
karma jālam samarpya ante tava mūlam japet śatam
pāda udakam tu nirmālyam viprāṇām karma cāriṇām
bhaktānām ca eva sarveṣām dadyāt vāhana dakṣiṇe

original: p. 182) valabhyāṃ bandhayedvāraṃ nāḍyaṃ viṃśati deśikaḥ ||
analyzed: valabhyām bandhayet vāram nāḍyam viṃśati deśikaḥ
caturviṃśati nāḍyā ante ātitheyī ādi bhūsurān
dampatim kanyakāḥ ca eva vipra mukhyān naga ātmaje
kṛśān andhān ca badhirān daridrān ca kuṭumbinaḥ
ananyagatikān ca eva bhojayet toṣya bhaktitaḥ
sarva pāpa haram divyam rājya kośa abhivṛddhi dam
trailokya vaśya dam devi bhūpateḥ vibhava pradam
dehānte tava rūpa tva pradam sāyujya dam priye

original: iti śrīvātulottare durgā bhede nityakarmakāṇḍe śivapārvatīsaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī vātulottare durgā bhede nityakarmakāṇḍe śiva pārvatī saṃvāde
nāma viṃśatiḥ paṭalaḥ
page ṇaḥ is missing

original: p. 183) sāyādi bhūrūrātrāntaṃ karmajālaṃ ca naittikam |
analyzed: sāya ādi bhū rūrātra antam karma jālam ca naittikam
pravakṣyāmi naga udbhūte vistarāt śṛṇu sāṃpratam
vipra uttamaiḥ cāraka ādyaiḥ sārdham snātvā guru uttamaḥ
tava geham praviśya atha bherī śaṅkhara vādibhiḥ
saptaviṃśati nāḍyāḥ ca dvāra bandham tyajet punar
saṃmārjya prokṣya garbha ādi sarvatra kṣālayet tadā
prājāpatya ādi mantreṇa puṇyāham vācya bhūsurān
varayet deśika ādīn ca tava mūlena suvrate
deśikam dhanadam ca eva brahmāṇam sarva bodhakam
tvarita ākhyam bali artham bimba dhārakam

original: sūktārtha nāmapūjārthaṃ pañca pañca pṛthak dvijān |
analyzed: nāma pūjā artham pañca pañca pṛthak dvijān
pradakṣiṇa artham nati artham ṣaṣ ghanān varayet param
dharma śāstra purāṇāya nyāya śāstrāya caṇḍike
dvau viprau varayet paścāt cāra artham daśa bhūsurān
tvarita ākhya ghaṭam yaṣṭvā śārada ākhyam sudhā rasān
samarcya ukta vidhānena rudra saṃkhyā dvijāḥ tadā

original: p. 184) namo rudrebhya ityādi vadanti nyāsapūrvakam |
analyzed: namaḥ rudrebhyaḥ ityādi vadanti nyāsa pūrvakam
siñcet sudhā rasaiḥ liṅgam punar śuddha udakaiḥ dvijāḥ
tad ghaṭa stha udakena ante guruḥ tad vidhinā arcayet
ardha ambikā īśa mantreṇa sahasraiḥ nāmabhiḥ param
bahūni antāni naivedyam vividham bhakṣa saṃyutam
nāḍyām ca ekonaviṃśatyām samarpya tava mūlataḥ
darśayet dīpa jālān ca mantraiḥ puṣpa arcanam param
tatas godhūlikā kāle triṃśat nāḍyā avasānake
ghaṭiyantram samuddhārya tad mūla manunā guruḥ
gosūktam pravadan secya samarca ukta vidhānataḥ
bhūṣita aṅgān samānīya lakṣaṇaiḥ vatsa saṃyutām
geham pradakṣiṇīkṛtya samarcya ukta haviḥ dadet
naivedyam arcya mūlena dīpa jālām pradarśayet
pañca puṣpa arpaṇa antā ca bali dīpa natim tadā
punar sudhā rasaiḥ siñcet rātrisūktena mantra vid
caṇḍikāyāḥ ca sūktena vāṇīsūktena tat param
sūktena bhuvaneśvaryāḥ liṅgam saṃsecayet pṛthak
vāṇī ghaṭa udakena ante secayitvā arcayet tatas
vāṇīkalpa ukta vat mantrī pūjā karma samācaret
pārāyaṇam dikṣu kuryāt purāṇa paṭhana ādikam
caṇḍikā ādi vāṇī vāgīśa saṃjñakān
prati aṅgiraḥ pañca durgām mṛtyoḥ tulyam ca sundarīm

original: rakṣāghnaṃ vāstumantraṃ ca dhāraṇākhyāṃ ca bālakām ||
analyzed: rakṣā ghnam vāstu mantram ca dhāraṇā ākhyām ca bālakām

original: indrākṣīṃ śivakavacaṃ tu sādhyanāmā sahaiva tu |
analyzed: indrākṣīm śivakavacam tu sādhya nāmā saha eva tu
natim pradakṣiṇam ca eva bhūta āhvāna antam ucyate
caṇḍikā nāmabhiḥ ca ādau śāradāyāḥ ca nāmabhiḥ
sahasraiḥ vākya nāyakyā lalitā nāmabhiḥ param
sahasraiḥ ca pṛthak pūjya japet mūlamanum gatam

original: tato nāḍyā trayastriṃśe naivedyaṃ vividhaṃ guruḥ ||
analyzed: tatas nāḍyā trayastriṃśe naivedyam vividham guruḥ
samarpya tava mūlena dīpa oghān bhrāmayet tadā
pañca puṣpāṇi mūlena da tvā natvā vidhānataḥ

original: p. 186) tadante ca mahāpūjāṃ nyāsajālādi māntrikaḥ |
analyzed: tad ante ca mahā pūjām nyāsa jāla ādi māntrikaḥ
mātṛkām golakānyāsa madhyanyāsam ca pīṭhakām
sarvāṇi vidhāya tava mūlataḥ

original: yaṣṭvā liṅgaṃ ca bahubhiḥ patraiḥ puṣpaistilākṣataiḥ ||
analyzed: yaṣṭvā liṅgam ca bahubhiḥ patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ tila akṣataiḥ
upacāra tva saṃkhyāyām dhūpa dīpa samanvitam
nivedayet tatas devyāḥ homa geham praviśya ca
mūlena samidh ājya ādi havi vrīhīn payaḥ tilān
dūrvā agram ca hunet agnau śatam aṣṭa uttara āhutiḥ
vyāhṛtyā mūlamanunā punar pūrṇāhutim hunet
homa śeṣam gave da tvā sampāta ājya samanvitaḥ
prakṣālita aṅghrī hastau ca mantreṇa ācamanīyakam

original: nītvā dvāraṃ ca yaṣṭvāryaḥ tadvastraṃ ca visarjayet ||
analyzed: nītvā dvāram ca yaṣṭvā āryaḥ tad vastram ca visarjayet
haviḥ udvāsya tad śeṣam muṇḍinyai ca pradāpayet
prasanna arghyam ca da tvā ante tāmbūlāni arpya bhaktitaḥ
raṅga pūjā prakartavyā dhvaja antam ca viśeṣataḥ
pura antam gopura antam vā geha dvāra avasānakam
pārśvayoḥ paritas ca eva bahu dīpān prabodhayet
bodhayet candra dīpa antam dīpa jālān vicakṣaṇaḥ
mantraiḥ puṣpam samarcya arpya ante parivārān yajet tadā
jaya ghaṇṭā ādikaiḥ vādyaiḥ bhūtān āhūya mūlataḥ
aṣṭatriṃśat gurum nāḍyām bali dānam sva nāmabhiḥ
da tvā samāpya bali ante vīṇā kāhala nisvanaiḥ
pañca vādya ravaiḥ sārdham bahis āvṛtau
nītvā bimbam ca utsava ante nija bhakta janaiḥ saha
catvāriṃśat vināḍī ādau praviśya āsthāna maṇṭapam
tat antara ādi bhedena pravakṣyāmi manohare
deva antaram ca dīpa ākhyam tad ante deśika antaram
vipra antaram ca daṇḍa ākhyam pañca antara mṛdā āhṛtam
deva antaram ca deveśi nyastvā saṃpūjayet punar
dīpa stambhau ca dīpa ākhye tava dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ
vinyaset tām deva saghyau dīpa pātra traya anvitau
sa guroḥ antare devi tathā eva guru vāhakau
pratiṣṭhetām guroḥ vāme dhanadaḥ ca pitāmahaḥ
vipra mukhyāḥ vyavasthitāḥ
tava pṛṣṭhe guroḥ śiṣyāḥ cārāḥ vāhaka dakṣiṇe
punar vipra antare devi dakṣiṇe vedapāragāḥ
bimba pṛṣṭhe jāpaka ādyāḥ tad vāme stotra vācakāḥ
tava agre pārśvayoḥ ca eva dharma śāstra prabodhakau
daṇḍa antare svarṇa daṇḍa bibhrakau stotra vācakau
vyavasthitau ca tad dakṣe pṛṣṭhe vāma pradeśake
vyavasthitāḥ śuciḥ bhūtāḥ bali dīpa dharāḥ janāḥ
daṇḍa antarāt adhas sthāne tava agre ca sama sthale
pañca hasta antaram tiryak hitvā bhūmim sureśvari
tad pārśvayoḥ dvayoḥ devi paṅkti rūpeṇa vāgyatāḥ
ardha hasta antaram madhye paṅkti sthānāni athākramāt

original: nītvā pṛthak pṛthak tatra sevakādi prabhedataḥ ||
analyzed: nītvā pṛthak pṛthak tatra sevaka ādi prabhedataḥ
chatrakau vāyu paṭakau maṅgala āyudha saṃyutau
daṇḍavījana martyau ca gāyakau vāyubījakau
rūpa yauvana saṃpanna cāmara strī kadambakau
tāmbūla bibhrake devi tāmbūla ucchiṣṭa pātrake
bibhrake jala pātre ca punar ādarśa darśake
bali dīpa dharau martyau puṣpa vṛṣṭi karau narau
vipra uttamāḥ dakṣa paṅktau vāma paṅktau nṛpa ādikāḥ
vādyakāḥ nāṭyakā snigdhe gaṇikāḥ nṛtta vedikāḥ
vyavasthitāḥ payauḥ paṅktau gaja aśva ādyāḥ dhvaja anvitāḥ
bhaktā bhaṭā darśaka ādyā tayoḥ agre vyavasthitā
tatas devīm samārādhyā caṇakaiḥ ca phala ādikaiḥ
pakvaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ sārdham dhūpa dīpa ayutam guruḥ
naivedyam ca arpayet tasmāt tāmbūlam dāpayet param
bhauma ākhyān cakra dīpān ca padmanīrāja saṃjñakam
hima antam bhrāmayet devīm manu puṣpa arcanam tatas
sevā jālam ca veda ādi śrāvayet prārthanā ādikam
namaḥ tubhyam mahākāli siddha gandharva sevite
rājñaḥ rājya abhivṛddhi artham ṛc ṛcam śṛṇu pārvati
mahā lakṣmi namaḥ tubhyam brahma ādi sura sevite
dhana kośa abhivṛddhi artham yajurveda manum śṛṇu
sarasvati namaḥ tubhyam sarva deva gaṇa anvite
kīrti kānti subhikṣa artham sāma gānam śṛṇu priye
mūrti traya ātmakam devi namaḥ tubhyam maheśvari
atharvaṇaḥ ṛcam śrutvā vāñchita artham prayacchame

original: kramādvedamanūn śrāvya puṣpaṃ dadyāt pṛthak pṛthak |
analyzed: kramāt veda manūn śrāvya puṣpam dadyāt pṛthak pṛthak
vedānte gāyakau gāne śaṅkhanādam tad antare
vādayet gati vādyāni nartanam bharata uktataḥ
nartakaḥ mardakaḥ ca eva gāyakaḥ vaṃśakaḥ tathā
tatas mauralikāḥ ca ete pañca ācāryāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
rūpa yauvana saṃpannā astrī nāṭye kuśala anvitāḥ
nartakaḥ mardakaḥ ca eva tava dakṣe vyavasthitau
gāyakaḥ vaṃśaka ākhyaḥ ca vāma bhāge vyavasthitau
agre mauralikā saumye vādayet mukham tathā
gaṇikāḥ nartanam kuryuḥ sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutāḥ
nartana ante padma dīpān vakṣyamāṇa vidhānataḥ
dīpa pātrāṇi kārayet
tāla mānāni vṛttāni dala aṣṭaka yutāni ca
karṇikābhiḥ saṃyutāni teṣām madhye vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: navapātrāṇi vā sapta pañca trīṇyekameva vā ||
analyzed: nava pātrāṇi vā sapta pañca trīṇi ekam eva vā
teṣu dīrghān prabodhya ante tri vāram bhrāmayet priye
divā rātrau saha arcāyām gaṇikāḥ nṛtta lālasāḥ
gāna śāstra ukta mārgeṇa bhrāmayeyuḥ striśas param
dīpa ante sarva vādyāni vādayeyuḥ ca vādakāḥ
tava nirmālya dāna ante deśika ādi prabhedataḥ
eka bhāgam deśikāya bhāga ardham vāhakāya ca
dvau bhāgau vipra mukhyebhyaḥ nṛpa ādibhyaḥ tathā eva ca
trīn bhāgān sevaka ādibhyaḥ pradadyāt daṇḍa dhārakaḥ

original: ardhabhāgaṃ svayaṃ gṛhya sevājālaṃ samāpya ca ||
analyzed: ardha bhāgam svayam gṛhya sevā jālam samāpya ca
pradakṣiṇa vaśāt tatra mūlamantram vadan priye
tatas gānena niśśabdaiḥ śanais geham tava ātmakam
catvāriṃśat pañca nāḍyām bimbam antar praveśya ca
tava bimbātu caitatanya mūla liṅge niveśayet
punar pañca upacāra ādyaiḥ arcayitvā maheśvarīm
kṣīra annam ca kaśāya uttham jala tāmbūla saṃyutam
samarcya tava mūlena nīrājyam hima saṃjñakam
dīpam pradarśayitvā āryaḥ prasanna artham yajet varam
kriyā nyūna atirikta artham su viprāya sva śaktitaḥ
kṛcchram da tvā pratoṣya atha karma jālam samarpayet
bhaktānām parivārāṇām sevaka ādi nṛṇām priye
tu nirmālyam dadyāt tvad liṅga vāmake
catvāriṃśat sapta nāḍyām kavāṭam bandhayet guruḥ
paritas geha rakṣā artham śata saṃkhya janāḥ param
vaseyuḥ ca vinidrāḥ te gṛham gacchet manuttamaḥ
viṃśa uttaram śatam karma niśā ardhe samyak īritam

original: sampajjālapradaṃ saukhyaṃ rājño rājñāṃ ca vaṃśadam |
analyzed: sampad jāla pradam saukhyam rājñaḥ rājñām ca vaṃśa dam
nityam kāla traye pi evam uktam karma naga udbhave

original: niyamenaiva yaḥ kuryāt kasyaṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmyaham |
analyzed: niyamena eva yaḥ kuryāt puṇyam vadāmi aham

original: aihike ca bahūn bhogān subhikṣaṃ ca jayaṃ yaśaḥ ||
analyzed: aihike ca bahūn bhogān subhikṣam ca jayam yaśaḥ
prāpnuyāt sārvabhauma tvam sapta janmasya saṃśayaḥ

original: dehānte tava rūpatvaṃ mamatvaṃ ca manohare ||
analyzed: dehānte tava rūpa tvam mamatvam ca manohare

original: rahasyaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi trikāle nāḍi bhedataḥ |
analyzed: rahasyam tatra vakṣyāmi trikāle nāḍi bhedataḥ
kāle kāle prakartavyam uktam karma vicakṣaṇaḥ
kāla atīte niṣphalam syāt durbhikṣam rājya nāśanam

original: tasmād jñātvā mayoktena nāḍī bhedena pārvati ||
analyzed: tasmāt jñātvā mayā uktena nāḍī bhedena pārvati
kāle samyak guruḥ kuryāt kriyā jālam atandritaḥ
sapta deveṣu idam karma kartavyam manu vittamaḥ
pṛthak tad mantra bhedena kriyā bhedena śāmbhavi
karma pūrṇa phala avāptyai rājñaḥ śreyaḥ abhivṛddhaye

original: p. 194) tvalliṅge nityakarmārthaṃ pratyabde dakṣiṇāṃ kramāt |
analyzed: tvad liṅge nitya karma artham pratyabde dakṣiṇām kramāt
dhanada ādi pravakṣyāmi sevaka antam maheśvari
viṃśottaraśatam niṣkam dhanadāya pradāpayet
śata niṣkam deśikāya karma upadraviṇaiḥ saha
niṣka saptatikam devi brahmaṇe dāpayet param
śata ardham ca sadasyāya sarva bodhaka karmiṇe
catvāriṃśat vāhakāya jyotiṣa jñāya tat param
ghaṭikā sthāpana arthāya triṃśa niṣkam kalādhare
dharma śāstra purāṇāni vaktṛbhyām pañcaviṃśati
viṃśat niṣkam catur veda ghoṣakebhyaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
śrī rudra jāpakebhyaḥ ca niṣkam ca ekonaviṃśakam
dadyāt teṣām sevana artham pṛthak dadyāt prabhūttamaḥ
niṣkam ca aṣṭādaśa proktam sūktakebhyaḥ sureśvari
tvad nāma pūjakebhyaḥ ca niṣkam aṣṭādaśam pṛthak
saptaśati ādi viprebhyaḥ niṣka saptadaśa kramāt
jāpakebhyaḥ kalā saṃkhya niṣkam dadyāt ca tat param
pradakṣiṇa namaskāra kṛdbhyaḥ ca tithi saṃkhyakam
pṛthak kumbha arcakebhyaḥ ca tad dravyaiḥ saha buddhimān
niṣkam caturdaśam proktam cārakebhyaḥ ca tat param

original: pṛthak daṇḍadharābhyāṃ ca niṣkaṃ dvādaśa ucyate ||
analyzed: pṛthak daṇḍa dharābhyām ca niṣkam dvādaśaḥ ucyate
daśa niṣkam chatrakebhyaḥ paṭakebhyaḥ tathā eva ca
daṇḍa vījana martyānām nava niṣkam ca dāpayet
viṃśat niṣkam gāyakābhyām vījakābhyām navam pṛthak
vāra strīṇām cāmara ādi pṛthak ṣaṣ niṣkam ucyate
bali dīpa janebhyaḥ ca pañca niṣkam punar param
dhūpa dhūma karābhyām ca catur niṣkam prabhu uttamaḥ
niṣka trayam puṣpa vṛṣṭikṛdbhyām da tvā atha sundari
vandibhyaḥ māgadhebhyaḥ ca pāṭakebhyaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
daśa niṣkam pradātavyam niṣkam sārdhaśatam punar
vādyakebhyaḥ nṛtta vidbhyaḥ pṛthak dadyāt ca vetanām
vaijantī niṣkam ca eva vallabhe
rakṣakebhyaḥ gaja aśva ādīn pṛthak dvādaśa saṃkhyakān
dvāra ādi pālakebhyaḥ ca dadyāt ca manu saṃkhyakam
dravya ambara dhanāgāra pālakebhyaḥ trayodaśa
nava niṣkam ca ātitheyī ādi anna kṛdbhyaḥ pradāpayet
paritas parivārāṇām arcakebhyaḥ caturdaśa
niṣkam pṛthak toṣayet bahudhā janān
tvad geha rakṣaka ādibhyaḥ sapta niṣkam nageśvari
sarvam uktam mayā adevi dakṣiṇā karmacāriṇām
cāra ādi sevaka ādīnām sarveṣām vetanam kramāt
pratyabdam niyamān ittham da tvā toṣya mahājanān
bhaktyā natvā natya karma kartavyam iti vācayet

original: karma nyūnaṃ na kartavyaṃ kāle kāle ca deśikaḥ |
analyzed: karma nyūnam na kartavyam kāle kāle ca deśikaḥ

original: yadi nyūne tu saṃprāpte rājasampatkṣayo bhavet ||
analyzed: yadi nyūne tu saṃprāpte rāja sampad kṣayaḥ bhavet
tasmāt mantrī muhur jñātvā sarva loka hitāya ca
dhana dhānya ādi vṛddhi artham subhikṣa artham varānane
sampad rājya samṛddhi artham sarva bhoga artham eva vā
nyūnam vinā prakartavyam kriyā jālam naga ātmaje
iti śrī vātulottare durgā bhede nityakarmakāṇḍe śiva pārvatī saṃvāde
ghaṭi bhede nava durga niśi karmavivṛtinirūpaṇam nāma ekaviṃśati
paṭalaḥ
devadeva jagannātha loka anugraha kāraka
mad liṅge prātar ārabhya nitya arcana vidhiḥ śrutaḥ
samyak uktaḥ tvayā deva sarva loka hitāya ca
idānīm śrotum icchāmi kāmya artham sādhakāya ca
naimittika arcana vidhiḥ vaktavyaḥ parameśvara
śivaḥ
tat sarvam tava vakṣyāmi yat tvayā paripṛcchitam

original: tvalliṅge ca viśeṣeṇa kāmyārthaṃ tava pūjanam |
analyzed: tvad liṅge ca viśeṣeṇa kāmya artham tava pūjanam
vidhānam vistarāt devi śṛṇuṣva ekāgra mānasaḥ
sarva vṛddhi karam loke śrī karam putra pautra dam
akāla mṛtyu śamanam śatruṇām vijayaḥ bhavet

original: sādhakānāṃ tvayā devi kalau sidhyati nānyataḥ ||
analyzed: sādhakānām tvayā devi kalau sidhyati nā anyatas
smaraṇāt darśanāt ca eva trayaḥ lokaḥ cakampire

original: bhaktyā saṃpūjite liṅgaṃ trailokyaṃ ca vaśī bhavet ||
analyzed: bhaktyā saṃpūjite liṅgam trailokyam ca vaśī bhavet
cintita artha pradam nṝṇām bhoga mokṣa pradam śive
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kāmya artham tava pūjanam

original: kasyāṃ tithau ca pūjāyāṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pārvati |
analyzed: kasyām tithau ca pūjāyām vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pārvati

original: māghe vā phālgune māse caitre vaiśākhamāsake ||
analyzed: māghe vā phālgune māse caitre vaiśākha māsake
jyeṣṭha māse ca āśvayuje kārtika iṣṭa śubhe dine

original: dvitīyā pañcamī caiva aṣṭamī navamī śubhā ||
analyzed: dvitīyā pañcamī ca eva aṣṭamī navamī śubhā

original: daśamī ca trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca paurṇamī |
analyzed: daśamī ca trayodaśyām caturdaśyām ca paurṇamī

original: somo bṛhaspatiḥ śukraḥ bhaumavāre śubhaṃ bhavet ||
analyzed: somaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śukraḥ bhaumavāre śubham bhavet
candra tārā anukūle ca pūjā dravyaḥ samāharet
prātar utthāya vidhivat nitya pūjām vidhāya ca
brāhmaṇaiḥ sahasaṃyuktaḥ deśika ādi janaiḥ priye
nadī snānam prakartavyam ṣaṣ koṇam bīja pūrvakam

original: p. 199) likhatvā tīrthamadhye tu snānārthaṃ tarpaṇaṃ caret |
analyzed: likhatvā tīrtha madhye tu snāna artham tarpaṇam caret

original: tava prītyai ca saṃkalpya nimajjecca trivārakam ||
analyzed: tava prītyai ca saṃkalpya nimajjet ca tri vārakam
dhauta vastra ambara channaḥ vibhūti ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ
mūlamantram japet tatra aṣṭāviṃśati saṃkhyakaiḥ
svarṇa pātra ādi saṃpūrya tava mūlena caṇḍike
tat tīrtham ca samādāya aghamarṣaṇa mantrataḥ
veda maṅgala pāṭhaiḥ ca nṛtta gīta ādi vādyakaiḥ
devālayam alaṅkṛtya phala pallava toraṇaiḥ
siñceyuḥ gandha vāribhyaḥ sthala śuddhim vidhāya ca
bhūṣayitvā gṛham gatvā vandayet paramām śivām
namaḥ te devi kalyāṇi vāñchita artha pradam śive
naimittikasya pūjā artham anujñām bhakta vatsale
iti saṃprārthya sat bhaktyā tad agre sthāpayet phalam

original: nirvighnārthaṃ ca saṃpūjya gaṇeśaṃ ca samārabhet ||
analyzed: nirvighna artham ca saṃpūjya gaṇeśam ca samārabhet

original: nāndīṃ saṃvācya puṇyāhaṃ dravyaśuddhiṃ tu kārayet |
analyzed: nāndīm saṃvācya puṇyāham dravya śuddhim tu kārayet
karma artham varayet prājñaḥ deśika ādi dvijottamān
secayet tava liṅgam ca pañcāmṛta vidhānataḥ
prastha ādi droṇa māna antam dravya saṃkhyam iti īritam
vidhinā secayet mantrī liṅga śuddhiḥ idam bhavet
deva agre ca irā bhāge ca racaye padmam uttamam
aṣṭottaraśatam devi tad ardham pañcaviṃśatiḥ
nava dvādaśa pañca eva sthāpayet kumbham uttamam
vidhinā pūrayet paścāt ratna āṇīm gandha vāribhiḥ

original: kṣīraṃ ca pañcagavyaṃ ca kaṣāyaṃ ca sutailakam ||
analyzed: kṣīram ca pañcagavyam ca kaṣāyam ca su tailakam
phala udakaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ sa vastra pratimā anvitaiḥ
caturthī ante ca mantreṇa devam āvāhya pūjayet
kalāmantraiḥ mūlamantraiḥ spṛṣṭvā japya guru uttamaḥ
gaṇeśam kṣetrapālam ca mṛtyuñjaya navagraham
adhorāstram saptaśatim nava durgā manum śive
tava mūlena mantreṇa sahasram saṃjapet guruḥ
pradakṣiṇa namaskāram śatam aṣṭa uttaram priye
kuṇḍam vā sthaṇḍilam kuryāt caiśa bhāge viśeṣataḥ
janana agnim ca saṃsthāpya mūlamantreṇa homayet
śānti durgā manum paścāt tad ardham juhuyāt guruḥ
śatam aṣṭa uttaram devi sahasram ca uttamam bhavet
samidh ājyam pāyasam vā sapta dravyeṇa homayet
arpaṇam mūlamantreṇa su gandha payasā ambubhiḥ
pūrṇahutim tatas kuryāt abhiṣekam samācaret
snāpayet ghaṭa toyena tava liṅgam manu uttamaḥ
snānam vicitra tailena su gandhena manoharaiḥ
udvartya piṣṭa cūrṇaiḥ ca niśā pūrṇaiḥ maheśvari
uṣṇa udakena saṃsthāpya kastūrī kuṅkuma udakaiḥ
aṣṭagandham samālipya akṣatān ca manoharān
tilakam ca sa kastūrī haridrā cūrṇam añjanaiḥ
paṭṭavastraiḥ svarṇa yutaiḥ nava tantu samudbhavaiḥ

original: vastradvayaṃ tato dadyāt kañcukaṃ ca samarcayet ||
analyzed: vastra dvayam tatas dadyāt kañcukam ca samarcayet
muktā vaiḍūrya khacita tāṭaṅkam bhūṣaṇa ādibhiḥ
sugandha puṣpa mālābhiḥ pūga puṣpam sarpayet
āvāhana ādi saṃpūjya ṣoḍaśaiḥ upacārakaiḥ
sahasraiḥ nāmabhiḥ pūjya praṇava ādi samanvitaiḥ
bilva patraiḥ ca kamalaiḥ droṇa puṣpaiḥ tila akṣataiḥ
mallikā ādyaiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ ca pūjayet mantra vittamaḥ

original: tadante svarṇajaṃ devi yathā śaktyā samarpayet |
analyzed: tad ante svarṇa jam devi yathā śaktyā samarpayet
dhūpa dīpam ca naivedyam ṣaṣ rasa annam sa bhakṣakam
phalam nānāvidham devi sūpa śāka samanvitam

original: pānīyaṃ ca sakarpūraṃ tāmbūlaṃ ca samarpayet ||
analyzed: pānīyam ca sa karpūram tāmbūlam ca samarpayet
nīlāñjanam mantra puṣpam stotra pāṭham guru uttamaḥ
bali dānam tatas dadyāt naimitye ca viśeṣataḥ
brāhmaṇān bhojayet devi homa saṃkhyāt maheśvari
dampatīn pūjayet pūrvam nava saṃkhya su vāsinīḥ
sahasram ca uttamam devi śatam aṣṭa uttaram pṛthak
guru patnīm pativrata dhara astriyaḥ

original: p. 203) tailābhyaṅgaṃ vidhāyātha śucirbhūtvā pṛthak pṛthak |
analyzed: taila abhyaṅgam vidhāya atha śuciḥ bhūtvā pṛthak pṛthak
tava ālayasya paritas paṅkti rūpam su pīṭhake
upaviśya yathānyāyam guru pūjām samācaret

original: mama rūpaṃ ca saṃpūjya tava rūpaṃ samanvitam ||
analyzed: mama rūpam ca saṃpūjya tava rūpam samanvitam
śivam śaktim samāvāhya pādyam ācamana ādikam
vastra alaṅkārakam dadyāt ubhayoḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak
yathā vibhava sāreṇa pūjayitvā yathākramam
upāyanam tatas dadyāt paramānnam sa śarkaram

original: apūpaṃ ca phalaṃ devi caṇḍikā priyatāmiti |
analyzed: apūpam ca phalam devi caṇḍikā priyatām iti
tatas suvāsinī pūjām kuryāt bhakti yutaḥ priye
āvāhana arghya pādya ādi pṛthak sahasranāmabhiḥ
śatam aṣṭa uttaram vā api nava saṃkhyāni pārvati
tavam aṣṭottaraśatam nava durgān ca pūjayet
nāmabhiḥ ca caturthī antaiḥ pṛthak saṃpūjya dāpayet
pūga puṣpam niśā mūlam taṇḍulam kañcuka ādibhiḥ

original: p. 204) suvastraṃ ca dadedbhaktyā mūlamantraṃ vadan guruḥ |
analyzed: su vastram ca dadet bhaktyā mūlamantram vadan guruḥ

original: tava prītyā ca datvātha āśiṣaṃ pratigṛhya ca ||
analyzed: tava prītyā ca da tvā atha āśiṣam pratigṛhya ca

original: bhojayedbhakṣa bhojyādyaiḥ tāmbūlaṃ ca dadat pṛthak |
analyzed: bhojayet bhakṣa bhojya ādyaiḥ tāmbūlam ca dadat pṛthak
rātrau saṃpūjayet paścāt raṅga pūjām samācaret
bali dānam tatas dadyāt naimitye ca āhutiḥ dadet

original: rathe vā śibikāyāṃ vā vāhane vā vibhūṣite |
analyzed: rathe vā śibikāyām vā vāhane vā vibhūṣite

original: utsavaṃ ca tataḥ kuryāt grāmasīmāntameva vā ||
analyzed: utsavam ca tatas kuryāt grāma sīmāntam eva vā
praviśya devīm saṃpūjya kriyā jālam samarpayet
tatas samutthāya snāna sandhyā ādi tarpaṇam
vidhāya devatāgāram tava liṅge maheśvari
saṃpūjya snapayet mantrī karma lopa artham ambike
tavam aṣṭottaraśatam japet mūlamanum guruḥ

original: savatsāṃ gāṃ tato dadyāt dakṣiṇāṃ dāpayedguruḥ ||
analyzed: sa vatsām gām tatas dadyāt dakṣiṇām dāpayet guruḥ

original: bhūridānaṃ tato dadyāt kṛcchradānaṃ tataḥ param |
analyzed: bhūridānam tatas dadyāt kṛcchradānam tatas param
iti evam kārayet bhaktyā brāhmaṇaḥ ca nṛpa uttamāḥ

original: p. 205) kāmitārtha pradaṃ śīghraṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ mayoditam |
analyzed: kāmita artha pradam śīghram satyam satyam mayā uditam
manasā cintitam kāryam pūjayāḥ ca prabhāvataḥ
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti vidhinā pūjite priye
mahā pūjā vidhiḥ samyak tava snehena ca uditam
iti śrī vātulottare durgā bhede śiva pārvatī saṃvāde nityakarmakāṇḍe
naimittikapūjāvidhiḥ nāma dvāviṃśatiḥ paṭalaḥ

original: pṛthak vidhānaṃ vahneśca havanaṃ ca kathaṃ vada |
analyzed: pṛthak vidhānam vahneḥ ca havanam ca katham vada
