analyzed: kinnimittam katham homaḥ kim ca dravyam ca tad phalam
tvad mukhāt śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa vada prabho
śivaḥ

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā devi guhyādguhyatamaṃ mahat ||
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā devi guhyāt guhyatamam mahat
agni kāryam sura śreṣṭham sarva kāma phala pradam

original: mama tejomayo vahniḥ tavarūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||
analyzed: mama tejaḥ mayaḥ vahniḥ tava rūpam na saṃśayaḥ

original: jiṃhvārūpeṇa nau devi tattaddravyaṃ hi bhujyate |
analyzed: jiṃhvā rūpeṇa nau devi tat tat dravyam hi bhujyate
anyatra bhujyate dṛṣṭvā bhavet priye
etasmāt kāraṇāt śreṣṭham vahni homam ca kārayet

original: rahasyaṃ paramaṃ devi muktidaṃ ca dvijanmanā ||
analyzed: rahasyam paramam devi mukti dam ca dvijanmanā

original: havyadattaṃ tu bhuñjīta yadi śreṣṭhaṃ dvijottamaḥ |
analyzed: havya dattam tu bhuñjīta yadi śreṣṭham dvijottamaḥ
śūdra tvam karma hīna tvam patita tvam na saṃśayaḥ
sāyam pratar nitya homam prakurvīta dvijottamaḥ
iha api sukham āpnoti ante sāmīpyam īśvari
lakṣa homa ādi koṭi antam kāmya karmaṇi kārayet
homāt daśa aṃśam tad mantra japa saṃkhyā maheśvari
śata aṃśam tarpaṇam kuryāt sahasram kumbha pūjanam
ayutam bhojayet viprān pradakṣiṇa namaskṛtim
dānāni vividham dadyāt go bhumi ādi viśeṣataḥ
ittham kuryāt vidhāna jñaḥ sarva mṛtyu nivāraṇam
sarva śānti karam ca eva śatrūṇām nāśa kāraṇam
āyuḥ ārogya dam dehe
tuṣṭi dam puṣṭi dam rājñām rājya kośa vivardhanam
gaja aśva sainya durga ādi vṛddhi dam kīrti dam tathā
divi antarikṣa ādi utpāta dussvapna ādi vināśanam
graha bhūta piśāca ādi vināśana karam param
bhukti dam mukti dam ca eva sarva vāñchā phala pradam
amunā homa vidhinā bahu prīti bhavet mama

original: brahmādyā mayi saṃtuṣṭe tuṣṭā devā na saṃśayaḥ ||
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ mayi saṃtuṣṭe tuṣṭāḥ devāḥ na saṃśayaḥ
ittham śreṣṭham homa karma kalau siddhi pradāyakam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena kārayet homam arthavān
tad vidhānam pravakṣyāmi lakṣa homa vidhaiḥ pṛthak
tad kālam tad sthalam kuṇḍa maṇṭapa ādi sa lakṣaṇam
dina saṃkhyām ca tad karmaṇi ācārya ādīn ca ṛtvijaḥ

original: homadravyaṃ tatphalaṃ ca vistareṇa śṛṇu priye ||
analyzed: homa dravyam tad phalam ca vistareṇa śṛṇu priye
kārtike māsi kurvīta paurṇamyāt induvāsare
māgha māse kṛṣṇa pakṣe caturdaśyām maheśvari

original: phālgune māsi kurvīta aṣṭamī daśamī dine |
analyzed: phālgune māsi kurvīta aṣṭamī daśamī dine
caitre māsi trayodaśyām ekādaśyām atha api vā

original: vaiśākhe ca tṛtīyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhamāsi śubhe dine |
analyzed: vaiśākhe ca tṛtīyāyām jyeṣṭha māsi śubhe dine
anyat puṇya tithau mantrī grahaṇe ravi somayoḥ
a mauḍhye na adhimāse ca candra tārā anukūlake
śubha lagna graha yute duṣṭa graha vivarjite
kartuḥ ca eva anukūla ṛkṣe śubha graha nirīkṣite
eva guṇa yute kāle lakṣa homam ca kārayet
sāmba liṅga śiva kṣetre ārāme parvate taṭe
udyāne śrotriya āgāre saṅgame ca nadī taṭe
anyat puṇya sthale devi homam kuryāḥ nṛpa uttamaḥ

original: p. 209) tatsthalaṃ ca samāvīkṣya pūrve vahne tathaiśake ||
analyzed: tat sthalam ca samāvīkṣya pūrve vahne tathā aiśake
khanana ādi prakurvīta śodhayet duṣṭa varjite
catur aśram samam kṛtvā ṣaṭtriṃśat hasta mātraka
ekaviṃśati hastam vā sapta uttara daśa priye
tāvat maṇṭapa vistāram yāvat kuṇḍa mitiḥ bhavet
ratni mātra samutsedham darpaṇa udara sannibham
tad tri bhāga eka bhāgena maṇṭapasya maheśvari
kuṇḍāni racayet mantrī nava pañca ekam eva vā

original: pūrve ca caturaśraṃ syādāgneyāṃ tu bhagākṛtiḥ ||
analyzed: pūrve ca caturaśram syāt āgneyām tu bhaga ākṛtiḥ

original: ardhacandraṃ tu yāmyāyāṃ nair-ṛtyāṃ tu trikoṇakam |
analyzed: ardhacandram tu yāmyāyām nairṛtyām tu trikoṇakam
vāruṇe vartula ākuṇḍam vāyavyām ca ṣaḍaśrakam
uttare padma kuṇḍam tu īśānyām aṣṭa koṇakam
aindra śāṅkarayoḥ madhye vṛtta kuṇḍam tu kārayet

original: caturdikṣu ca catvāri caturaśraṃ tu kārayet |
analyzed: catur dikṣu ca catvāri catur aśram tu kārayet
vṛtta kuṇḍam tathā aiśānyām pañcakuṇḍe athavā śive

original: kuṇḍamekaṃ ca kurvīta vṛttaṃ vā caturaśrakam |
analyzed: kuṇḍam ekam ca kurvīta vṛttam vā caturaśrakam

original: p. 210) īśāne pūrvabhage vā kalpayecca maheśvari ||
analyzed: īśāne pūrva bhage vā kalpayet ca maheśvari
catur hastam ca eka kuṇḍam tri hastam pañca kuṇḍakam
dvi hastam nava kuṇḍam ca tāvam khāta pramāṇataḥ
vistāram tāvat ūrdhvam syāt ūrdhva mekhalayā saha

original: kuṇḍasya yādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ tādṛśī mekhalā bhavet ||
analyzed: kuṇḍasya yādṛśam rūpam tādṛśī mekhalā bhavet
tri mekhalam ca yuktam syāt aṣṭa ṣaṣ catur aṅgulaiḥ
ṣaḍbhiḥ caturbhiḥ ca tathā dvi kara tri karasya tu
mekhalā upari madhye tu yoniḥ pippala patra vat
ṣaṣ aṅgulasya vistārāḥ vistāra ardham tad ūrdhvatas
muṣṭeḥ evam tathā anyeṣām aṅgula aṅgula vardhanāt
eka aṅgulam samutsedham aṣṭa aṅgula sa vistṛtam
praṇītā sthānam etat hi brahma sthānam tathā bhavet
caturaśram praṇītāyām brahmaṇe padmam eva ca
ittham kuṇḍam prakalpya atha lakṣaṇena maheśvari

original: sthaṇḍile ca na kartavyaṃ devatāśāpadaṃ bhavet ||
analyzed: sthaṇḍile ca na kartavyam devatā āśā padam bhavet
alakṣaṇa kṛtam kuṇḍam kula kṣaya karam bhavet
vidhānena kuṇḍam kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
tad madhye vedikām kuryāt hasta mātram tad ūrdhvatas

original: catustambhaṃ ca tanmadhye parito dvādaśa kramāt ||
analyzed: catu stambham ca tad madhye paritas dvādaśa kramāt
tad bahis viṃśati stambhāḥ unnatam ca aṣṭa ṣaṣ karaiḥ
tat bahis pañca hastam syāt potikā ādibhiḥ
ekabhaumam tribhaumam vā kārayet maṇṭapam śive
catu dvāra samāyuktam catur toraṇa bhūṣitam
prāc dvāre pīta varṇam ca dakṣiṇe kṛṣṇa varṇakam
paścime rakta varṇam ca uttare śveta varṇakam
cakra triśūla ḍamaru padma nandi vicihnitam
evam dvāram prakurvīta pūrva ādi kramataḥ priye
catur dikṣu dhvajam kuryāt patākāḥ syuḥ diśi sthitāḥ
daśa staḥ dhvaje daṇḍaḥ caturaśraḥ ca vṛttakaḥ
sapta hastāḥ patākāḥ syuḥ dīrgha daṇḍa pramāṇataḥ
sapta hasta dhvaja paṭaḥ vasanā nūtanena ca
tad tad vāhana cihnāni lekhayet śilpinā guruḥ
viṃśati aṅgula vistārāḥ patākā syuḥ maheśvari
lokapāla anuvarṇena vāhana āyudha lāñchanaiḥ
diś vidikṣu prakurvīta sthāpayet vidhinā guruḥ
vastraiḥ ācchādayeḥ tuṅgān vitāna phala śobhitān

original: dvāre dvāre ca kumbhau dvau kumbhau tāraṇamūlakau ||
analyzed: dvāre dvāre ca kumbhau dvau kumbhau tāraṇa mūlakau
cūta pallava śobhā āḍhyau pratyekam kaṇṭha vāsasau
kadalī stambha vinyāsaiḥ sragdāmā cūta pallavaiḥ
śobhayitvā bahis paścāt darbha dāmnā ca veṣṭayet
evam maṇṭapa kuṇḍāni kurvīta vidhinā priye

original: navāhaṃ saptarātraṃ vā pañca tryekāhameva vā |
analyzed: nava aham sapta rātram vā pañca tri eka aham eva vā
lakṣa homam prakurvīta uttamam madhyamam bhavet

original: adhamaṃ ca na kurvīta dinasaṃkhyavidhau śive |
analyzed: adhamam ca na kurvīta dina saṃkhya vidhau śive
vapanam snāna maunam ca śukla ambara dharaḥ śuciḥ
kṣīra anna bhojanam nityam dussaṅga ādi vivarjitaḥ
brahmacarya vratam kuryāt ṛtvigbhiḥ saha deśikaḥ
ittham dīkṣā prakartavyā nava rātre maheśvari

original: p. 213) trirātre caikarātre ca dīkṣākarma na kārayet ||
analyzed: tri rātre ca eka rātre ca dīkṣā karma na kārayet
yāga dravyāṇi sampādya hotṛbhiḥ jāpakān dvijān
dīkṣāvān karma tatva jñaḥ satya vādī jita indriyaḥ
sa patnīkān dvijaśreṣṭhān āhūya yajamānakaḥ
taila abhyaṅga ādikam kṛtvā ācārya ṛtvij samanvitaḥ
su tithau ca su niścitya pūrva uktena maheśvari
prātar utthāya vidhivat danta dhāvana pūrvakam
prātar snānam prakurvīta ācāryāya dvijottamaiḥ
sandhyā karma prakurvīta nityakarma samāpya ca
mṛttikā snāna pūrvam ca kuśa gomaya vāriṇā
sarva ghoṣa samāyuktaḥ tad tad mantreṇa lepayet
nānā maṅgala vādyaiḥ ca veda ghoṣaiḥ ca suktakaiḥ

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā tato mantrī homārthaṃ ca dvijottamaiḥ ||
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā tatas mantrī homa artham ca dvijottamaiḥ
dhauta vastra ambara channaḥ vibhūti ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ
deva ṛṣi tarpaṇam kṛtvā namaskṛtvā divākaram
tatas devālayam kṛtvā phala puṣpa suvarṇakaiḥ
mama agre vinyaset devi yajamānaḥ su bhaktitaḥ
pañca upacāraiḥ abhyarcya prārthayet ca kṛtāñjaliḥ
śiva ādi sarva devānām sadyas tuṣṭi karam bhavet
lakṣa homam karomi iti svāmi vijñāpanam caret
iti vijñāpya deveśam praviśet yāga maṇṭapam

original: prakṣālya pāṇipādau ca pūrve vā caiśakoṇake |
analyzed: prakṣālya pāṇi pādau ca pūrve vā ca aiśakoṇake
padma pīṭham ca saṃsthāpya nava vastra upari nyaset
tasya upari nyasau āsaneṣu upaviśya ca
guru vandana pūrva ādi prāṇāyāmam samācaret
dinam uddiśya saṃkalpya yathā vibhava vistaram
vighneśam arcya nāndī ādi puṇya aham pañcagavyakam
madhuparkam vidhāya atha varayet deśika ādikān
ācārya ndhanam devi brahmāṇam ca sadasyakam
bhava ādi mūrtipān aṣṭau hotṛbhiḥ ca yathā ukta vat
dina saṃkhya mitān jñātvā varayet ca pṛthak pṛthak
japa artham tu śata ardham syāt vedapārāyaṇam śive

original: p. 215) ṣoḍaśa brāhmaṇaḥ kuryāt tarpaṇārthaṃ daśa dvijān ||
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa brāhmaṇaḥ kuryāt tarpaṇa artham daśa dvijān
kumbha arcane ca ekam evam namaskāra pradakṣiṇe
daśa viprān ca varayeḥ arcā artha dvādaśa dvijān
ācārya ādīn sva śākhā ādi gotrakam
śarma atha vṛṇuyāt kartā ślokaiḥ ebhiḥ ca tān kramāt
sarva karma dhurīṇaḥ tvam śiva tuṣṭyai dvijottamaḥ
tvām ā aham gurum ācāryam asmin homa vidhau vṛṇe
kartuḥ pratinidhi tve tu dvijam anyam tad ājñayā
ācāryaḥ vṛṇuyāt atra ślokena eva tatas amunā
kartuḥ pratinidhi tvena karma kārayitum dvija
tvām aham yajamāna artham tasmin homa vidhau vṛṇe
yathā catur mukhaḥ brahmā svarge loke pitāmaha
brahmāṇam ca ām aham sākṣāt tasmin homa vidhau vṛṇe
mantra tantra ādi lopān ca draṣṭum nasyuḥ yathā tathā

original: asmin homavidhau vipra sadasyaṃ tvāmahaṃ vṛṇe ||
analyzed: asmin homa vidhau vipra sadasyam tvām aham vṛṇe
homa artham mūlamantrān ca tat tat mantram śivasya tu

original: p. 216) ṛtvijo'smin homavidhau dvijā yuṣmānahaṃ vṛṇe ||
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ asmin homa vidhau dvijāḥ yuṣmān aham vṛṇe
tarpaṇa artham ca pūjā artham kalaśasya maheśvari
mūlamantra japa arthāya veda pārāyaṇa arthakam
pradakṣiṇa praṇāma artham dvijāḥ yuṣmān aham vṛṇe

original: ityevaṃ varaṇaṃ kṛtvā tebhyaḥ pādyādikaṃ dadet ||
analyzed: iti evam varaṇam kṛtvā tebhyaḥ pādya ādikam dadet
pādyam arghyam tathā ācāmam madhuparkam tathā eva ca
kuṇḍale ca aṅgulīya ādi bhūṣāḥ ca vividhāḥ api
rudrākṣa makuṭa ādyaiḥ ca svarṇa yajñopavītakaiḥ
dukūla pādukam devi chatra vījana jāmaraiḥ
ācamam jala pātrāṇi yāga upakaraṇāni ca

original: phalaṃ svarṇaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ dāpayenmanunā śive ||
analyzed: phalam svarṇam ca tāmbūlam dāpayet manunā śive
mūlena mama gāyatryā pañca brahmāṇubhiḥ tathā
ācāryāya gandha ādyaiḥ tam samarpayet

original: evaṃ brahma sadasyādīn tathaivānyān dvijān kramāt |
analyzed: evam brahma sadasya ādīn tathā eva anyān dvijān kramāt
yathā yathocitam vastra bhūṣaṇa ādyaiḥ ca toṣayet
aṅkura arpaṇa pūrvam ca mṛttikām āharet tatas

original: p. 217) sadyoṅkuraṃ vā kurvīta dinasaṃkhyamitaṃ śive ||
analyzed: sadyas oṅkuram vā kurvīta dina saṃkhya mitam śive
dhvaja sthāpana pūrva uktam patākān sthāpayet priye
vṛṣa yāgam tatas kuryāt patāka dhvaja devatāḥ
sampūjya vidhivat mantrī tad tad mantreṇa pārvati
pañcagavyam hunet ante gaṇeśam ca nava grahān
tad tad mūlena hotavyam tad tad dravyam pṛthak pṛthak
etat karma divākāle guruḥ kuryāt maheśvari
sāyam sandhyām upāsya atha śuciḥ bhūtvā guru uttamaḥ
prakṣālya pāṇi pādau ca mūrti pādyaiḥ dvijottamaiḥ
praviśya paścime dvāram yāga geham maheśvari
astra dṛṣṭyā vilokya atha dikpatīn
naiṛtyām diśam āsādyāḥ upaviśya āsane guruḥ
guru vandana pūrva ādi diśa digbandhanam śive

original: bhūtaśuddhiṃ nyāsajālān saṅkalpaṃ ca vidhāya ca |
analyzed: bhūtaśuddhim nyāsa jālān saṅkalpam ca vidhāya ca
gaṇeśa sthaṇḍile pūjya su gandha kusuma ādibhiḥ
sthāpayet kalaśam devi yojayet pañcagavyakaiḥ

original: p. 218) ekāṃśakaṃ tu gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ ca tadardhakam ||
analyzed: eka aṃśakam tu go mūtram gomayam ca tad ardhakam

original: saptāṃśakaṃ tu gokṣīraṃ tryaṃśakaṃ tu dadhi smṛtam |
analyzed: sapta aṃśakam tu go kṣīram tri aṃśakam tu dadhi smṛtam
ājyam eka aṃśam iti evam sadyojāta ādi pañcakaiḥ
astramantreṇa saṃspṛṣṭvā śatam aṣṭa uttaram japet
puṇyāham vācayet paścāt ṛtvigbhiḥ sahitaḥ guruḥ
maṇṭapam mārjayet devi vāyumantreṇa deśikaḥ
pālāśa pallavaiḥ darbhaiḥ vahni ādi īśa avasānakam
mama gāyatri mantreṇa lepayet gomaya ambhasā
astramantram śata āvṛtyā tatas rājīḥ ca deśikaḥ
vikīrya mārjayet muṣṭyā maṇṭape manu vittamaḥ

original: prakṣālyaṃ hastau deveśi puṣpāṇi daśa dikṣu ca ||
analyzed: prakṣālyam hastau deveśi puṣpāṇi daśa dikṣu ca
nikṣipya mama gāyatryā cakra mudrām pradarśayet
sa sūtra darbha mālām ca yuktam
astramantra śatam japtvā veṣṭayam maṇṭapam śive
abhyukṣya pañcagavyena mūlamantreṇa deśikaḥ
vikīrya mārjanam mantrī punar pūrva ukta mantrataḥ
gandha toyena saṃprokṣya guruḥ āpaḥ punantu iti
dvāra pūjan tatas paścāt akṣataiḥ kusuma ādibhiḥ kaiḥ
astra toyena saṃprokṣya pūrva adri kramataḥ priye
śānti bhūti bala ārogyā saṃjñābhiḥ toraṇe nyaset
yugmāt vidān yajet ūrdhve śūleṣu arka purā uditān
praśānta śiśira ādīn ca pratyūṣa ādi vasūn api
bhūrbhuva ādika lokān ca soma bhauma ādikān grahān
śāntiḥ nidrā nivṛttiḥ ca pratiṣṭhā dvāra mūrdhani
gaṇeśam bhāratīm lakṣmīm sarva dvāra upari nyaset
pūrva dvāram samārabhya śāyayoḥ dakṣa vāmayoḥ
nandi ādi dvārapālān ca gaṅgā ādi saritaḥ tathā
saṃpūjya tān caturthī antān śiva jñām śrāvayet athā
yajñasya rakṣaṇa arthena sthātavyam mahā ādaraiḥ

original: vajrādīni patākā syuḥ kumudādi dhvajeṣu ca |
analyzed: vajra ādīni patākā syuḥ kumuda ādi dhvajeṣu ca
pūrva uktān vinyaset devi sarva vighna bhayaṅkarān
dvāra toraṇa saṃpūjya prārthayet amunā guruḥ

original: p. 220) maṇṭapastambhapūjāṃ ca prārabhe tu tataḥ priye ||
analyzed: maṇṭapa stambha pūjām ca prārabhe tu tatas priye
anta stambheṣu sarveṣu ādhāra ādi yathākramam
praṇava ādi namaḥ ntaiḥ ca dharma ādiṣu samarcayet
vidyeśa ādi ghaṭaḥ ca iṣu dvāra toraṇa kumbhakān
yāgeśvaram ca dikpālān sthāpayet pūjayet priye
niṣkam niṣka ardha hemnā vā pratimān vinyaset guruḥ
su vastram su phalam nyastvā prārthayet deśika uttamaḥ

original: bho bho śakra tvayā svasyāṃ diśi vighnapraśāntaye |
analyzed: bho bho śakra tvayā svasyām diśi vighna praśāntaye
sāvadhānena yāga antam sthātavyam tu śiva ājñayā
sarveṣām lokapālānām aneka krama yogataḥ
iti vijñāpya dikpālān yāga īśam prārthayet tatas
śaṅkarāya namaḥ tubhyam viśva rūpa dharāya ca
mayā pravartitaḥ ca ayam lakṣa homaḥ kṛte tava
lakṣaṇīyaḥ tvayā etarhi samāptiḥ yāvat asya hi
iti saṃprārthya yāgeśam akṣataiḥ avakīrya ca

original: ataḥ saṃpūjya vāstuṃ ca rākṣoghnaṃ vāstuhomakam |
analyzed: atas saṃpūjya vāstum ca rākṣoghnam vāstuhomakam
balim ca vikiret devi sva sva mantraiḥ guru uttamaḥ

original: tataḥ pratisaraṃ badhvā yāgārthaṃ ca yathoktavat |
analyzed: tatas pratisaram badhvā yāga artham ca yathā ukta vat

original: ācāryaṃ yajamānaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ ca sadasyakam ||
analyzed: ācāryam yajamānam ca brahmāṇam ca sadasyakam
mūrtipān tarpaṇam devi yāga īśa pratimā ādiṣu
badhnīyuḥ ūrṇā sūtraiḥ ca tad mantram ca purā ukta vat
vahni sādhanakam paścāt hotṛbhiḥ saha deśikaḥ
bhavet
śrotriya āgāra jaḥ vahniḥ adhamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
sūryakānta śilāyām vā bodhivṛkṣāt iva śive
ādāya mantaḥ sārāṇi kṛtvā maraṇika dvayam
saṃyogaḥ kramatas kuryāt śilpi śāstra ukta mārgataḥ
tri hasta rajjunā veṣṭyā su dṛḍham triguṇīkṛtam
gomaya ālepitam bhūmim śata patram su karṇikam
likhet saṃpūrayet cūrṇam pañca varṇam vibhedataḥ
śāli saṃpūrayet pīṭham droṇa mātram maheśvari
araṇim vinyaset pīṭhe darbha dāmnā ca veṣṭayet

original: p. 222) gandhapuṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya ācāryo ṛtvijaiḥ saha ||
analyzed: gandha puṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya ācāryaḥ ṛtvijaiḥ saha
āvayoḥ ca samāvāhya naivedya antam maheśvari
mūlamantra japam kuryāt pañca brahma ādi sūktakaiḥ
mathitvā praṇavena agniḥ tuṣa kārpāsaka ādibhiḥ
karīśam ca samāyojya agni jāta kaṇā ādikaiḥ
jvalayet ca tatas mantrī tāmra pātre śarāvake
ādāya yojayet bindau pūrakeṇa tatas hṛdi
sthāpayet manunā devi agniḥ ca citi mantrataḥ
tejaḥ rūpam aham vahnim sākṣāt brahma svarūpakam

original: evaṃ dhyātvā tato mantrī saṃpūjya ca hutāśanam ||
analyzed: evam dhyātvā tatas mantrī saṃpūjya ca hutāśanam
dāpayet guruṇā paścāt yajamānāya bhaktitaḥ
tatas uddhṛtvā ṛtvijān ca tatas dadet

original: rakṣaṇīyaṃ dvijaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ homārthaṃ ca maheśvari |
analyzed: rakṣaṇīyam dvijaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ homa artham ca maheśvari
iti uktvā yajamānāya kṛta añjali puṭa sthitaḥ
ācaryam pūjayet da tvā śayyā vāhana bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: p. 223) dhenuśca ṛtvijāṃ dadyāt athavā vāsasīṃ dadet ||
analyzed: dhenuḥ ca ṛtvijām dadyāt athavā vāsasīm dadet

original: itthaṃ datvā tu deveśi vahniḥ suprītado bhavet |
analyzed: ittham da tvā tu deveśi vahniḥ su prīta daḥ bhavet
tatas jāgaraṇam paścāt veda pāṭham dvijottamaiḥ

original: itthaṃ kṛtvā tu deveśi punaḥ sūryodayāntike |
analyzed: ittham kṛtvā tu deveśi punar sūrya udaya antike
iti śrī vātulottare kāmya kāṇḍe umā maheśvara saṃvāde
lakṣahomamaṇṭapa ādi vidhiḥ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśat paṭalaḥ
atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi karaṇānām ca lakṣaṇam
kuṇḍa śodhana pūrvam ca vahneḥ janana karma ca
pātrāṇām sādhana vidhim krameṇa śṛṇu pārvati
ācāryaḥ tu śuciḥ bhūtvā kṛtvā ca eva āhnika kriyām

original: ṛtvigbhiḥ saha deveśi yāgagehaṃ praviśya ca |
analyzed: ṛtvigbhiḥ saha deveśi yāga geham praviśya ca
sampūjya ādau gaṇeśānam phala ādyaiḥ toṣayet tatas
puṇya aha vācanam kuryāt mūrtipaiḥ ca dvijottamaiḥ
gatvā kuṇḍa antikam mantrī viṣṭare pūrva diś mukhaḥ
upaviśya samānīya sādhanāni uñcitāni vai
guru vandana pūrva ādi ātma śuddhim samācaret
tatas juhvā aṅga manunā nyāsa jālam vidhāya ca
tatas saṃpūjayet mūrdhni sva gurūn deśika uttamaḥ
hṛd padme pūjayet devam gaṇeśānam atha urcayet
kuṇḍa śuddhim prakurvīta vakṣyamāṇena vartmanā

original: mūlamantran japan mantrī tatkuṇḍaṃ ca samīkṣayet |
analyzed: japan mantrī tat kuṇḍam ca samīkṣayet
astramantreṇa saṃtāḍya daśa digbandhanam tatas
saṃprākṣya varmaṇā mantrī tāreṇa khananam śive

original: mṛttike hana mantreṇa uddhare mṛttikāṃ tataḥ ||
analyzed: mṛttike hana mantreṇa uddhare mṛttikām tatas
pūjayet ca hṛdā mantrī samīkṛti dṛśā aṇunā
secayet amunā kuryāt kuṭṭayet astra mantrataḥ
mārjayet kavacena atha lepanam hetinā aṇunā
kalā ātmakam kalābhiḥ tu trisūtrīkaraṇam śive
kavacena arcayet mantrī hṛd mantreṇa ca pārvati
astreṇa vajrīkaraṇam hṛd mantreṇa kuśaiḥ tatas
catuṣpatham tanutreṇa tanuyāt akṣapāṭanam
iti ete kuṇḍa saṃskārāḥ aṣṭādaśa maheśvari

original: caturaśraṃ purā kṛtvā kuṇḍamadhye ca vālukaiḥ |
analyzed: caturaśram purā kṛtvā kuṇḍa madhye ca vālukaiḥ
devasya tvā iti mantreṇa hrādakena śalākayā
ādāya ca likhet rekhām pūrva agre ca uttara agrake
tisraḥ pūrva mukhāḥ rekhāḥ tadvat saumya mukhāḥ tathā
brahmā vaivasvataḥ somaḥ madhye dakṣiṇa vāmayoḥ
rudraḥ viṣṇuḥ ca śakraḥ ca madhye paścima pūrvayoḥ
brahma ja jñāna mantreṇa nāke manu yathākramam
ṣaṣ rekhām ca likhet mantrī bhū śuddhi artham iha īśvari
gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ ca eva tatas nāmnā eva pūjayet
tatas yantram samuddhṛtya pūrva agre ca uttara agrake
bhavati ekona pañcāśat pada ādi antra tat āsphuṭam
bahis īśāna koṣṭha ādi tad madhya ca maheśvari
mātṛkām varṇa saṃlekhya pradakṣiṇyena deśikaḥ
tad madhye aṣṭadalam padmam karṇikā kesaraiḥ yutam

original: p. 226) viṣṭarārthaṃ sukūrcaṃ tu viṃśaddarbhakṛtaṃ tataḥ |
analyzed: viṣṭara artham su kūrcam tu viṃśat darbha kṛtam tatas

original: pīṭhapūjāṃ ca tatraiva āvāhya puruṣaṃ param ||
analyzed: pīṭha pūjām ca tatra eva āvāhya puruṣam param

original: tataḥ pārśve mahādevyā cintayecca guru priye |
analyzed: tatas pārśve mahādevyā cintayet ca guru priye
dvi netrām dvi bhujām ramyām pīnī unnata payodharām
muktā ābharaṇa saṃyuktām padma hastām su locanām
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśām rakta āvāha ugri bhūṣitām
ṛtusnātām sukūrca sthām vāgīśasya ca vāmake
kāraṇam jagatām devam sarvajñam sarva sākṣiṇam
an ādi nidhanam śuddham sākṣāt brahma svarūpiṇam

original: evaṃ dhyātvā tato mantrī samarcya ca maheśvari ||
analyzed: evam dhyātvā tatas mantrī samarcya ca maheśvari
devadevau ca saṃpūjya mūlamantreṇa pārvati
pādyam arghya ādikam dadyāt kuṅkumam raktacandanam
rakta padmāni saṃpūjya dhūpa dīpa ādikam priye
śivabījena tāra ādi namaḥ ntena tatas param
tad eka tām samāpannām vicintayet

original: darśayodyoni mudrāṃ ca liṅgamudrāṃ tathā hṛdā ||
analyzed: darśaya udyoni mudrām ca liṅga mudrām tathā hṛdā

original: p. 227) ityevaṃ manasā bhāvyā krīḍārthaṃ ca pradarśayet |
analyzed: iti evam manasā bhāvyā krīḍā artham ca pradarśayet
tadā ratiḥ trayoḥ yāvat tāvat agnim atha aṅguruḥ
pāṇinā sa ambhasā yonim sa mṛjyāt astra mantrataḥ
paścāt devasya devyāḥ ca dadyāt ācamanīyakam
vadhnīyām garbha rakṣā artham darbham kaṅkaṇa vat kare
ekīkṛtya badhnīyāt mūlamantrataḥ
sādhitam ca tatas vahnim bhasma dhūma ādi varjitam

original: gurupatnyā ca ṛtvigbhyaṃ ādāya ca maheśvari ||
analyzed: guru patnyā ca ṛtvigbhyaṃ ādāya ca maheśvari
kuṇḍa yonau pravinyasya devasya tvā iti mantrataḥ
parityajet
astramantreṇa saṃprokṣya dakṣa druṣpādi vīkṣaṇaiḥ
śoṣa dāha pravanāni pārvati

original: akuñcanaṃ tato dīptaṃ bahiḥ piṅgalayā guruḥ |
analyzed: akuñcanam tatas dīptam bahis piṅgalayā guruḥ

original: vyavargasya dvitīyā tu bindunā bhūṣitaṃ ca yat ||
analyzed: vyavargasya dvitīyā tu bindunā bhūṣitam ca yat
vahnibījam idam proktam tri vāram ca samuccaran
bibhāvya nirgatam tatra yojayet āntarā

original: p. 228) spṛṣṭvā darbhadvayenaiva japtvā tāreṇa cāṣṭaśaḥ |
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā darbha dvayena eva japtvā tāreṇa ca aṣṭaśas
dhenumudrām pradṛśya atha rakṣayet astra mantrataḥ
avakuṇṭhya tanutreṇa mūlamantreṇa pārvati
pañca upacāraiḥ abhyarcya jānu yugmam
kuṇḍa ūrdhvam tris paribhrāmya mūlamantram anusmaran
tad madhye vinyaset agnim ātmanaḥ abhimukham guruḥ
saṃprokṣya kāṣṭha śirasā nikṣipet ca maheśvari
cit pigalam ca manunā jvalayet analam śanais
vyajanam dhamanīm vā atha praṇayet mantra vittamaḥ
agnim prajvalitam vande manunā anena prāñjaliḥ
prārthayitvā api upasthāya guruḥ tat mā upasīdatu

original: guruvandana pūrvaṃ ca daśa digbandhanaṃ tataḥ ||
analyzed: guru vandana pūrvam ca daśa digbandhanam tatas
tatas nyāsam vidhāya atha kṛśānaḥ manubhiḥ nyaset
jiṃha aṅga mūrti manubhiḥ hiraṇya ādi yathākramam

original: liṅgepāne tathā mūrdhni vadane ca gurūttamaḥ |
analyzed: liṅge pāne tathā mūrdhni vadane ca guru uttamaḥ
nāsikā nayana dvandve sarva aṅgeṣu ca vinyaset
ṛṣi ādim aṅga vinyāsam hṛdaya ādi nyaset guruḥ
dhruva agnaye pada ādyāḥ candra iṇamaḥ ntāḥ kramāt amūn
mūrdha aṃsa pārśva kaṭi ādi pradakṣiṇa vaśāt budhaḥ
ittham nyāsam vidhāya atha prāṇāyāmam samācaret
samadbhiḥ ca sādhayet ca maheśvari
tatas saṃkalpam uccārya juhuyāt ca pṛthak pṛthak
sadyojāta ādibhiḥ mantraiḥ samidbhiḥ ca yathākramam
idhma bandhana rajjūn ca badhvā ca ekīkṛtam priye
dakṣiṇe ca pravinyasya darbha muṣṭim tathā uttare
aṣṭādaśa punar tisraḥ kuṇḍa māna samucchritāḥ
aṣṭottarasahasram vā paristaraṇa darbhakaiḥ
ṣaṣ aṅgula su vistāram muṣṭi darbham śatam guruḥ
rajju dve prokṣaṇī sapta darbhakaiḥ
praṇītā arṇava darbhaiḥ ca dvādaśaiḥ brahmakūrcakam

original: p. 230) sruksruvau mānunaṃ sapta ājyasaṃskāra ṣaṭkuśaiḥ |
analyzed: sruc sruvau mānunam sapta ājya saṃskāra ṣaṣ kuśaiḥ
dve darbhe caru śuddhiḥ syāt pātrāṇām sādhana arthake
śata ardham ca tad ardham vā kuśa kupti vidhīyate

original: svarṇaṃ vā rājataṃ vāpi tāmraṃ vātha śarāvakam ||
analyzed: svarṇam vā rājatam vā api tāmram vā atha śarāvakam

original: pūritaprasthamekaṃ vā tanyūnaṃ ca na kārayet |
analyzed: pūrita prastham ekam vā tat nyūnam ca na kārayet
sruc sruvau hasta mātrau ca śukti mātra prapūritam
etad pātrāṇi saṃpādya kāla bhinnāni varjayet
tatas parisamūhya agnim
pariṣicya jalena atha astramantreṇa deśikaiḥ
diś paristaraṇam kuryāt devasya tvā iti mantrataḥ
dakṣiṇān uttarān devi n uttarān adharān guruḥ
mekhalā pari madhye tu vinyaset ca yathākramam
pātrāṇām sādhayet paścāt kuṇḍasya uttara pārśva ge
bhū tale kuśam āstīrya praṇītām prokṣaṇām tathā
ājya pātram carusthālīm sruc sruvau kuśa muṣṭikam
idhma pravaścanam devi sādhayet deśika uttamaḥ
dvandva rūpeṇa hastābhyām mantreṇa asmin adhomukham
arghya udakena saṃprokṣya darśayet astra mudrikām
prokṣaṇīmat mukham kṛtyā sukūrcam vinyaset tatas
jaleḥ āpaḥ punantvā iti pūrayet dhenumudrayā
karābhyām tat tris utpūya tad jalaiḥ prokṣya ca astrataḥ

original: vidhmaṃ visrasya granthiṃ ca varmaṇā ca maheśvari ||
analyzed: vidhmam visrasya granthim ca varmaṇā ca maheśvari
pātrāṇi etāni unmukhīkṛtya prokṣayet
dakṣiṇe padma pīṭham ca darbha kūrcam nyaset tatas
āvāhya ca dvijaśreṣṭham bhūpate tu atha mantrataḥ
arvāvasoḥ samāvāhya gandha puṣpaiḥ samarcayet
tat purastāt praṇītānām nidhāya adbhiḥ prapūrayet
brahma bījau mantreṇa siddha mantreṇa pārvati
āvāhya varuṇam paścāt brahmāṇam ca samarcayet
dorbhyām nāsā antam uddhṛtya brahmaṇaḥ ca api anujñayā
dhaneśa īśvarayoḥ madhye pūrva pīṭham kuśa upari
nidhāya darbham ācchādya aṣṭa vāram guruḥ
ghṛta sthālīm samādāya prokṣayet astra mantrataḥ
tatra go ghṛtam āpūrya netramantreṇa vīkṣayet
vāyavyām diśi mā āsthāpya mekhalasya samīpatas
tanutreṇa ca nīrājyam tat agnau nikṣipet guruḥ
punar darbha dvaye mantrī astramantreṇa pārvati
tri vāram darśayitvā tu manunā agnau vinikṣipan

original: ādāya yonau vinyasya aṅgārān saha yojayet |
analyzed: ādāya yonau vinyasya aṅgārān saha yojayet
darbhau prādeśa mātreṇa madhye granthi yutena ca
śukram asi iti mantreṇa vahni madhye ca nikṣipet
carum ca śrapayet paścāt nirvapāmi iti mantrataḥ

original: agnaye vo juṣṭaṃ prokṣyāmi agnaye vo juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmiti devatā ca
analyzed: agnaye vaḥ juṣṭam prokṣyāmi agnaye vaḥ juṣṭam nirvapām iti devatā ca
pradhānakam
tri vāram iti muccārya darbhau
abhighārya uttare nyasya janana agniḥ na karma ca
sruc sruvau śodhayet paścāt dakṣa vāma kara dvaye
agra madhyama mūleṣu kuśa yugasya śodhayet

original: p. 233) agnau niṣṭapya saṃmṛjya mūlamantreṇa vai triśaḥ |
analyzed: agnau niṣṭapya saṃmṛjya mūlamantreṇa vai triśas

original: evameva srucaṃ śodhya nyasettatraiva tān punaḥ ||
analyzed: evam eva srucam śodhya nyaset tatra eva tān punar
paridhīn ca gṛhītvā atha varma netrā su mantrakaiḥ

original: paścime dakṣiṇe nyasya uttare ca maheśvari ||
analyzed: paścime dakṣiṇe nyasya uttare ca maheśvari
tad ūrdhva samidh hanyasya kavacena dvayam guruḥ
anuyāja samidh tatra praṇītā ūrdhve nyaset guruḥ
pāvakam gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ jiṃhu ādi paripūjayet

original: brāhmī vajrī tathā caindrī dhanvirākṣī maheśvarī |
śabalā ca tathā vegā kramātkuṇḍāni devatāḥ ||
analyzed: śabalā ca tathā vegā kramāt kuṇḍāni devatāḥ

original: paridhiṃ paristaraṇaṃ devi brahmāṇaṃ ca yathākramam |
analyzed: paridhim paristaraṇam devi brahmāṇam ca yathākramam

original: vāṇīṃ lakṣmīṃ pārvatīṃ ca kramādāvāhya pūjayet ||
analyzed: vāṇīm lakṣmīm pārvatīm ca kramāt āvāhya pūjayet
samidham ca tatas hutvā pariṣecanam ārabhet
aditi ityādi mantreṇa paritas ca yathākramam
agnaye jātavedāḥ ca arcayet ukta mārgataḥ
grāhyam pañcadaśa idhmam tu gandha puṣpaiḥ samarcayet
praśnītāyām imām rajjum nyaset valaya vat tatas
samidh samūham ājyena samyak āplāvya deśikaḥ
dvi śīrṣam ca eka hṛdayam catu śrotra dvi nāsikam
āsya dvayam ca ṣaṇṇetram piṅgalam sapta hastakam
tri mekhalam tri pādam ca sapta jiṃhvābhiḥ āvṛtam
catur śṛṅgam vṛṣa ārūḍham bala āditya sama prabham
upavīta samāyuktam jaṭā makuṭa maṇḍitam
savyabhāge catur hastam tri hastam apasavyake
sruc sruvau ca akṣamālām ca śaktim dakṣiṇa hastake

original: tomaraṃ vyajanaṃ caiva ghṛtapātraṃ tu vāmake ||
analyzed: tomaram vyajanam ca eva ghṛta pātram tu vāmake

original: evaṃ dhyātvā tato mantrī brahmaṇo'nujñayā purā |
analyzed: evam dhyātvā tatas mantrī brahmaṇaḥ anujñayā purā
idhma homam tatas paścāt sruveṇa ājyam hṛdā aṇunā
nāḍī sandhau tu vijñeyā vaktra udghāṭanam ādarāt
dakṣa netre ignaye svāhā iti udaran juhuyāt guruḥ
vāmatas tu ājyam ādāya vahne vāma vilopane

original: hṛdā juhotu somāya svāheti ca guruḥ priye ||
analyzed: hṛdā juhotu somāya svāhā iti ca guruḥ priye

original: p. 235) madhyanetra tato vahne gṛhītvā madhyato ghṛtam |
analyzed: tatas vahne gṛhītvā madhyatas ghṛtam
agnīṣomābhyām svāhā iti sṛvat mantreṇa netrataḥ
ghṛtam ādāya deveśi dakṣa bhāgāt hṛdā aṇunā
vahni vaktre agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā iti homayet
vahni mantram tatas hutvā tāra vyāhṛtibhiḥ triśas
jiṃhvā aṅga mūrti manubhiḥ juhuyāt ca yathākramam

original: ṛṣi triṣṭubha mantrairṇaissaṃjapya ca guru priye |
analyzed: ṛṣi triṣṭubha mantraiḥ ṇaiḥ saṃjapya ca guru priye
ādau mūlena saṃpūjya upacāraiḥ ca deśikaḥ
juhuyāt samidham paścāt tad mūlam anuvittamaḥ
aṣṭa aṣṭa ājya āhutiḥ hutvā krameṇa ca pṛthak pṛthak
garbhādhāna ādikāḥ kuryāt vivāha antāḥ kriyāḥ kramāt
garbhādhānam puṃsavanam sīmantam bali jātake
syāt nāmakaraṇam paścāt upaniṣkramaṇam tatas
annaprāśanakam caulam upanītam tatas guruḥ
catvāri veda prathitā vratāni snāna karma ca
vivāha antam iti proktāḥ garbhādhāna ādi karmaṇām

original: p. 236) paścāt karma karomīti pratyekaṃ samidhaṃ hunet |
analyzed: paścāt karma karomi iti pratyekam samidham hunet
ājyena homayet ante vahno pūrṇāhutim hunet
tatas sūtaka śuddhi artham jātakarma vidhau kṛte
tad paristaraṇa ādīni sādhanāni parityajet
saṃprokṣya gomaya jalaiḥ tat kuṇḍam ca maheśvari
pūrvavat sādhanam kuryāt yathāvat anu deśikaḥ
jiṃhvā mantraiḥ mūrti mantraiḥ daśa bheda vibheditaiḥ
mahāgaṇapateḥ mantraiḥ pūrva pūrva āpitaiḥ hunet

original: pīṭhapūjyātha tadvahnau devaṃ dhyātvā tato guruḥ |
analyzed: pīṭha pūjya atha tad vahnau devam dhyātvā tatas guruḥ
uddiśya devatā rūpam yajet sa āvaraṇa ādikaiḥ
saṃmukhīkaraṇa artham ca pañcaviṃśa āhutiḥ hunet
devatā hyata nāma aikyam bhāvayet mūlamantrataḥ
ekādaśa āhutiḥ nāḍī sandhānāya hunet tatas
ekaikam āvṛtīnām ca devatābhyaḥ ghṛta āhutiḥ
iti evam ca guruḥ kuryāt vahneḥ janana karmaṇi

original: na kuryācca huneddhomaṃ taddhomo niṣphalaṃ bhavet ||
analyzed: na kuryāt ca hunet homam tad homaḥ niṣphalam bhavet
iti śrī vātulottare umā maheśvara saṃvāde kāmya kāṇḍe
agnijananavidhānam nāma pañcacatvāriḥ paṭalaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi mūrtipaiḥ sahito guruḥ |
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi mūrtipaiḥ sahitaḥ guruḥ
dravya homa ādi pūrṇa antam tarpaṇam kumbha pūjanam

original: tattajjapaṃ tatphalaṃ ca krameṇa śṛṇu pārvati |
analyzed: tad tad japam tad phalam ca krameṇa śṛṇu pārvati
maṇṭapa antastha kumbheṣu mūrtipāḥ ca upaviśya ca
āsana ādi viśuddhim ca nyāsam kuryāt maheśvari

original: śodhanaṃ kṣālanaṃ caiva śoṣaṇaṃ pālanaṃ tathā |
analyzed: śodhanam kṣālanam ca eva śoṣaṇam pālanam tathā
abhyukṣaṇam ca pañca ete stu anya kuṇḍeṣu
ācārya kuṇḍāt analam pūrva ādi viharet tatas
agnimīlā iti mantreṇa pūrva upasthāya ca analam
iṣe tvā ūrjā iti mantreṇa āgneyān ca nyaset tatas

original: dakṣiṇe ca tvamagneti upatvāgne ca nair-ṛte ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca tvam agne iti upatvā agne ca nairṛte

original: p. 238) vāruṇe jātavedādi vāyavye vyāhṛtiṃ priye |
analyzed: vāruṇe jātaveda ādi vāyavye vyāhṛtim priye

original: agniṃ dūtaṃ cottare ca agnimagnīti caiśake ||
analyzed: agnim dūtam ca uttare ca agnim agni iti ca aiśake
viharet analam paścāt prāṇāyāmam samācaret
jiṃhva aṅga mūrti nyāsa ādi tatas saṃkalpa pūrvakam
hutvā dravyāṇi saṃkhyābhiḥ devatā nāmama uccaran
abādhā anādi deveśi guru mūrti dharā pṛthak
sva sva kuṇḍe ca taiḥ sarvaiḥ ukta vat kārayet kramāt

original: caruṃ vinā na kartavyaṃ brūhitā brahmapakvakam ||
analyzed: carum vinā na kartavyam brūhitā brahmapakvakam

original: paridhiṃ ca maheśāni mūrtipaiśca na kārayet |
analyzed: paridhim ca maheśāni mūrtipaiḥ ca na kārayet
bhava ādyam mūrtim āvāhya pūjayet pīṭha mantrakaiḥ
ekaikaśas ca juhuyuḥ jiṃhu ādi manubhiḥ tathā
ṛtvijaḥ deśika ādyāḥ ca ṛṣi chandāṃsi mūlataḥ
pakva āhutim ca juhuyuḥ pañcabhiḥ ca aghṛta āhutim

hṛdaye vaṃśa śūnyam ca udare vṛṣṭi nāśanam

original: kaṭau tu sthānanāśaṃ ca jānumuccāṭanaṃ bhavet ||
analyzed: kaṭau tu sthāna nāśam ca jānum uccāṭanam bhavet

original: p. 239) maraṇaṃ bāhumūle tu jiṃhvāyāṃ sarvakāmadam |

analyzed: tasmāt agneḥ viśeṣeṇa jiṃhvāyām homam ācaret

original: hutvā mudrāṃ ca deveśi mṛgī haṃsī ca sūkarī |
analyzed: hutvā mudrām ca deveśi mṛgī haṃsī ca sūkarī

original: mudrāhīnastu yo homaḥ sa sarvo niṣphale bhavet |
analyzed: mudrā hīnaḥ tu yaḥ homaḥ sa sarvaḥ niṣphale bhavet

original: tilaṃ ca truṭikaṃ lājān saktuṃ kṣīraṃ daśa kramāt |
analyzed: tilam ca truṭikam lājān saktum kṣīram daśa kramāt

original: dvisahasraṃ goghṛtaṃ ca kuḍupaṃ ca maheśvari ||
analyzed: dvi sahasram go ghṛtam ca kuḍupam ca maheśvari

original: anādrā vakrahīnā ca śobhitā ca samidbhavet ||
analyzed: an ādrā vakra hīnā ca śobhitā ca samidh bhavet
śāli udbhavaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ ca prastham pañcaśatam bhavet
godhūma ādi dravyam anyat tad ardham parikīrtitam
kṣālitam śodhitam pātre pūrayet mūlamantrataḥ
uddiśya devatā mantram praṇava ādi yathākramam

original: mūlamantraṃ ca juhuyāt gurumūrti dharāḥ pṛthak ||
analyzed: mūlamantram ca juhuyāt guru mūrti dharāḥ pṛthak

original: p. 240) sahasrordhvaṃ pañcaśataṃ cāṣṭāhuti guruṃ priye |
analyzed: sahasra ūrdhvam pañcaśatam ca aṣṭa āhuti gurum priye
pradhānakuṇḍe juhuyāt uddeśya tyāga pūrvakam
homayeyuḥ mūrtipāḥ te pṛthak kuṇḍa aṣṭake punar
sahasram tri śatam devi daśa sapta catuḥ tathā
mūrtipānām pṛthak homa uditam pratididinam prati
pṛthak dravyam lakṣa mitam pūrva ājyam ca apara ājyakam

original: daśa dravyāṇi vā devi hunerlakṣaṃ gurūttamaḥ ||
analyzed: daśa dravyāṇi vā devi huneḥ lakṣam guru uttamaḥ

padam pūrva ukta vat kuryāt padmam ālikhya deśikaḥ

original: prasthaṃ prasthaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pradhānādi yathākramam |
analyzed: prastham prastham ca sarveṣām pradhāna ādi yathākramam
svarṇa ādi kumbham saṃgṛhya pañcaviṃśa uttaram śatam

original: p. 241) droṇavāri dhṛtaṃ kumbhaṃ tadardhaṃ ca tadardhakam |
analyzed: droṇa vāri dhṛtam kumbham tad ardham ca tad ardhakam
anyeṣām pūritam prastham chinna bhinna ādi varjitam
kṣālitān kalaśān devi astramantreṇa deśikaḥ
varmaṇā tantunā āveṣṭyā dhūpaiḥ saṃdhūpya mūlataḥ

original: adhomukhaṃ ca kumbhaṃ ca pūjayecca kalātmakam ||
analyzed: adhomukham ca kumbham ca pūjayet ca kalā ātmakam
astramantreṇa saṃprokṣya kumbham uddhṛtya ca unmukham
ṣaṭtriṃśat arbha kūrcam ca pañcaviṃśati kurcakam

original: saptaviṃśati kūrcaṃ ca pañca pañca yathākramam |
analyzed: saptaviṃśati kūrcam ca pañca pañca yathākramam
darbha kūrcam ca vinyasya payasā pūrayet ghaṭam
vāriṇā abhyaṣṭa gandham ca pañcagavyam kuśa udakam
daśa niṣkam suvarṇam ca pradhāna kalaśe nyaset
aṣṭa vidyeśa kumbheṣu pratimām pañca niṣkakām
niṣkeṇa pratimām hemnām bahis āvaraṇe nyaset

original: p. 242) paṇena hemnā pratimāmanyeṣu kalaśeṣu ca |
analyzed: paṇena hemnā pratimām anyeṣu kalaśeṣu ca
vinyaset prāṇamantreṇa auṣadhāni vinikṣipet
cūta pallavam eteṣu vinyase netra mantrataḥ
nyastvā kavacena maheśvari
dukūla vāsasā ācchādya astra mantreṇa pārvati
vicitraiḥ nava vāsobhiḥ śveta vastraiḥ yathākramam
sarva kumbhān samācchādya kūrcam śirasi mantrataḥ
prāṇāyāma ādi vinyāsam pīṭha pūjām samācaret
kumbheṣu āvāhya deveśān vidyeśa ādi yathākramam
sarvān devān samāvāhya pra mā āvaraṇa ādikān
pañcaviṃśottaraśatam āvāhya abhyarcya māntrikaḥ
kalān saṃpūjya deveśi ṣaṭtriṃśat tatva mantrataḥ
pañca brahma manūn paścāt upacāraiḥ samarcayet
daśa viprān ca paritas japeyuḥ mūlamantrataḥ
sahasram pañcaviṃśatyāḥ ṛṣi ādi nyāsa pūrvakam
catur astram catur dikṣu gaṇeśam kṣetrapālakam

original: p. 243) durgāmanuṃ ca vāṇīṃ ca prāsādaṃ ca triyambakam |
analyzed: durgā manum ca vāṇīm ca prāsādam ca tryambakam

original: bhuvaneśīṃ ca vāstuṃ ca rākṣoghnaṃ ca navagrahān ||
analyzed: bhuvaneśīm ca vāstum ca rākṣoghnam ca nava grahān
śrīrudram pāvamānam ca śrīsūktam viṣṇusūktakam
bhūsūktam brahmasūktam ca dhṛtasūkta manum tatas
japet saptaśatim devi paritas ca yathākramam
catur dvāre catur vedān vadeyuḥ bhūsura uttamān
tarpayet saumya digbhāge daśa aṃśam ca payaḥ ambubhiḥ
daśa viprān ca upaviśya padmam ālikhya maṇḍale
śāli taṇḍulam āpūrya tatra pātrāṇi vinyaset
payasā vāriṇā āpūrya gandha puṣpam ca nikṣipet
āvāhya pūjayet devam tarpayet tila taṇḍulaiḥ

original: sahasraṃ dviśataṃ sārdhaṃ mantrī mūlāṇunā yutaḥ ||
analyzed: sahasram dviśatam sārdham mantrī mūla aṇunā yutaḥ
yāvat homa avasāna antam navam kuryāt maheśvari
homa ante sviṣṭakṛt homaḥ yat asya iti aṇunā guruḥ
kṛtvā anuyāja samidham rajjum hutvā tatas param
jaya ādin ca tatas hutvā prāyaścitta āhutim tatas
tatas mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ ekaikām sarpiṣā āhutiḥ

original: tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ devi brahmāṇaṃ ca visṛjya ca ||
analyzed: tatas pūrṇāhutim devi brahmāṇam ca visṛjya ca
hāmam samāpayet ante bali dānam samācaret
nava piṇḍān prakurvīta ājyena haviṣā tatas
guru kuṇḍa ādikāḥ nyastvā kāṣṭha dīpān prapadya ca
vedi kumbhān yajet paścāt ācāryaḥ yajamānakaḥ
śiṣyam āhūya tat kumbham pradhānam ca maheśvari
śirasā dhārayet mantrī veda maṅgala visvanaiḥ
sarvān kumbhān samādāya mūrtipādi dvijottamaiḥ
pradakṣiṇa vaśāt mantrī ghaṭam antar praveśayet
liṅgam saṃpūjya mūlena pradhāna ādi yathākramam
tasyāḥ sūktena saṃsiñcet mūlamantreṇa pārvati
mahā pūjā prakartavyā prāc uktena maheśvari

original: sarvebhyaśca baliṃ datvā tatsarvaṃ ca samarpayet ||
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ ca balim da tvā tat sarvam ca samarpayet

bhakṣam pāyasa su kṣīra śarkarā madhu saṃyutam

original: bhūkteṣu teṣu deveśi tāmbūlaṃ ca pradāpayet ||
analyzed: bhūkteṣu teṣu deveśi tāmbūlam ca pradāpayet
mantra āśīrvacanam grāhyam yajamānena bhaktitaḥ
evam eva samuddiṣṭa dina antam ca dine dine
pūrṇāhutiḥ tad ante tu kṛtvā
visujya kaṅkaṇam paścāt śuddha snānam samācaret
yāga geham praviśya atha guru kuṇḍa samīpatas
bhūsurebhyaḥ ca upaviśya yajamāne guruḥ priye

original: gobhūmyādīni dānāni chāgaṃ ca mahiṣaṃ tathā |
analyzed: go bhūmi ādīni dānāni chāgam ca mahiṣam tathā

original: khaḍgaṃ ca tilatailaṃ cānaḍvāhaṃ ca dāpayet ||
analyzed: khaḍgam ca tila tailam ca anaḍvāham ca dāpayet

original: puṣpaṃ phalaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ pānīyaṃ śayanādikam |
analyzed: puṣpam phalam ca tāmbūlam pānīyam śayana ādikam
dadhyodanam yajñasūtram kanyā dānam maheśvari
vijanam pādukam chatram cāmaram svarṇa kumbhakam

bhūsurāṇām deśika ādi dakṣiṇām vidhivat budhaḥ

original: p. 246) chatraṃ ca cāmaraṃ caiva tantropakaraṇaiḥ saha |
analyzed: chatram ca cāmaram ca eva tantra upakaraṇaiḥ saha

original: guptadānaṃ ca dāsaṃ ca deśikāya pradāpayet ||
analyzed: gupta dānam ca dāsam ca deśikāya pradāpayet

original: saptaṃ ca daśaniṣkaṃ ca paryaṅkaṃ śayyayāvṛtam ||

original: daśaniṣkaṃ suvastraṃ ca brahmaṇe dāpayet priye ||
analyzed: daśa niṣkam su vastram ca brahmaṇe dāpayet priye
sapta niṣkam pādukam ca sadasyāya pradāpayet
mūrti gānām pañca niṣkam pṛthak dadyāt ca kuṇḍalam
sārdha niṣkam dvijātibhyaḥ tarpakebhyaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
sārdha niṣka dvayam veda ghoṣakāṇām pradāpayet
jāpakānām sārdha niṣkam mūlamantrasya pārvati
anyeṣām jāpaka ādīnām cārāṇām niṣkam ucyate
pradakṣiṇa kṛtām ca eva pūjakānām tathā eva ca
dīna andha badhira ādīnām yathāśaktyā atha dakṣiṇām
iti da tvā krameṇa eva saṃpūrṇa phalam aśnute

original: uktārdhe ca phalārdhaṃ syāduktāṃśe ca phalāṃśakam ||
analyzed: ukta ardhe ca phala ardham syāt ukta aṃśe ca phala aṃśakam
jñātvā dharmam iti prājño sva vaṃśasya abhivṛddhaye
lakṣa homam imam devi yaḥ kuryāt ca nṛpa uttamaḥ
sarva śānti karam jñeyam putra pautra abhivṛddhi dam
tuṣṭi puṣṭi pradam devi kīrti dam kānti vṛddhi dam
āyuḥ vṛddhi karam saukhyam sarvatra vijayam bhavet
bhūmi dānena yat puṇyam tat phalam bahubhiḥ makhaiḥ
dehānte mama sāyujyam tris sapta kula saṃyutaḥ

iti śrī vātulāgame umā maheśvara saṃvāde kāmya kāṇḍe
lakṣahomavidhi karmavidhivivara vidhānam nāma saptacatvāriṃśat
paṭalaḥ
svasti
yasmin deve bhavet devi nitya kārya bali dvayam

original: nitye vā vartamāne tu trikālaṃ balikarmaṇi |
analyzed: nitye vā vartamāne tu tri kālam bali karmaṇi

athavā anya prakāreṇa bhave naimittike baliḥ
prātar eva vinirvatya balim nityam maheśvari

original: madhyāhne caiva sāyāhne baliṃ naimittikaṃ haret |
analyzed: madhyāhne ca eva sāyāhne balim naimittikam haret
nityam ādau vinirvartya balim nāḍī dvayāt param
naimittika bali mantrī prakuryāt evam eva vā
kāmye bali vidhau devi viśeṣaḥ kvacid iṣyate
madhyāhne vā atha sāyāhne kuryāt tad dvitaye api vā
nitya balyā saha eva atra pṛthak vā tad balim
evam nitya ādike devi bali kramaḥ iti īritaḥ
parivāra amarāṇām ca saṃtṛptiḥ nitya karmaṇām
paripūrṇa phala avāptiḥ devasya ca bhavet yatas

original: p. 259) sukhaṃ ca sarvajantūnāṃ tasmānnityaṃ caredbalim ||
analyzed: sukham ca sarva jantūnām tasmāt nityam caret balim
brahma loka ādi lokeṣu saṃsthitāḥ ye sura ādikāḥ
teṣām prītiḥ bhavet yena bhūpateḥ sarva sampad
śivasya ati priyaḥ kuryāt tasmāt naimittikam balim
kartuḥ kāmya phala avāptiḥ sarva śatru nivāraṇam
sarva śāntiḥ bhavet yena tasmāt kāmya balim caret
pūrva āhve brahmaṇaḥ prītiḥ viṣṇoḥ madhyandine bhavet
sāyāhne śaṅkarasya eva bali dānam hi pārvati
sṛṣṭi ādi bhedataḥ kalpya baliḥ kāla traye tridhā
atra adhidevāḥ vijñeyāḥ brahma viṣṇu śivaḥ tathā

original: dvivaraṃ ca trivāraṃ ca caturvāraṃ pṛthak kramāt ||
analyzed: dvi varam ca tri vāram ca catur vāram pṛthak kramāt

original: nitye naimittike kāmye devatābhyo baliṃ haret |
analyzed: nitye naimittike kāmye devatābhyaḥ balim haret
svasti
atas param pravakṣyāmi kāla bhedena sāmpratam

original: śivādīnāṃ ca devānāṃ krameṇa śṛṇu pārvati |
analyzed: śiva ādīnām ca devānām krameṇa śṛṇu pārvati
nitya ādi karma bhedeṣu bali dāna vinirṇayam
balibhuj devatāḥ ca api bali dravyam tathā eva ca
bali mantrān ca bali ukta vādyāni trividhāni ca
indra ādi tālagānānām nāmāni atra vadāmi aham
tṛpti artham sarva devānām sukha artham sarva dehinām
rājñām vijaya rājya śrī putra āyuṣya ādi vṛddhaye
sarva ariṣṭa nivṛttyai ca sarva loka hitāya ca
bali dānam prakartavyam tasmāt devi prayatnataḥ

original: prātaḥkāle ca madhyāhne sāyāhne ca krameṇa vai ||
analyzed: prātar kāle ca madhyāhne sāyāhne ca krameṇa vai

original: kāmye cāpi vidhau mantrī yathāvidhi maheśvari ||
analyzed: kāmye ca api vidhau mantrī yathāvidhi maheśvari
madhyandine ca sāyāhne nityakarmaṇi ca athavā
balim dadyāt mahotpāte mahā snapana karmaṇi

mahā utsava ādi kāleṣu tri kālam balim āharet
śaive śāstari ca evam syāt bali dāna vidhi kramaḥ

original: p. 251) durgāyāṃ gaṇanāthe tu balinnityādi karmasu ||
analyzed: durgāyām gaṇanāthe tu balin nityādi karmasu

original: kālatraye ca viṣṇau tu ṣaṇmukhe śaṅkarācyute ||
analyzed: kāla traye ca viṣṇau tu ṣaṇmukhe śaṅkara acyute

original: dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vā nityādiṣu baliṃ haret |
analyzed: dvi kālam vā tri kālam vā nitya ādiṣu balim haret
evam śiva ādi devānām nitya naimittika ādiṣu
bali kāla vibheda uktāḥ bali devān śṛṇu priye
nandī ca eva mahākālaḥ gaṇeśaḥ dakṣiṇeśvaraḥ
śūlapāṇim paraśupāṇim dikpālāḥ sa surādhipāḥ
tatas param mahā nandī vīrabhadraḥ vināyakaḥ

original: brāhmī māheśvarī caiva kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā |
analyzed: brāhmī māheśvarī ca eva kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā
vārāhī ca tathā indrāṇī cāmuṇḍāḥ sapta mātaraḥ
mātaraḥ ca tathā lokāḥ mātaraḥ sarva mātaraḥ
sarva mātṛ gaṇāḥ lakṣmīḥ bhūcarī khecarī tathā
śāstā durgā guhaḥ śrīdaḥ caṇḍanāthaḥ tathā eva ca
tīkṣṇa dauṃṣṭra mṛga āsyau ca gopura dvārapālakau
bhṛṅgī ca eva mahākālaḥ bhūtanāthaḥ mahīdharaḥ
parvateśaḥ guheśaḥ ca kālapāśa kapālinau
tad antye kṣelapālaḥ ca mahā pīṭhe tu tad param
bhūti daḥ durnirīkṣaḥ ca bhīma rūpam su locanaḥ
sumukhaḥ ca subāhuḥ ca kālapāśa kapālinau
adhas piṅgala keśāḥ ca harasenaḥ tad ūrdhvatas

original: ete balibhujo nitye devāḥ śaive samīritāḥ |
analyzed: ete bali bhujaḥ nitye devāḥ śaive samīritāḥ
caṇḍaḥ pracaṇḍaḥ garuḍaḥ anantaḥ vighneśvaraḥ śivaḥ
dikpāla vīrabhadra ekadantau brāhmī ādikaḥ tathā

original: śāstā durgā ca dhanado viṣ.vakseno'tha gopure ||
analyzed: śāstā durgā ca dhanadaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ atha gopure
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca puṇḍarīkaḥ atha vāmanaḥ
śaṅkukarṇaḥ sarpanetraḥ sumukhaḥ saṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ
ca atha bali pīṭhe kiṣkandha pūrvakāḥ
kiṣkindhaḥ śaṅkaraḥ bhaumaḥ bhīmaḥ ca sukumārakaḥ
tatas bāhulakaḥ ca eva vijayaḥ ananta vikramaḥ
punar piṅgala keśa akṣaḥ harasenaḥ tu madhyatas
dvāra ādi bali pīṭha antam bali devāḥ ime harau
caṇḍikā ca ambikā siṃhaḥ dakṣiṇe gaṇapa īśvarau
dikpāḥ vīra īśa vighneśa mātṛkā ādyāḥ purā uditāḥ

original: śāstā durgā ca dhanado muṇḍinī gopure tataḥ |
analyzed: śāstā durgā ca dhanadaḥ muṇḍinī gopure tatas

original: hlādinī mohinī dvāri vijayantī tataḥ param ||
analyzed: hlādinī mohinī dvāri vijayantī tatas param
kātyāyanī bahis atho kālī ādyāḥ bali devatāḥ
suprabhā siṃhavaktrā ca daityamardinī atas param
kṣetra īśaḥ bali pīṭhe tu brahma ghoṣya ādi devatāḥ
brahma ghoṣī su ghoṣī mā yatheṣṭī sukha rāgiṇī
saṃmukhī subhagā dikṣu pramodinī atha ca ātmani

original: brāhmī madhye caivamuktā durgāyā bali devatāḥ |
analyzed: brāhmī madhye ca evam uktāḥ durgāyāḥ bali devatāḥ
vajrapāṇiḥ śaktipāṇiḥ sukumāra āhvayaḥ tatas
agniketuḥ sūryaketuḥ gopura dvāri tad bahis
devasenāpatiḥ ca agninetraḥ dagdhaḥ usidhārī atha
pāśa hastām hayaḥ ketu hasta saṃjñaḥ gadā dharaḥ
tatas śūlavilāsinyāḥ īśānī antar tathā upari
viprapriyaḥ atha kṣetreśaḥ bali pīṭhe tatas param
bhūtida ādyāḥ tu śaiva uktāḥ deva atra eva coditāḥ

original: bali devā iti proktāḥ skandasya paramātmanaḥ |
analyzed: bali devāḥ iti proktāḥ skandasya paramātmanaḥ
kṣurikā khaḍga pāṇi anta dvārapālau bahis tathā
dikpāla mātaraḥ śāstā dhanadaḥ ghoṣavān tathā
tīkṣṇaḥ ca tīkṣṇa dantaḥ ca gopure paritas bahis
goptā ca piṅgalākṣaḥ ca vīrasenaḥ ca śāmbhavaḥ

original: tridik śūlī dakṣabhīmarūpā kṣetrapa eva ca |
analyzed: tridiś śūlī dakṣa bhīma rūpā kṣetrapaḥ eva ca
tīkṣaḥ ca tīkṣṇadantaḥ ca tārākṣaḥ ca bhavodbhavaḥ
adhas piṅgala keśa akṣaḥ śāstrasenaḥ tathā upari
bali pīṭhe tu ime śāstra balidevāḥ iti īritāḥ
vajra danta gajāsyau ca mahā pāśaḥ vināyakaḥ
śiva dikpāḥ mātṛ śāstṛ durgā skandām hayāḥ tatas
kumbhodaraḥ gopure tu caṇḍavikrama saṃjñakaḥ

bhīmaḥ ca mahiṣāsyaḥ ca meghanādaḥ tathā eva ca
virūpākṣaḥ ca vara daḥ sarva bhakṣakaḥ eva ca
tadā antya kṣetrapālaḥ ca gajavaktra ādikaḥ tatas
gajavaktra gaṇeśa ākhyau tatas ca eva vināyakaḥ
śūrpakarṇaḥ tatas nāgadantī syāt rudravaktrajaḥ

original: balipīṭhasya dikṣu syuradha urdhve tvime smṛtāḥ ||
analyzed: bali pīṭhasya dikṣu syuḥ adhas urdhve tu ime smṛtāḥ
evam dvāra ādi saṃproktāḥ vighneśa bali devatāḥ

śāstā durgā guhaḥ ca eva caṇḍasenaḥ atha gopure
śūla ariṇau bahis dikṣu nandī ca eva samantataḥ
mahākālām hayaḥ paścāt bhūtanāthaḥ mahīdharaḥ
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca puṇḍarīkaḥ atha vāmanaḥ

original: āyāntu pāśadāḥ sarve śāṅkarā vaiṣṇavāśca ye |
analyzed: āyāntu pāśa dāḥ sarve śāṅkarāḥ vaiṣṇavāḥ ca ye

om namaḥ yuj pārṣadebhyaḥ iti ārādhya balim haret

original: itaḥ paraṃ ca śarvādi balidravyaṃ śṛṇu priye ||
analyzed: itas param ca śarva ādi bali dravyam śṛṇu priye

original: śrīgandhaṃ cākṣataṃ vāri dhūpadīpau tathaiva ca ||
analyzed: śrī gandham ca akṣatam vāri dhūpa dīpau tathā eva ca
bali dravyam idam śaive dadhi annam tulasī tathā
agarum jambu patram ca mallikā kusumam tathā
kṣīrodanam ca durgāyām anyat sarvam ca pūrvavat
skande gorocanā upetam gandham ca eva guḍodanam
śatapuṣpam ca nirguṇḍī patram ca apagaṇa adhipe

original: kucandanaṃ ca madhvannaṃ punipuṣpaṃ tathaiva ca |
analyzed: kucandanam ca madhvannam punipuṣpam tathā eva ca
nyagrodha chandanam vā atha mudga annam śaṅkara cyate
karpūra agaru yuj gandham droṇapuṣpam tathā eva ca
apāmārga dalam proktam śāstā ṛcī atha nigadyate
kṛsara annam ca karpūra miśra candanam eva ca
nandyāvarta sumam bilva patram ca anyat purā ukta vat
deveṣu nikhileṣu ukta dravya alābhe athavā eṣu ca
śuddhodanam vā dravyeṣu yathā labdhāni kevalam
gandha puṣpāṇi patrāṇi bhaveyuḥ bali karmaṇi
bali dravyam iti proktam bali mantrān śṛṇu priye
dhyātvā ādau devam abhyarcya mantrī gandha ādi mudrikāḥ
pradṛśya tad tad uktaiḥ ca bali mantraiḥ balim haret
gandham kaniṣṭhayā aṅguṣṭha agreṇa deśikaḥ

original: dhūpaṃ dadyācca tarjanyā dīpaṃ madhyamayā tathā ||
analyzed: dhūpam dadyāt ca tarjanyā dīpam madhyamayā tathā
anāmaya annam iti uktāḥ mudrā gandha ādikāḥ kramāt
onnamaḥ ūntam sa veda ādi deva nāma jalam tatas
arcaya ām uccaret devam patram puṣpam tathā eva ca
evam annam vadet mantrī vahnijāyā avasānakam

original: pṛthak pṛthak dvārapādi devānāṃ ca yathākramam |
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak dvāra pādi devānām ca yathākramam
bali mantrāḥ ime nitya vidhau sarva amareṣu ca
santi naimittika ādye tu bali karmaṇi kenacid
upasthānāt navaḥ ca eva mālāmantrāḥ sadām tathā

original: manavaḥ pārṣadāṃ caiva mātṝṇāṃ tatra tatra vai |
analyzed: manavaḥ pārṣadām ca eva mātṝṇām tatra tatra vai
balideva gaṇa adhīśāḥ kecid pārṣada ādikāḥ
nā ucyam tatra mayā ukta tvāt utsaveṣu sa vistaram

original: balimantrā iti proktā vādyāni śṛṇu sāmpratam ||
analyzed: bali mantrāḥ iti proktāḥ vādyāni śṛṇu sāmpratam

original: śreṣṭhaṃ dvādaśavādyaṃ syā saptavādyaṃ ca madhyamam |
analyzed: śreṣṭham dvādaśa vādyam syā sapta vādyam ca madhyamam

original: p. 259) adhamaṃ pañcavādyaṃ syā vādyāni trividheti ca ||
analyzed: adhamam pañcavādyam syāḥ vādyāni trividha iti ca
bherī śaṅkha mṛdaṅgāḥ ca paṇavaḥ maddalaḥ tathā
vīṇā veṇuḥ ca tālam ca kahalam nāga vādyakam
yallarī kambu vādyam syāt evam dvādaśa vādyakam

original: śaṅkho mṛdaṅgaḥ paṇavo vīṇā tālaṃ tathaiva ca ||
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ mṛdaṅgaḥ paṇavaḥ vīṇā tālam tathā eva ca
kahalam dundubhiḥ ca iti sapta vādyam prakīrtitam
maddalaḥ ca eva tālam ca tathā eva jayaghaṇṭikā
śaṅkhaḥ ca kalahaṃ ca iti pañcavādyam prakīrtitam
indra ādi tāla nāmāni procyante atha yathākramam
samatālam sureśasya vahneḥ bandhāpaṇa aṃhvayam

original: yāmyaṃ syā bhṛṅgitālaṃ tu mallatālaṃ tu nair-ṛtam ||
vāruṇaṃ nava tālaṃ syānnāgatālaṃ tu mārutam |
analyzed: vāruṇam nava tālam syāt nāga tālam tu mārutam
kauśika ākhyam tu saumyam syāt dakkarī īśāna tālakam
vṛṣatālam mahā ukṣasya mātṝṇām śaśitālakam
skandasya utkala tālam syāt daurgam taṭaprahārakam
caṇḍanāthasya viṣama matha gānam samīryate

original: p. 260) prācyāṃ tu gānaṃ gāndhāraṃ kolli cāgneyagocare ||
analyzed: prācyām tu gānam gāndhāram ca āgneya gocare

original: dakṣiṇe kauśikī caiva naṭabhāṣā ca nair-ṛte |
analyzed: dakṣiṇe kauśikī ca eva naṭa bhāṣā ca nairṛte
vāruṇam kāmaram gānam karkaśī vāyugocare

original: tattadrāgaṃ cottare tu śālāpāṇī ca gocare |
analyzed: tad tad rāgam ca uttare tu śālā pāṇī ca gocare

original: evaṃ tālāni gānāni nitye balyutsave vidhau ||
analyzed: evam tālāni gānāni nitye bali utsave vidhau
nitya mūrtim bhrāmayet tu yadā naimittika ādike
naimittikyā saha evā enām bali mūrtyā guruḥ tadā
asurājena saṃyuktām anta liṅgena ca athavā
iti parameśvaratantre aṣṭatriṃśat paṭalaḥ
oṅkāram bhuvaneśvarīm kṣitipāram gorocanā āḍhyam
vande dvi ākāram tu virūḍha saṃpuram padam
nitya utsavāya berāṇi kalpitāni vadhūni ced
tad ardham kalpayet teṣu yathā iṣṭam beram unnatam
eka kālam dvi kālam vā tri catur pañca kālam

original: p. 261) ṣaṭ saptavasukālaṃ vā sarvadā cārcayecchivām ||
analyzed: ṣaṣ sapta vasu kālam vā sarvadā ca arcayet śivām
nityā itu evam samādiṣṭa sarva abhīṣṭa phala pradā

original: prātaḥkāle tu madhyāhne sāyāhne yadi pārvati ||
analyzed: prātar kāle tu madhyāhne sāyāhne yadi pārvati
bali karmaṇi hīne tu prāyaścittam samācaret

original: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu nāndīkarma vidhāya ca ||
analyzed: puṇyāham vācayitvā tu nāndīkarma vidhāya ca
aghora astreṇa vaṅkuryāt aṣṭottaraśatam tathā
pañca brahma ṣaṣ aṅgaiḥ ca homam kuryāt yathā vidhi
snāpayet kalaśaiḥ devam pañcabhiḥ navabhiḥ tu vā

original: devaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ pūjyā nivedyaṃ madhuraṃ dadet ||
analyzed: devam sa āvaraṇam pūjyā nivedyam madhuram dadet
devatābhyaḥ balim dadyāt brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatas

original: evaṃ prātarvidhi prokto madhyāhne dviguṇaṃ bhavet ||
analyzed: evam prātar vidhi proktaḥ madhyāhne dviguṇam bhavet
sāyāhne tat samam devi prāyaścita vidhi kramāt
iti candra jñāne
